## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-115">Invalidar todas las entradas dinámicas de la memoria caché de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-116">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-117">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-118">Este servicio invalida todas las entradas de ARP dinámicas que se encuentran actualmente en la memoria caché de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-119">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-120">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-121">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-122">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) memoria caché de ARP invalidada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) ARP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada no es un subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-126">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-127">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-128">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-129">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-130">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-148">Establecer entrada de ARP dinámica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-149">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-150">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-151">Este servicio asigna una entrada dinámica de la memoria caché de ARP y configura la dirección IP especificada para la asignación de la dirección física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-152">Si se especifica una dirección física establecida en cero, se envía una solicitud de ARP real a la red para que se resuelva la dirección física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-153">Tenga en cuenta también que esta entrada se quitará si está activa la caducidad de ARP o si se ha agotado la memoria caché de ARP y se trata de la entrada de ARP usada menos recientemente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-154">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-155">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-156">**ip_address**: dirección IP que se va a asignar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-157">**physical_msw**: 16 bits superiores (del 47 al 32) de la dirección física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-158">**physical_lsw**: 32 bits inferiores (del 31 al 0) de la dirección física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-159">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-160">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Entrada dinámica de ARP establecida correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) No hay más entradas de ARP disponibles en la memoria caché de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la instancia de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-166">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-167">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-168">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-169">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-170">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-183">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-183">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-188">Habilitar el protocolo de resolución de direcciones (ARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-189">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-190">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-191">Este servicio inicializa el componente de ARP de NetX para la instancia de IP específica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-192">La inicialización de ARP incluye la configuración de la memoria caché de ARP y varias rutinas de procesamiento de ARP necesarias para enviar y recibir mensajes de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-193">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-194">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-195">**arp_cache_memory**: puntero al área de memoria en la que se va a colocar la memoria caché de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-196">**arp_cache_size**: cada entrada de ARP tiene 52 bytes; el número total de entradas de ARP es, por lo tanto, el tamaño dividido entre 52.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-197">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-198">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ARP habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de memoria de caché o IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**: (0x09) La memoria caché de ARP proporcionada por el usuario es demasiado pequeña.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) Este componente ya se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-203">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-203">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-204">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-204">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-205">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-205">Preemption Possible</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_enable(&ip_0, (void *) pointer, 1024);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-225">Eliminar una entrada de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-226">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-227">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-228">Este servicio quita una entrada de ARP para un dirección IP determinada de su tabla de ARP interna de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-229">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-230">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-231">**ip_address**: se debe eliminar la entrada de ARP con la dirección IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-232">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-233">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ARP habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) No se puede encontrar ninguna entrada con la dirección IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de memoria de caché o IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección IP especificada no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-238">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-239">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-240">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-241">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-242">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-260">Enviar solicitud ARP gratuita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-261">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-262">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-263">Este servicio recorre todas las interfaces físicas para transmitir solicitudes ARP gratuitas, siempre y cuando la dirección IP de la interfaz sea válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-264">Si posteriormente se recibe una respuesta de ARP, se llama al controlador de respuesta proporcionado para procesar la respuesta a la solicitud ARP gratuita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-265">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-266">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-267">**response_handler**: puntero a la función de control de la respuesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-268">Si se proporciona NX_NULL, se omiten las respuestas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-269">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-270">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Envío correcto de solicitud ARP gratuita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-271">**NX_NO_PACKET**: (0x01) No hay ningún paquete disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) ARP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección IP actual no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada no es un subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-276">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-277">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-278">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-279">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-280">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-298">Buscar la dirección de hardware física para una dirección IP determinada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-299">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-300">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-301">Este servicio intenta encontrar una dirección de hardware física en la memoria caché de ARP que está asociada con la dirección IP proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-302">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-303">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-304">**ip_address**: dirección IP que se va a buscar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-305">**physical_msw**: puntero a la variable para devolver los 16 bits superiores (del 47 al 32) de la dirección física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-306">**physical_lsw**: puntero a la variable para devolver los 32 bits inferiores (del 31 al 0) de la dirección física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-307">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de memoria o IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>


## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-336">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-337">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-338">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-339">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de ARP de la instancia de IP asociada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-340">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-341">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-342">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-343">**arp_requests_sent**: puntero al destino para el total de solicitudes de ARP enviadas desde esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-344">**arp_requests_received**: puntero al destino para el total de solicitudes de ARP recibidas de la red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-345">**arp_responses_sent**: puntero al destino para el total de respuestas de ARP enviadas desde esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-346">**arp_responses_received**: puntero al destino para el total de respuestas de ARP recibidas de la red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-347">**arp_dynamic_entries**: puntero al destino para el número actual de entradas de ARP dinámicas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-348">**arp_static_entries**: puntero al destino para el número actual de entradas de ARP estáticas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-349">**arp_aged_entries**: puntero al destino del número total de entradas de ARP que han vencido y han quedado no válidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-350">**arp_invalid_messages**: puntero al destino del total de mensajes de ARP no válidos recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-351">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-352">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-356">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-357">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-358">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-359">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-360">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-378">Buscar la dirección IP dada una dirección física</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-379">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-380">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-381">Este servicio intenta encontrar una dirección IP en la memoria caché de ARP que está asociada con la dirección física proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-382">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-383">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-384">**ip_address**: puntero para devolver la dirección IP, si se encuentra una que se ha asignado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-385">**physical_msw**: 16 bits superiores (del 47 al 32) de la dirección física que se va a buscar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-386">**physical_lsw**: 32 bits inferiores (del 31 al 0) de la dirección física que se va a buscar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-387">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-388">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se encontró correctamente la dirección IP de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) No se encontró la asignación en la memoria caché de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de memoria o IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) physical_msw y physical_lsw son ambos 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-394">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-394">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-395">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-395">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-396">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-396">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-397">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-397">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-398">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-416">Eliminar todas las entradas de ARP estáticas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-417">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-418">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-419">Este servicio elimina todas las entradas estáticas de la memoria caché de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-420">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-421">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-422">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-423">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se han eliminado las entradas estáticas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero ip_ptr no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-427">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-428">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-429">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-430">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-431">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-449">Crear una dirección IP estática para la asignación de hardware en la memoria caché de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-450">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-451">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-452">Este servicio crea una asignación de dirección IP estática a física en la memoria caché de ARP para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-453">Las entradas de ARP estáticas no están sujetas a actualizaciones periódicas de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-454">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-455">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-456">**ip_address**: dirección IP que se va a asignar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-457">**physical_msw**: 16 bits superiores (del 47 al 32) de la dirección física que se va a asignar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-458">**physical_lsw**: 32 bits inferiores (del 31 al 0) de la dirección física que se va a asignar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-459">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-460">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Creación correcta de la entrada estática de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) No hay más entradas de ARP disponibles en la memoria caché de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) physical_msw y physical_lsw son ambos 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-467">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-468">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-469">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-470">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-471">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-489">Eliminar una asignación de dirección IP estática a hardware en la memoria caché de ARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-490">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-491">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-492">Este servicio busca y elimina una asignación de dirección IP estática a física creada anteriormente en la memoria caché de ARP para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-493">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-494">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-495">**ip_address**: dirección IP asignada estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-496">**physical_msw**: 16 bits superiores (del 47 al \*\*32) de la dirección física asignada estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-497">**physical_lsw**: 32 bits inferiores (del 31 al \*\*0) de la dirección física asignada estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-498">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-499">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Eliminación correcta de la entrada estática de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) No se encontró la entrada de ARP estática en la memoria caché de ARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) physical_msw y physical_lsw son ambos 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-506">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-507">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-508">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-510">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-510">Example</span></span>

```c

   instance ip_0. */

                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-528">Habilitar el protocolo de mensajes de control de Internet (ICMP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-529">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-530">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-531">Este servicio habilita el componente de ICMP para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-532">El componente de ICMP es responsable de controlar los mensajes de error de Internet y las solicitudes y respuestas de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-533">\*Este servicio solo habilita ICMP para el servicio IPv4. Para habilitar ICMPv4 e ICMPv6, las aplicaciones deben usar el servicio \*\*nxd_icmp_enable\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-534">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-535">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-536">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-537">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ICMP habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) ICMP ya está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-541">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-542">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-543">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-544">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-545">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-554">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades de ICMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-555">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-556">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-557">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de ICMP de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-558">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-559">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-560">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-561">**pings_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de pings enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-562">**ping_timeouts**: puntero al destino para el número total de tiempos de espera de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-563">**ping_threads_suspended**: puntero al destino del número total de subprocesos suspendidos en solicitudes de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-564">**ping_responses_received**: puntero al destino del número total de respuestas de ping recibidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-565">**icmp_checksum_errors**: puntero al destino del número total de errores de suma de comprobación de ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages**: puntero al destino del número total de mensajes de ICMP no controlados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-567">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-568">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de ICMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-572">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-573">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-574">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-575">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-576">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-577">Consulte también</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-577">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-578">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-578">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-579">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-579">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-585">Enviar solicitud de ping a la dirección IP especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-586">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-587">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-588">Este servicio envía una solicitud de ping a la dirección IP especificada y espera un mensaje de respuesta de ping durante la cantidad de tiempo especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-589">Si no se recibe ninguna respuesta, se devuelve un error.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-590">De lo contrario, se devuelve el mensaje de respuesta completo en la variable a la que apunta response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-591">Para enviar una solicitud de ping a un destino IPv6, las aplicaciones deben usar el servicio \***nxd_icmp_ping** _ o _ \*_nxd_icmp_source_ping_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-592">*Si se devuelve NX_SUCCESS, la aplicación es responsable de liberar el paquete recibido después de que ya no se necesite*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-593">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-594">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-595">**ip_address**: dirección IP, en orden de bytes del host, a la que se va a hacer ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-596">**data**: puntero al área de datos para el mensaje de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-597">**data_size**: número de bytes de los datos de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-598">**response_ptr**: puntero al puntero de paquete en el que se va a devolver el mensaje de respuesta de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-599">**wait_option**: define el número de tics del temporizador de ThreadX que se va a esperar una respuesta de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-600">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-601">Opción de espera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-602">Value</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-604">(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-605">valor del tiempo de espera en tics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-606">(0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-609">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-610">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ping correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-611">El puntero al mensaje de respuesta se ha colocado en la variable a la que apunta response_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-612">**NX_NO_PACKET**: (0x01) No se ha podido asignar un paquete de solicitud de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-613">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El área de datos especificada supera el tamaño de paquete predeterminado para esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) La dirección IP solicitada no ha respondido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de respuesta o dirección IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-620">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-620">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-621">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-622">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-623">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-624">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-632">nx_igmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-632">nx_igmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-633">Habilitar el protocolo de administración de grupos de Internet (IGMP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-633">Enable Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-634">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-634">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-635">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-635">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-636">Este servicio habilita el componente de IGMP en la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-636">This service enables the IGMP component on the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-637">El componente de IGMP es responsable de proporcionar compatibilidad con las operaciones de administración de grupos de multidifusión IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-637">The IGMP component is responsible for providing support for IP multicast group management operations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-638">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-638">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-639">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-639">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-640">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-641">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) IGMP habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-642">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-643">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) Este componente ya se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-644">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-645">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-645">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-646">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-646">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-647">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-647">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-648">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-648">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-649">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-649">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP is enabled. */
```
