## <a name="nx_igmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-662">nx_igmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-663">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades de IGMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-663">Retrieve information about IGMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-664">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-664">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *igmp_reports_sent,
    ULONG *igmp_queries_received,
    ULONG *igmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *current_groups_joined);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-665">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-665">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-666">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de IGMP de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-666">This service retrieves information about IGMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-667">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-667">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-668">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-669">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-669">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-670">**igmp_reports_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de informes de IGMP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-670">**igmp_reports_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of ICMP reports sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-671">**igmp_queries_received**: puntero al destino para el número total de consultas recibidas por el enrutador de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-671">**igmp_queries_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of queries received by multicast router.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-672">**igmp_checksum_errors**: puntero al destino del número total de errores de suma de comprobación de IGMP en los paquetes recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-672">**igmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of IGMP checksum errors on receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-673">**current_groups_joined**: puntero al destino del número actual de grupos unidos mediante esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-673">**current_groups_joined** Pointer to destination of the current number of groups joined through this IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-674">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-674">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-675">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-675">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-676">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-677">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-678">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-679">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-679">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-680">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-680">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-681">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-681">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-682">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-682">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-683">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-683">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IGMP information from previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_igmp_info_get(&ip_0, &igmp_reports_sent,
                          &igmp_queries_received,
                          &igmp_checksum_errors,
                          &current_groups_joined);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IGMP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-696">nx_igmp_loopback_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-697">Deshabilitar el bucle invertido de IGMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-697">Disable IGMP loopback</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-698">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-698">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-699">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-700">Este servicio deshabilita el bucle invertido de IGMP para todos los grupos de multidifusión unidos posteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-700">This service disables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-701">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-702">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-702">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-703">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-703">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-704">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Bucle invertido de IGMP deshabilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-704">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) IGMP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-705">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-706">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada no es un subproceso ni una inicialización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-707">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_igmp_loopback_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-725">nx_igmp_loopback_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-726">Habilitar el bucle invertido de IGMP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-726">Enable IGMP loopback</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-727">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-727">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_loopback_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-728">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-729">Este servicio habilita el bucle invertido de IGMP para todos los grupos de multidifusión unidos posteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-729">This service enables IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast groups joined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-730">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-731">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-731">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-732">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-732">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-733">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Bucle invertido de IGMP deshabilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-733">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IGMP loopback disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) IGMP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-734">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-735">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada no es un subproceso ni una inicialización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-736">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-737">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-738">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-738">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-739">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-739">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-740">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-740">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-741">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-741">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable IGMP loopback for all subsequent multicast
   groups joined. */
status = nx_igmp_loopback_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS IGMP loopback is enabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-753">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-754">Unir la instancia de IP al grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante una interfaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-754">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-755">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-755">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-756">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-756">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-757">Este servicio une una instancia de IP al grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante una interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-757">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-758">Se mantiene un contador interno para realizar un seguimiento del número de veces que se ha unido el mismo grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-758">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-759">Después de unirse al grupo de multidifusión, el componente de IGMP permitirá la recepción de paquetes IP con esta dirección de grupo mediante la interfaz de red especificada y también notificará a los enrutadores que esta instancia de IP es miembro de este grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-759">After joining the multicast group, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address via the specified network interface and also report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-760">Los mensajes de unión, informe y abandono de la pertenencia de IGMP también se envían mediante la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-760">The IGMP membership join, report, and leave messages are also sent via the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-761">Para unirse a un grupo de multidifusión IPv4 sin enviar el informe de pertenencia al grupo de IGMP, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-761">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-762">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-762">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-763">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-763">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-764">**group_address**: dirección del grupo de multidifusión IP de clase D que se va a unir en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-764">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-765">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz asociada a la instancia de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-765">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-766">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-767">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Unión correcta al grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-767">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) No es posible unirse a más grupos de multidifusión; se ha superado el máximo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-768">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-769">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice del dispositivo apunta a una interfaz de red no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-770">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección del grupo de multidifusión proporcionada no es una dirección de clase D válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-771">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-772">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La compatibilidad con la multidifusión IP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-773">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-774">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-775">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-776">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-776">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-777">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-777">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-778">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-778">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   244.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-790">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-791">Salir del grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante una interfaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-791">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-792">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-792">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-793">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-794">Este servicio sale del grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-794">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-795">Se mantiene un contador interno para realizar un seguimiento del número de veces que ha sido miembro el mismo grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-795">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been a member of.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-796">Después de salir del grupo de multidifusión, el componente de IGMP enviará un informe de pertenencia adecuado y puede salir del grupo si no hay ningún miembro de este nodo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-796">After leaving the multicast group, the IGMP component will send out proper membership report, and may leave the group if there are no members from this node.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-797">Para salir de un grupo de multidifusión IPv4 sin enviar el informe de pertenencia al grupo de IGMP, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-797">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-798">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-798">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-799">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-799">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-800">**group_address**: dirección del grupo de multidifusión IP de clase D del que se va a salir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-800">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-801">La dirección IP está en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-801">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-802">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz asociada a la instancia de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-802">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-803">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-803">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-804">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Unión correcta al grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-804">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) no se encuentra la dirección del grupo de multidifusión especificado en la tabla de multidifusión local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-805">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-806">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice del dispositivo apunta a una interfaz de red no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-807">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección del grupo de multidifusión proporcionada no es una dirección de clase D válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-808">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-809">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La compatibilidad con la multidifusión IP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-810">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP multicast support is not enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-812">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-812">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-814">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-814">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-815">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-815">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip IP_ADDRESS(244,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-827">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-828">Unir la instancia de IP al grupo de multidifusión especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-828">Join IP instance to specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-829">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-829">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-830">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-830">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-831">Este servicio une una instancia de IP al grupo de multidifusión especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-831">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-832">Se mantiene un contador interno para realizar un seguimiento del número de veces que se ha unido el mismo grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-832">An internal counter is maintained to keep track of the number of times the same group has been joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-833">Si se trata de la primera vez que se solicita la unión en la red, el controlador recibe la orden de enviar un informe de IGMP que indique la intención del host de unirse al grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-833">The driver is commanded to send an IGMP report if this is the first join request out on the network indicating the host's intention to join the group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-834">Después de unirse, el componente de IGMP permitirá la recepción de paquetes IP con esta dirección de grupo y notificará a los enrutadores que esta instancia de IP es miembro de este grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-834">After joining, the IGMP component will allow reception of IP packets with this group address and report to routers that this IP is a member of this multicast group.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-835">Para unirse a un grupo de multidifusión IPv4 sin enviar el informe de pertenencia al grupo de IGMP, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-835">To join an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join***.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-836">*Para unirse a un grupo de multidifusión en un dispositivo no primario, use el servicio **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-836">*To join a multicast group on a non-primary device, use the service **nx_igmp_multicast_interface_join.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-837">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-838">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-838">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-839">**group_address**: dirección del grupo de multidifusión IP de clase D que se va a unir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-839">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-840">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-840">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-841">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Unión correcta al grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-841">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) No es posible unirse a más grupos de multidifusión; se ha superado el máximo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-842">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice del dispositivo apunta a una interfaz de red no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-843">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección de grupo IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-844">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-845">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-846">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-847">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-848">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-849">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-849">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-850">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-851">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-852">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance ip_0 joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_join(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully
   joined the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_igmp_multicast_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-865">nx_igmp_multicast_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-866">Hacer que la instancia de IP salga del grupo de multidifusión especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-866">Cause IP instance to leave specified multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-867">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-867">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_igmp_multicast_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG group_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-868">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-868">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-869">Este servicio hace que una instancia de IP salga del grupo de multidifusión especificado si el número de solicitudes para salir coincide con el número de solicitudes para unirse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-869">This service causes an IP instance to leave the specified multicast group, if the number of leave equests matches the number of join requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-870">De lo contrario, solo se reduce el contador de uniones interno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-870">Otherwise, the internal join count is simply decremented.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-871">Para salir de un grupo de multidifusión IPv4 sin enviar el informe de pertenencia al grupo de IGMP, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-871">To leave an IPv4 multicast group without sending IGMP group membership report, application shall use the service ***nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-872">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-873">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-873">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-874">**group_address**: grupo de multidifusión que se va a abandonar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-874">**group_address** Multicast group to leave.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-875">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-875">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-876">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Unión correcta al grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-876">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) No se ha encontrado la solicitud de unión anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-877">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Previous join request was not found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice del dispositivo apunta a una interfaz de red no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-878">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección de grupo IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-879">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP group address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-880">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-881">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-882">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-883">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-883">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-884">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-884">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-885">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-885">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-886">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-887">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-887">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Cause IP instance to leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
status = nx_igmp_multicast_leave(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, this IP instance has successfully left
   the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_change_notifiy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-900">nx_ip_address_change_notifiy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-901">Notificar a la aplicación si cambia la dirección IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-901">Notify application if IP address changes</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-902">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-902">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*change_notify)(NX_IP *, VOID *),
    VOID *additional_info);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-903">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-904">Este servicio registra una función de notificación a la aplicación a la que se llama cada vez que cambie la dirección IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-904">This service registers an application notification function that is called whenever the IPv4 address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-905">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-906">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-906">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-907">**change_notify**: puntero a la función de notificación de cambio de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-907">**change_notify** Pointer to IP change notification function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-908">Si este parámetro es NX_NULL, se deshabilita la notificación de cambio de dirección IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-908">If this parameter is NX_NULL, IP address change notification is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-909">**additional_info**: puntero a información adicional opcional que también se proporciona a la función de notificación cuando cambia la dirección IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-909">**additional_info** Pointer to optional additional information that is also supplied to the notification function when the IP address is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-910">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-910">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-911">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Notificación correcta de cambio de dirección IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-911">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address change notification.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-912">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-913">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-914">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-915">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-915">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-916">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-916">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-917">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-918">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-918">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Register the function "my_ip_changed" to be called whenever the
   IP address is changed. */
status = nx_ip_address_change_notify(&ip_0, my_ip_changed,
                                      NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "my_ip_changed" function will be
   called whenever the IP address changes. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-943">nx_ip_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-943">nx_ip_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-944">Recuperar la dirección IPv4 y la máscara de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-944">Retrieve IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-945">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-945">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-946">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-946">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-947">Este servicio recupera la dirección IPv4 y la máscara de subred de la interfaz de red principal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-947">This service retrieves IPv4 address and its subnet mask of the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]   
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-948">\*Para obtener información del dispositivo secundario, use el servicio \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-948">\*To obtain information of the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_get\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-949">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-949">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-950">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-950">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-951">**ip_address**: puntero al destino de la dirección IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-951">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-952">**network_mask**: puntero al destino de la máscara de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-952">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-953">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-953">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-954">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La dirección IP se ha obtenido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-954">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la variable de devolución o a la instancia de IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-955">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return variable pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-956">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-957">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-958">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-958">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-959">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-959">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-960">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-960">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-961">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-961">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the IP address and network mask from the previously created
   IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address, &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address and
   network_mask contain the IP and network mask respectively. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-986">nx_ip_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-986">nx_ip_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-987">Establecer la dirección IPv4 y la máscara de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-987">Set IPv4 address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-988">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-989">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-990">Este servicio establece la dirección IPv4 y la máscara de red de la interfaz de red principal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-990">This service sets IPv4 address and network mask for the primary network interface.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-991">\*Para establecer la dirección IP y la máscara de red del dispositivo secundario, use el servicio \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-991">\*To set IP address and network mask for the secondary device, use the service \*\*nx_ip_interface_address_set\*\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-992">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-992">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-993">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-993">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-994">**ip_address**: nueva dirección IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-994">**ip_address** New IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-995">**network_mask**: nueva máscara de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-995">**network_mask** New network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-996">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-997">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Dirección IP establecida correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-999">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1000">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1001">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1002">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1002">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1003">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1003">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1004">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1004">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1005">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1005">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the IP address and network mask to 1.2.3.4 and 0xFFFFFF00 for
   the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                           0xFFFFFF00UL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now has an IP address of
   1.2.3.4 and a network mask of 0xFFFFFF00. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1030">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1031">Configurar un grupo de paquetes auxiliar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1031">Configure an auxiliary packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1032">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1032">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *aux_pool);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1033">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1033">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1034">Este servicio configura un grupo de paquetes auxiliar en la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1034">This service configures an auxiliary packet pool in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1035">Para un sistema con restricción de memoria, el usuario puede aumentar la eficacia de la memoria al crear el grupo de paquetes predeterminado con el tamaño de paquete de la MTU y crear un grupo de paquetes auxiliar con un tamaño de paquete más pequeño para que el subproceso de IP transmita pequeños paquetes con él.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1035">For a memory-constrained system, the user may increase memory efficiency by creating the default packet pool with packet size of MTU, and creating an auxiliary packet pool with smaller packet size for the IP thread to transmit small packets with.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1036">El tamaño de paquete recomendado para el grupo auxiliar es de 256 bytes, suponiendo que IPv6 e IPsec están habilitados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1036">The recommended packet size for the auxiliary pool is 256 bytes, assuming IPv6 and IPsec are both enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1037">De manera predeterminada, la instancia de IP no acepta el grupo de paquetes auxiliar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1037">By default the IP instance does not accept the auxiliary packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1038">Para habilitar esta característica, se debe definir *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* al compilar la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1038">To enable this feature, *NX_DUAL_PACKET_POOL_ENABLE* must be defined when compiling the NetX Duo library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1039">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1040">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1040">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1041">**aux_pool**: grupo de paquetes auxiliar que se va a configurar para la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1041">**aux_pool** The auxiliary packet pool to be configured for the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1042">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1042">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1043">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Dirección IP establecida correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1043">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) No se ha compilado en la biblioteca la característica de grupo de paquetes dual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1044">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The dual packet pool feature is not compiled in the library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de IP o puntero de grupo no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1045">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1046">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1047">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1047">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1048">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1048">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1049">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1049">Preemption Possible</span></span>  

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1050">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1050">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1051">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1051">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE 256
NX_PACKET small_pool;

nx_packet_pool_create(&small_pool, "small pool", SMALL_PAYLOAD_SIZE,
                       small_pool_memory_ptr, small_pool_size);

/* Add the small packet pool to the IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set(&ip_0, &small_pool);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance now is able to use the
   small pool for transmitting small datagram. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1062">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1062">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1064">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1064">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1065">nx_ip_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1065">nx_ip_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1066">Crear una instancia de IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1066">Create an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1067">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1067">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *name, ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask, 
    NX_PACKET_POOL *default_pool,
    VOID (*ip_network_driver)(NX_IP_DRIVER *),
    VOID *memory_ptr, 
    ULONG memory_size,
    UINT priority);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1068">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1069">Este servicio crea una instancia de IP con la dirección IP y el controlador de red proporcionados por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1069">This service creates an IP instance with the user supplied IP address and network driver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1070">Además, la aplicación debe proporcionar un grupo de paquetes creado previamente para la instancia de IP que se va a utilizar para la asignación interna de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1070">In addition, the application must supply a previously created packet pool for the IP instance to use for internal packet allocation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1071">Tenga en cuenta que no se llama al controlador de red proporcionado por la aplicación hasta que se ejecuta este subproceso de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1071">Note that the supplied application network driver is not called until this IP's thread executes.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1072">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1073">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control para crear una nueva instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1073">**ip_ptr** Pointer to control block to create a new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1074">**name**: nombre de esta nueva instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1074">**name** Name of this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1075">**ip_address**: dirección IP de esta nueva instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1075">**ip_address** IP address for this new IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1076">**network_mask**: máscara para delimitar la parte de la red de la dirección IP para los usos de subredes y superredes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1076">**network_mask** Mask to delineate the network portion of the IP address for sub-netting and super-netting uses.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1077">**default_pool**: puntero al bloque de control del grupo de paquetes de NetX Duo creado previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1077">**default_pool** Pointer to control block of previously created NetX Duo packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1078">**ip_network_driver**: controlador de red proporcionado por el usuario que se usa para enviar y recibir paquetes IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1078">**ip_network_driver** User-supplied network driver used to send and receive IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1079">**memory_ptr**: puntero al área de memoria para el área de pila del subproceso auxiliar de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1079">**memory_ptr** Pointer to memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1080">**memory_size**: número de bytes del área de memoria para la pila del subproceso auxiliar de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1080">**memory_size** Number of bytes in the memory area for the IP helper thread’s stack.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1081">**priority**: prioridad del subproceso auxiliar de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1081">**priority** Priority of IP helper thread.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1082">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1082">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1083">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Creación correcta de la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1083">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP instance creation.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED**: (0x4A) La biblioteca de NetX Duo no está configurada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1084">**NX_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** (0x4A) NetX Duo library is configured incorrectly.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) instancia de IP, puntero a la función del controlador de red, grupo de paquetes o puntero a la memoria no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1085">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP, network driver function pointer, packet pool, or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**: (0X09) El tamaño de pila proporcionado es demasiado pequeño.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1086">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) The supplied stack size is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1087">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección IP proporcionada no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1088">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x21) La prioridad del subproceso de IP proporcionada no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1089">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x21) The supplied IP thread priority is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1090">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1091">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1091">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1092">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1092">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1093">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1093">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1094">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1094">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create an IP instance with an IP address of 1.2.3.4 and a network
   mask of 0xFFFFFF00UL. The "ethernet_driver" specifies the entry
   point of the application specific network driver and the
   "stack_memory_ptr" specifies the start of a 1024 byte memory
   area that is used for this IP instance’s helper thread. */
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance ip_0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0, ethernet_driver,
                      stack_memory_ptr, 1024, 1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been created. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1119">nx_ip_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1119">nx_ip_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1120">Eliminar una instancia de IP creada anteriormente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1120">Delete previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1121">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1121">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1122">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1123">Este servicio elimina una instancia de IP creada anteriormente y libera todos los recursos del sistema que pertenecen a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1123">This service deletes a previously created IP instance and releases all of the system resources owned by the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1124">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1124">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1125">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1125">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1126">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1127">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Instancia de IP eliminada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1127">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP deletion.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND**: (0x28) Esta instancia de IP todavía tiene sockets UDP o TCP enlazados a ella.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1128">**NX_SOCKETS_BOUND** (0x28) This IP instance still has UDP or TCP sockets bound to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1129">Se deben desenlazar y eliminar todos los sockets antes de eliminar la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1129">All sockets must be unbound and deleted prior to deleting the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1130">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1131">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1132">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1132">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1133">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1133">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1134">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1134">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1135">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1135">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1136">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1136">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_driver_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1161">nx_ip_driver_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1162">Emitir un comando al controlador de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1162">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1163">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1163">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_direct_command
    (NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1164">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1165">Este servicio proporciona una interfaz directa al controlador de la interfaz de red principal de la aplicación especificado durante la llamada a ***nx_ip_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1165">This service provides a direct interface to the application's primary network interface driver specified during the ***nx_ip_create*** call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1166">Se pueden usar comandos específicos de la aplicación siempre que su valor numérico sea mayor o igual que NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1166">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1167">\*Para emitir un comando para el dispositivo secundario, use el servicio \*\*nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command\*\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1167">*To issue command for the secondary device, use the **nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1168">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1168">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1169">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1169">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1170">**command**: código numérico del comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1170">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1171">Los comandos estándar se definen de la siguiente manera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1171">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1172">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1173">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1174">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1175">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1176">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1177">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1178">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1179">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1180">**return_value_ptr**: puntero a la variable de devolución del autor de llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1180">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1181">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1181">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1182">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Comando directo del controlador de red ejecutado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1182">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND**: (0X44) Comando del controlador de red no controlado o no implementado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1183">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) IP o puntero de valor devuelto no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1184">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1185">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de interfaz no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1186">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1187">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1187">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1188">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1188">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1189">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1189">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1190">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1190">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1191">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1191">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */
status = nx_ip_driver_direct_command(&ip_0, NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                     &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```
