## <a name="nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1216">nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1217">Emitir un comando al controlador de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1217">Issue command to network driver</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1218">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1218">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT command,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *return_value_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1219">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1220">Este servicio proporciona un comando directo al controlador del dispositivo de red de la aplicación en la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1220">This service provides a direct command to the application's network device driver in the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1221">Se pueden usar comandos específicos de la aplicación siempre que su valor numérico sea mayor o igual que *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1221">Application-specific commands can be used providing their numeric value is greater than or equal to *NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1222">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1222">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1223">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1223">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1224">**command**: código numérico del comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1224">**command** Numeric command code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1225">Los comandos estándar se definen de la siguiente manera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1225">Standard commands are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1226">NX_LINK_GET_STATUS (10)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1227">NX_LINK_GET_SPEED (11)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1228">NX_LINK_GET_DUPLEX_TYPE (12)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1229">NX_LINK_GET_ERROR_COUNT (13)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1230">NX_LINK_GET_RX_COUNT (14)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1231">NX_LINK_GET_TX_COUNT (15)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1232">NX_LINK_GET_ALLOC_ERRORS (16)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1233">NX_LINK_USER_COMMAND (50)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1234">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red a la que se debe enviar el comando.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1234">**interface_index** Index of the network interface the command should be sent to.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1235">**return_value_ptr**: puntero a la variable de devolución del autor de llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1235">**return_value_ptr** Pointer to return variable in the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1236">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1236">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1237">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Comando directo del controlador de red ejecutado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1237">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful network driver direct command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND**: (0X44) Comando del controlador de red no controlado o no implementado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1238">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x44) Unhandled or unimplemented network driver command.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de interfaz no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1239">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) IP o puntero de valor devuelto no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1240">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return value pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1241">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1242">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1243">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1244">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1245">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1245">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1246">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Make a direct call to the application-specific network driver
   for the previously created IP instance. For this example, the
   network driver is interrogated for the link status. */

/* Set the interface index to the primary device. */
UINT interface_index = 0;

status = nx_ip_driver_interface_direct_command(&ip_0,
                                               NX_LINK_GET_STATUS,
                                               interface_index,
                                               &link_status);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link_status variable contains a
   NX_TRUE or NX_FALSE value representing the status of the
   physical link. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1271">nx_ip_forwarding_disable</span></span>


## <a name="nx_ip_forwarding_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1312">nx_ip_forwarding_enable</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1353">nx_ip_fragment_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1354">Deshabilitar la fragmentación de paquetes IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1354">Disable IP packet fragmenting</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1355">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1355">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_fragment_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1356">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1357">Este servicio deshabilita la funcionalidad de fragmentación y reensamblado de paquetes IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1357">This service disables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1358">En el caso de los paquetes que esperan reensamblado, este servicio libera estos paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1358">For packets waiting to be reassembled, this service releases these packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1359">Al crear la tarea de IP, este servicio se deshabilita automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1359">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1360">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1361">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1361">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1362">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1362">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1363">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) Se ha deshabilitado correctamente la fragmentación de paquetes IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP fragment disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1364">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1365">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La fragmentación de IP no está habilitada en la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1366">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation is not enabled on the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1367">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1368">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1368">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1369">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1369">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1370">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1370">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1371">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1371">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IP fragmenting on this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_fragment_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, disables IP fragmenting on the
   previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_fragment_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1396">nx_ip_fragment_enable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1398">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1398">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1400">Este servicio habilita la funcionalidad de fragmentación y reensamblado de paquetes IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1400">This service enables IPv4 and IPv6 packet fragmenting and reassembling functionality.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1401">Al crear la tarea de IP, este servicio se deshabilita automáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1401">On creation of the IP task, this service is automatically disabled.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1406">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1407">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Las características de fragmentación de IP no se han compilado en NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1408">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP Fragmentation features is not compiled into NetX Duo.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1409">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1409">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1438">nx_ip_gateway_address_clear</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1439">Borrar la dirección de la puerta de enlace IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1439">Clear the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1440">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1440">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1441">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1441">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1442">Este servicio borra la dirección de la puerta de enlace IPv4 configurada en la instancia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1442">This service clears the IPv4 gateway address configured in the instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1443">Para borrar un valor predeterminado externo de IPv6 de la instancia de IP, las aplicaciones deben usar el servicio ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1443">To clear an IPv6 default outer from the IP instance, applications shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1444">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1444">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1445">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1445">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1446">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1446">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1447">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha borrado correctamente la dirección de la puerta de enlace IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1447">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared the IP gateway address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1448">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1449">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1450">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1451">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1451">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1452">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1452">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1453">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1453">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1454">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1454">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Clear the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_clear(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   cleared from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1457">nx_ip_gateway_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1458">Obtener la dirección de la puerta de enlace IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1458">Get the IPv4 gateway address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1459">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1460">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1461">Este servicio recupera la dirección de la puerta de enlace IPv4 configurada en la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1461">This service retrieves the IPv4 gateway address configured in the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1462">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1463">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1463">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1464">**ip_address**: puntero a la memoria en la que se almacena la dirección de la puerta de enlace.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1464">**ip_address** Pointer to the memory where the gateway address is stored</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1465">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1466">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha obtenido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1466">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de bloque de control de IP o puntero de dirección IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1467">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or ip address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x4E) No se ha encontrado la dirección de la puerta de enlace.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1468">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Gateway address not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1469">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1470">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1470">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1471">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1471">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1472">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1472">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1473">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1473">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1474">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1474">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG ip_address;

/* Get the gateway address of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_get(&ip_0, &ip_address);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the gateway address was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_gateway_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1486">nx_ip_gateway_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1487">Establecer la dirección IP de la puerta de enlace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1487">Set Gateway IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1488">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1488">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_gateway_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1489">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1490">Este servicio establece la dirección IP de la puerta de enlace IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1490">This service sets the IPv4 gateway IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1491">Todo el tráfico destinado fuera de la red se enruta a esta puerta de enlace para su transmisión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1491">All out-of-network traffic are routed to this gateway for transmission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1492">La puerta de enlace debe ser accesible directamente mediante una de las interfaces de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1492">The gateway must be directly accessible through one of the network interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1493">Para configurar la dirección de la puerta de enlace IPv6, use el servicio ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1493">To configure IPv6 gateway address, use the service ***nxd_ipv6_default_router_add.***</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1494">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1494">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1495">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1495">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1496">**ip_address**: dirección IP de la puerta de enlace.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1496">**ip_address** IP address of the gateway.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1497">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1498">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Dirección IP de la puerta de enlace establecida correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1498">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful Gateway IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la instancia de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1500">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1501">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1502">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1503">Inicialización, subproceso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1503">Initialization, thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1504">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1504">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1505">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1505">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1506">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1506">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup the Gateway address for previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_ip_gateway_address_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,99);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, all out-of-network send requests are
   routed to 1.2.3.99. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1518">nx_ip_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1519">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades de IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1519">Retrieve information about IP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1520">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1520">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_packets_received,
    ULONG *ip_total_bytes_received,
    ULONG *ip_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *ip_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_receive_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *ip_send_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_sent,
    ULONG *ip_total_fragments_received);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1521">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1522">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de IP de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1522">This service retrieves information about IP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1523">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1523">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1524">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1525">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1525">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes IP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1526">**ip_total_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of IP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de bytes enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1527">**ip_total_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1528">**ip_total_packets_received**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes IP recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1528">**ip_total_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received**: puntero al destino para el número total de bytes de IP recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1529">**ip_total_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of IP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1530">**ip_invalid_packets**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1530">**ip_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid IP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes recibidos eliminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1531">**ip_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors**: puntero al destino para el número total de errores de suma de comprobación en paquetes recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1532">**ip_receive_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of checksum errors in receive packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes enviados eliminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1533">**ip_send_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of send packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de fragmentos enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1534">**ip_total_fragments_sent** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received**: puntero al destino para el número total de fragmentos recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1535">**ip_total_fragments_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of fragments received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1536">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1537">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1538">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1540">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1540">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1544">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1544">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve IP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_ip_info_get(&ip_0,
                        &ip_total_packets_sent,
                        &ip_total_bytes_sent,
                        &ip_total_packets_received,
                        &ip_total_bytes_received,
                        &ip_invalid_packets,
                        &ip_receive_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_receive_checksum_errors,
                        &ip_send_packets_dropped,
                        &ip_total_fragments_sent,
                        &ip_total_fragments_received);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, IP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1569">nx_ip_interface_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1570">Recuperar la dirección IP de la interfaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1570">Retrieve interface IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1571">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1571">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_get (
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1572">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1572">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1573">Este servicio recupera la dirección IPv4 de una interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1573">This service retrieves the IPv4 address of a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1574">Para recuperar la dirección IPv6, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1574">To retrieve IPv6 address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_get***</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1575">*Si no es el dispositivo primario, el dispositivo especificado debe estar conectado previamente a la instancia de IP.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1575">*The specified device, if not the primary device, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1576">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1576">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1577">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1577">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1578">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz, el mismo valor que el índice de la interfaz de red asociada a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1578">**interface_index** Interface index, the same value as the index to the network interface attached to the IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1579">**ip_address**: puntero al destino de la dirección IP de la interfaz del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1579">**ip_address** Pointer to destination for the device interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1580">**network_mask**: puntero al destino de la máscara de red de la interfaz del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1580">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for the device interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1581">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1582">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La dirección IP se ha obtenido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1582">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) La interfaz de red especificada no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1583">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1585">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1586">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1587">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1587">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1588">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1589">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1589">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1590">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1590">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Get device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_get(ip_ptr,INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     &ip_address,
                                     &network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1604">nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1605">Configurar si es necesaria la asignación de direcciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1605">Configure whether address mapping is needed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1606">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1606">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT mapping_needed);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1607">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1608">Este servicio configura si es necesaria la asignación de dirección IP a dirección MAC para la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1608">This service configures whether IP address to MAC address mapping is needed for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1609">Normalmente se llama a este servicio desde el controlador de dispositivo de la interfaz para notificar a la pila de IP si la interfaz subyacente requiere asignación de la dirección IP a una dirección de capa dos (MAC).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1609">This service is typically called from the interface device driver to notify the IP stack whether the underlying interface requires IP address to layer two (MAC) address mapping.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1610">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1611">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1611">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1612">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1612">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1613">**mapping_needed**: NX_TRUE si se necesita asignación de direcciones y NX_FALSE si no es necesaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1613">**mapping_needed** NX_TRUE -- address mapping needed NX_FALSE -- address mapping not needed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1614">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1615">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Configuración correcta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1615">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de dispositivo no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1616">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1619">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1620">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1620">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1621">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1621">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1622">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1622">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1623">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1623">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
UCHAR mapping_needed = NX_TRUE;

/* Configure address mapping needed specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_mapping_configure(&ip_0,
                                             PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                             mapping_needed);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the address mapping needed was
   successfully configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1637">nx_ip_interface_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1638">Establecer la dirección IP y la máscara de red de la interfaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1638">Set interface IP address and network mask</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1639">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1639">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1640">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1640">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1641">Este servicio establece la dirección IPv4 y la máscara de red de la interfaz IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1641">This service sets the IPv4 address and network mask for the specified IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1642">Para configurar la dirección de la interfaz IPv6, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1642">To configure IPv6 interface address, application shall use the service ***nxd_ipv6_address_set***.</span></span> 
 
> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1643">*La interfaz especificada se debe asociar previamente a la instancia de IP*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1643">*The specified interface must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span> 

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1644">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1644">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1645">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1645">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1646">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz asociada a la instancia de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1646">**interface_index** Index of the interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1647">**ip_address**: nueva dirección IP de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1647">**ip_address** New network interface IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1648">**network_mask**: nueva máscara de red de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1648">**network_mask** New interface network mask.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1649">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1650">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Dirección IP establecida correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1650">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP address set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) La interfaz de red especificada no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1651">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1652">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Punteros no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1653">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1654">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1655">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1656">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1656">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1657">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1657">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1658">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1659">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1659">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Set device IP address and network mask for the specified
   interface index 1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
status = nx_ip_interface_address_set(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                     ip_address,
                                     network_mask);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface IP address and mask was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1673">nx_ip_interface_attach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1674">Conectar la interfaz de red a la instancia de IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1674">Attach network interface to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1675">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1675">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_attach(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    CHAR *interface_name,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG network_mask,
    VOID(*ip_link_driver)(struct NX_IP_DRIVER_STRUCT *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1676">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1677">Este servicio agrega una interfaz de red física a la interfaz IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1677">This service adds a physical network interface to the IP interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1678">Tenga en cuenta que la instancia de IP se crea con la interfaz principal, por lo que cada interfaz adicional es secundaria para la interfaz principal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1678">Note the IP instance is created with the primary interface so each additional interface is secondary to the primary interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1679">El número total de interfaces de red conectadas a la instancia de IP (incluida la interfaz principal) no puede superar **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1679">The total number of network interfaces attached to the IP instance (including the primary interface) cannot exceed **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1680">Si el subproceso de IP todavía no se ha ejecutado, las interfaces secundarias se inicializarán como parte del proceso de inicio del subproceso de IP que inicializa todas las interfaces físicas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1680">If the IP thread has not been running yet, the secondary interfaces will be initialized as part of the IP thread startup process that initializes all physical interfaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1681">Si el subproceso de IP aún no se está ejecutando, la interfaz secundaria se inicializa como parte del servicio ***nx_ip_interface_attach***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1681">If the IP thread is not running yet, the secondary interface is initialized as part of the ***nx_ip_interface_attach*** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1682">*ip_ptr debe apuntar a una estructura IP de NetX Duo válida. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** se debe configurar para el número de interfaces de red de la instancia de IP. El valor predeterminado es uno*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1682">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. **NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES** must be configured for the number of network interfaces for the IP instance. The default value is one*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1683">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1683">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1684">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1684">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1685">**interface_name**: puntero a la cadena del nombre de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1685">**interface_name** Pointer to interface name string.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1686">**ip_address**: dirección IP del dispositivo en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1686">**ip_address** Device IP address in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1687">**network_mask**: máscara de red del dispositivo en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1687">**network_mask** Device network mask in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1688">**ip_link_driver**: controlador Ethernet de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1688">**ip_link_driver** Ethernet driver for the interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1689">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1689">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1690">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La entrada se ha agregado a la tabla de enrutamiento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1690">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) Número máximo de interfaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1691">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) Max number of interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1692">Se ha superado NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1692">NX_MAX_PHYSICAL_INTERFACES is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1693">Si IPv6 está habilitado, este error también puede indicar que es posible que el controlador no tenga suficientes recursos para administrar las operaciones de multidifusión IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1693">If IPv6 is enabled, this error may also indicate that the driver may not have enough resource to handle IPv6 multicast operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY**: (0x52) La dirección IP suministrada ya está en uso en esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1694">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1695">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Entrada de puntero no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1696">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Entrada de dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1697">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address input.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1698">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1699">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1699">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1700">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1700">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1701">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1701">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1702">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1702">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Attach secondary device for device IP address 192.168.1.68 with
   the specified Ethernet driver. */
status = nx_ip_interface_attach(ip_ptr, “secondary_port”,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,68),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                nx_etherDriver);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface was successfully added to
   the IP instance interface table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1716">nx_ip_interface_capability_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1717">Obtener las funcionalidades del hardware de la interfaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1717">Get interface hardware capability</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1718">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1718">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *interface_capability_flag);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1719">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1719">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1720">Este servicio recupera la marca de funcionalidades de la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1720">This service retrieves the capability flag from the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1721">Para usar este servicio, se debe compilar la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1721">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1722">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1722">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1723">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1723">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1724">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1724">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1725">**interface_capability_flag**: puntero al espacio de memoria de la marca de funcionalidades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1725">**interface_capability_flag** Pointer to memory space for the capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1726">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1726">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1727">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se obtuvo correctamente la información de funcionalidades de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully obtained interface capability information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de funcionalidades de la interfaz no se admite en esta compilación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1728">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1729">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido o puntero de marca de funcionalidades no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or Invalid capability flag pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1733">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1733">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1734">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1736">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1736">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       capability_flag;

/* Get the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_get(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        &capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the capability flag from the primary
   interface was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_capability_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1750">nx_ip_interface_capability_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1751">Establecer la marca de funcionalidades del hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1751">Set the hardware capability flag</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1752">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1752">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_capability_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG interface_capability_flag);
```                           
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1753">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1753">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1754">El controlador del dispositivo de red usa este servicio para configurar la marca de funcionalidades de una interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1754">This service is used by the network device driver to configure the capability flag for a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1755">Para usar este servicio, se debe compilar la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1755">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be compiled with the option ***NX_ENABLE_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1756">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1756">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1757">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1757">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1758">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1758">**interface_index** Index of network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1759">**interface_capability_flag**: marca de funcionalidades para la salida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1759">**interface_capability_flag** Capability flag for output</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1760">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1761">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente la marca de funcionalidades del hardware de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1761">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set interface hardware capability flag.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de funcionalidades de la interfaz no se admite en esta compilación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1762">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Interface capability feature is not supported in this build.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1763">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1764">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1765">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) S ervice is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1766">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1766">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1767">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1767">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1768">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1768">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1769">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1769">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1770">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1770">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG capability_flag = \
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_TX_CHECKSUM |\
                 NX_INTERFACE_CAPABILITY_IPV4_RX_CHECKSUM;
UINT device_index = 0;

/* Set the hardware capability flag of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_capability_set(&ip_0,
                                        PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                        capability_flag);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the hardware capability flag was
   successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1784">nx_ip_interface_detach</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1785">Desconectar la interfaz especificada de la instancia de IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1785">Detach the specified interface from the IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1786">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1786">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1787">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1788">Este servicio desconecta la interfaz IP especificada de la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1788">This service detaches the specified IP interface from the IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1789">Una vez desconectada una interfaz, se cierran todos los sockets TCP conectados y se quitan las entradas de la memoria caché de ND y ARP de esta interfaz de las tablas respectivas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1789">Once an interface is detached, all connected TCP sockets closed, and ND cache and ARP entries for this interface are removed from their respective tables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1790">Se quitan las pertenencias de IGMP de esta interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1790">IGMP memberships for this interface are removed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1791">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1791">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1792">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1792">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1793">**index**: índice de la interfaz que se va a quitar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1793">**index** Index of the interface to be removed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1794">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1795">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha quitado correctamente una interfaz física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1795">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed a physical interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) La interfaz de red especificada no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1796">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Punteros no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1797">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1798">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1799">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1799">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1800">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1800">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1801">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1801">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1802">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1802">Example</span></span>

```c
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1

/* Detach interface 1. */
status = nx_ip_interface_detach(&IP_0, INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface is successfully detached
   from the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1816">nx_ip_interface_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1817">Recuperar los parámetros de la interfaz de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1817">Retrieve network interface parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1818">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1818">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    CHAR **interface_name,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG *network_mask,
    ULONG *mtu_size,
    ULONG *physical_address_msw,
    ULONG *physical_address_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1819">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1820">Este servicio recupera información de los parámetros de red de la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1820">This service retrieves information on network parameters for the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1821">Todos los datos se recuperan en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1821">All data are retrieved in host byte order.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1822">*ip_ptr debe apuntar a una estructura IP de NetX Duo válida. La interfaz especificada, si no es la interfaz principal, se debe conectar previamente a la instancia de IP.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1822">*ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure. The specified interface, if not the primary interface, must be previously attached to the IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1823">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1823">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1824">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1824">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1825">**interface_index**: índice que especifica la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1825">**interface_index** Index specifying network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1826">**interface_name**: puntero al búfer que contiene el nombre de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1826">**interface_name** Pointer to the buffer that holds the name of the network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1827">**ip_address**: puntero al destino de la dirección IP de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1827">**ip_address** Pointer to the destination for the IP address of the interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1828">**network_mask**: puntero al destino de la máscara de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1828">**network_mask** Pointer to destination for network mask.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1829">**mtu_size**: puntero al destino de la unidad de transferencia máxima de esta interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1829">**mtu_size** Pointer to destination for maximum transfer unit for this interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1830">**physical_address_msw**: puntero al destino de los 16 bits superiores de la dirección MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1830">**physical_address_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1831">**physical_address_lsw**: puntero al destino de los 32 bits inferiores de la dirección MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1831">**physical_address_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1832">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1832">Return Values</span></span>   

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1833">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha obtenido la información de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1833">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Interface information has been obtained.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Entrada de puntero no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1834">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1835">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1836">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1840">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1840">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1841">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1841">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve interface parameters for the specified interface (index
   1 in IP instance list of interfaces). */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ip_interface_info_get(ip_ptr, INTERFACE_INDEX,
                                  &name_ptr, &ip_address,
                                  &network_mask,
                                  &mtu_size,
                                  &physical_address_msw,
                                  &physical_address_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the interface information is
   successfully retrieved. */
```
