## <a name="nx_ip_interface_mtu_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1855">nx_ip_interface_mtu_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1856">Establecer el valor de MTU de una interfaz de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1856">Set the MTU value of a network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1857">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1857">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG mtu_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1858">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1859">El controlador del dispositivo usa este servicio para configurar el valor de MTU de IP de la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1859">This service is used by the device driver to configure the IP MTU value for the specified network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1860">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1861">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1861">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1862">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1862">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1863">**mtu_size**: tamaño de MTU de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1863">**mtu_size** IP MTU size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1864">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1864">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1865">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente el valor de MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1865">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set MTU value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1866">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1867">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1868">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1869">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1869">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1870">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1870">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1871">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1871">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1872">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1872">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1873">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1873">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       mtu_size = 1500;

/* Set the MTU size of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_mtu_set(&ip_0,
                                 PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mtu_size);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the MTU size was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1887">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1888">Obtener la dirección física de un dispositivo de red</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1888">Get the physical address of a network device</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1889">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1889">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1890">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1890">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1891">Este servicio recupera la dirección física de una interfaz de red desde la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1891">This service retrieves the physical address of a network interface from the IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1892">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1892">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1893">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1893">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1894">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1894">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1895">**physical_msw**: puntero al destino de los 16 bits superiores de la dirección MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1895">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1896">**physical_lsw**: puntero al destino de los 32 bits inferiores de la dirección MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1896">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1897">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1898">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha obtenido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1898">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1899">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de bloque de control de IP o puntero a la dirección física no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1900">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1901">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1902">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1902">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1903">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1903">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1904">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1904">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1905">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1905">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1906">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1906">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG   physical_msw;
ULONG   physical_lsw;

/* Get the physical address of specified interface. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_get(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              &physical_msw,
                                              &physical_lsw);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1920">nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1921">Establecer la dirección física de una interfaz de red especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1921">Set the physical address for a specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1922">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1922">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT update_driver);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1923">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1924">Este servicio lo usan la aplicación o un controlador de dispositivo para configurar la dirección física de la dirección MAC de la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1924">This service is used by the application or a device driver to configure the physical address of the MAC address of the specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1925">La nueva dirección MAC se aplica al bloque de control de la estructura de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1925">The new MAC address is applied to the control block of the interface structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1926">Si se establece la marca ***update_driver***, se emite un comando de nivel de controlador para que el controlador del dispositivo pueda actualizar su dirección MAC programada en el controlador Ethernet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1926">If the ***update_driver*** flag is set, a driver-level command is issued so the device driver is able to update its MAC address programmed into the Ethernet controller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1927">En una situación típica, se llama a este servicio desde el controlador de dispositivo de la interfaz durante la fase de inicialización para notificar a la pila IP su dirección MAC.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1927">In a typical situation, this service is called from the interface device driver during initialization phase to notify the IP stack of its MAC address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1928">En este caso, no se debe establecer la marca ***update_driver***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1928">In this case, the ***update_driver*** flag should not be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1929">También se puede llamar a esta rutina desde la aplicación de usuario para volver a configurar la dirección MAC de la interfaz en tiempo de ejecución.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1929">This routine can also be called from user application to reconfigure the interface MAC address at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1930">En este caso de uso, se debe establecer la marca ***update_driver*** para que se pueda aplicar la nueva dirección MAC al controlador del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1930">In this use case, the ***update_driver*** flag should be set, so the new MAC address can be applied to the device driver.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1931">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1932">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1932">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1933">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1933">**interface_index** Index to the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1934">**physical_msw**: puntero al destino de los 16 bits superiores de la dirección MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1934">**physical_msw** Pointer to destination for top 16 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1935">**physical_lsw**: puntero al destino de los 32 bits inferiores de la dirección MAC del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1935">**physical_lsw** Pointer to destination for lower 32 bits of the device MAC address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1936">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1937">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1937">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND**: (0x4B) Comando no reconocido por el controlador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1938">**NX_UNHANDLED_COMMAND** (0x4B) Command not recognized by the driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1939">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1940">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1941">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1942">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1943">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1944">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1946">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1946">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
ULONG       physical_msw = 0x00CF;
ULONG       physical_lsw = 0x01020304;

/* Set the physical address of specified device. */
status = nx_ip_interface_physical_address_set(&ip_0,
                                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                              physical_msw,
                                              physical_lsw,
                                              NX_TRUE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the physical address was successfully
   set. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_interface_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1960">nx_ip_interface_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1961">Comprobar el estado de una instancia de IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1961">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1962">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1962">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_interface_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1963">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1964">Este servicio comprueba y, de manera opcional, espera el estado especificado de la interfaz de red de una instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1964">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1965">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1965">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1966">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1966">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1967">**interface_index**: número de índice de la interfaz. needed_status: estado de IP solicitado, definido en formato de mapa de bits de la siguiente manera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1967">**interface_index** Interface index number needed_status IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE**: (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1968">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED**: (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1969">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED**: (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1970">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED**: (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1971">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED**: (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1972">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED**: (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1973">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED**: (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1974">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE**: (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1975">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED**: (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1976">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1977">**actual_status**: puntero al destino del conjunto de bits real.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1977">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1978">wait_option define cómo se comporta el servicio si los bits de estado solicitados no están disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1978">wait_option Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1979">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1979">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1980">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1981">**valor de tiempo de espera**: (de 0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1981">**timeout value** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1982">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1983">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1983">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1984">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Comprobación de estado de IP correcta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1984">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**: (0x43) La solicitud de estado no se ha satisfecho dentro del tiempo de espera especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1985">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) El puntero IP no es o ha dejado de ser válido o el puntero de estado real no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1986">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0a) Opción de estado necesario no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1987">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1988">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz está fuera del intervalo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1989">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface_index is out of range.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1990">o la interfaz no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1990">or the interface is not valid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1991">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1991">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1992">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1992">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1993">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1993">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1994">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1994">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-1995">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-1995">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_interface_status_check(&ip_0, 1, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                                      &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the secondary link for the specified IP
   instance is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2009">nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2010">Establecer la función de devolución de llamada de notificación de cambio de estado del vínculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2010">Set the link status change notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2011">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2011">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_link_status_change_notify_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID(*link_status_change_notify)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT interface_index, UINT link_up));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2012">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2013">Este servicio configura la función de devolución de llamada de notificación de cambio de estado del vínculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2013">This service configures the link status change notify callback function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2014">La rutina *link_status_change_notify* proporcionada por el usuario se invoca cuando cambia el estado de la interfaz principal o secundaria (por ejemplo, se cambia la dirección IP). Si *link_status_change_notify* es NULL, se deshabilita la característica de devolución de llamada de notificación de cambio de estado del vínculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2014">The user-supplied *link_status_change_notify* routine is invoked when either the primary or secondary interface status is changed (such as IP address is changed.) If *link_status_change_notify* is NULL, the link status change notify callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2015">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2015">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2016">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2016">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2017">**link_status_change_notify**: función de devolución de llamada proporcionada por el usuario a la que se llamará cuando cambie la interfaz física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2017">**link_status_change_notify** User-supplied callback function to be called upon a change to the physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2018">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2019">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2019">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido o nuevo puntero de dirección física.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2020">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer or new physical address pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2021">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_max_payload_size_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2040">nx_ip_max_payload_size_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2041">Calcular la carga máxima de datos del paquete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2041">Compute maximum packet data payload</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2042">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2042">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_address,
    UINT if_index,
    UINT src_port,
    UINT dest_port,
    ULONG protocol,
    ULONG *start_offset_ptr,
    ULONG *payload_length_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2043">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2043">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2044">Este servicio encuentra el tamaño máximo de carga de aplicación que no requerirá fragmentación IP para alcanzar el destino; por ejemplo, la carga es o está por debajo del tamaño de MTU de la interfaz local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2044">This service finds the maximum application payload size that will not require IP fragmentation to reach the destination; e.g., payload is at or below the local interface MTU size.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2045">(o el valor de MTU de ruta obtenido mediante la detección de MTU de la ruta IPv6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2045">(or the Path MTU value obtained via IPv6 Path MTU discovery).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2046">El encabezado IP y el tamaño del encabezado de aplicación superior (TCP o UDP) se restan de la carga total.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2046">IP header and upper application header size (TCP or UDP) are subtracted from the total payload.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2047">Si se aplica la directiva de seguridad de IPsec de NetX Duo a este punto de conexión, los encabezados IPsec (ESP/AH) y la sobrecarga asociada, como el vector inicial, también se restan de la MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2047">If NetX Duo IPsec Security Policy applies to this end-point, the IPsec headers (ESP/AH) and associated overhead, such as Initial Vector, are also subtracted from the MTU.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2048">Este servicio es aplicable a los paquetes IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2048">This service is applicable for both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2049">El parámetro *if_index* especifica la interfaz que se va a utilizar para enviar el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2049">The parameter *if_index* specifies the interface to use for sending out the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2050">En el caso de un sistema de host múltiple, el autor de llamada debe especificar el parámetro *if_index* si el destino es una difusión (solo IPv4), multidifusión o una dirección local de vínculo IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2050">For a multihome system, the caller needs to specify the *if_index* parameter if the destination is a broadcast (IPv4 only), multicast, or IPv6 link-local address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2051">Este servicio devuelve dos valores al autor de llamada:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2051">This service returns two values to the caller:</span></span>

1) <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2052">start_offset_ptr: esta es la ubicación después de los encabezados TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2052">start_offset_ptr: This is the location after the TCP/UDP/IP/IPsec headers;</span></span>
2) <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2053">payload_length_ptr: cantidad de datos que la aplicación puede transferir sin superar la MTU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2053">payload_length_ptr: the amount of data application may transfer without exceeding MTU.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2054">No hay ningún servicio de NetX equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2054">There is no equivalent NetX service.</span></span>

### <a name="restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2055">Restricciones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2055">Restrictions</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2056">La instancia de IP se debe crear previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2056">The IP instance must be previously created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2057">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2058">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2058">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2059">**dest_address**: puntero a la dirección de destino del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2059">**dest_address** Pointer to packet destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2060">**if_index**: indica el índice de la interfaz que se va a usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2060">**if_index** Indicates the index of the interface to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2061">**src_port**: número de puerto de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2061">**src_port** Source port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2062">**dest_port**: número de puerto de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2062">**dest_port** Destination port number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2063">**protocol**: protocolo de nivel superior que se va a usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2063">**protocol** Upper layer protocol to be used</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2064">**start_offset_ptr**: puntero al inicio de los datos para la carga máxima del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2064">**start_offset_ptr** Pointer to the start of data for maximum packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2065">**payload_length_ptr**: puntero al tamaño de la carga excluyendo los encabezados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2065">**payload_length_ptr** Pointer to payload size excluding headers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2066">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2066">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2067">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Carga calculada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2067">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Payload successfully computed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido o la interfaz no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2068">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is invalid, or the interface is not valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2069">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido o dirección de destino no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2070">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer, or invalid destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Se ha proporcionado una dirección no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2071">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid address supplied</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) Protocolo no válido (no es UDP ni TCP).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2072">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) Invalid protocol (not UDP or TCP)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) No se ha llamado al servicio desde el contexto de la inicialización del sistema o del subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2073">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Service is not called from system initialization or thread context.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2074">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2074">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2075">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2075">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2076">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2076">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2077">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2077">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2078">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2078">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following example determines the maximum payload for UDP
   packet to remote host. */
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
status = nx_ip_max_payload_size_find(&ip_0,
                                     &dest_ipv6_address,
                                     PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     source_port,
                                     dest_port, NX_PROTOCOL_UDP,
                                     &start_offset,
                                     &payload_length);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet payload
   payload_length starting at the offset start_offset is
   successfully computed. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2103">nx_ip_raw_packet_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2104">Deshabilitar el envío y la recepción de paquetes sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2104">Disable raw packet sending/receiving</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2105">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2106">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2107">Este servicio deshabilita la transmisión y recepción de paquetes IP sin formato para esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2107">This service disables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2108">Si el servicio de paquetes sin formato se ha habilitado previamente y hay paquetes sin formato en la cola de recepción, este servicio liberará cualquier paquete sin formato recibido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2108">If the raw packet service was previously enabled, and there are raw packets in the receive queue, this service will release any received raw packets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2109">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2110">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2110">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2111">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2111">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2112">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Deshabilitación correcta de paquetes de IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2112">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2113">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2114">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2115">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2116">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2116">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2117">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2117">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2118">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2118">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2119">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2119">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_disable(&ip_0);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been disabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2129">nx_ip_raw_packet_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2130">Habilitar el procesamiento de paquetes sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2130">Enable raw packet processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2131">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2131">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2132">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2133">Este servicio habilita la transmisión y recepción de paquetes IP sin formato para esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2133">This service enables transmission and reception of raw IP packets for this IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2134">Los paquetes TCP, UDP, ICMP e IGMP entrantes se siguen procesando en NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2134">Incoming TCP, UDP, ICMP, and IGMP packets are still processed by NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2135">Los paquetes con tipos de protocolo de nivel superior desconocidos los procesa la rutina de recepción de paquetes sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2135">Packets with unknown upper layer protocol types are processed by raw packet reception routine.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2136">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2137">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2137">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2138">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2138">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2139">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Habilitación correcta de paquetes IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2139">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2140">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2141">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2142">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2143">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2143">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2144">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2144">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2145">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2145">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2146">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2146">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable raw packet sending/receiving for this IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, raw IP packet sending/receiving has
   been enabled for the previously created IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2156">nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2157">Establecer el filtro de paquetes IP sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2157">Set raw IP packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2158">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2158">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT (*raw_packet_filter)(NX_IP *, ULONG, NX_PACKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2159">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2159">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2160">Este servicio configura el filtro de paquetes IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2160">This service configures the IP raw packet filter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2161">La función de filtro de paquetes sin formato, implementada por la aplicación de usuario, permite a una aplicación recibir paquetes sin formato en función de los criterios proporcionados por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2161">The raw packet filter function, implemented by user application, allows an application to receive raw packets based on user-supplied criteria.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2162">Tenga en cuenta que la capa de contenedor BSD de NetX Duo usa la característica de filtro de paquetes sin formato para controlar el socket sin formato en la capa BSD.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2162">Note that NetX Duo BSD wrapper layer uses the raw packet filter feature to handle raw socket in the BSD layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2163">Para usar este servicio, se debe compilar la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2163">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IP_RAW_PACKET_FILTER*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2164">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2164">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2165">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2165">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2166">**raw_packet_filter**: puntero a la función del filtro de paquetes sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2166">**raw_packet_filter** Function pointer of the raw packet filter</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2167">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2167">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2168">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente la rutina de filtro de paquetes sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2168">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the raw packet filter routine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) No está disponible la compatibilidad con paquetes sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2169">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) Raw packet support is not available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2170">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2171">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2172">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2173">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2173">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2174">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2174">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2175">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2175">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2176">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2176">Example</span></span>

```c
UINT raw_packet_filter(NX_IP *ip_ptr, ULONG protocol,
                       NX_PACKET *packet_ptr)
{

/* Simply filter protocol. */
if(protocol == NX_IP_RAW)
   return NX_SUCCESS;
else
   return NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL;
}

void raw_packet_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

/* Set the raw packet filter of IP instance. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_filter_set(&ip_0,
                                     raw_packet_filter);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the raw packet filter of IP instance
   was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2186">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2187">Recibir paquete IP sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2187">Receive raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2188">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2188">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2189">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2189">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2190">Este servicio recibe un paquete IP sin formato de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2190">This service receives a raw IP packet from the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2191">Si hay paquetes IP en la cola de recepción de paquetes sin formato, el primer paquete (más antiguo) se devuelve al autor de llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2191">If there are IP packets on the raw packet receive queue, the first (oldest) packet is returned to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2192">De lo contrario, si no hay paquetes disponibles, el autor de llamada puede suspender según lo especificado por la opción de espera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2192">Otherwise, if no packets are available, the caller may suspend as specified by the wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]   
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2193">*Si se devuelve NX_SUCCESS, la aplicación es responsable de liberar el paquete recibido después de que ya no se necesite*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2193">*If NX_SUCCESS, is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2194">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2194">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2195">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2195">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2196">**packet_ptr**: puntero al puntero para colocar el paquete IP sin formato recibido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2196">**packet_ptr** Pointer to pointer to place the received raw IP packet in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2197">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si no hay ningún paquete disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2197">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if packets are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2198">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2198">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2199">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2200">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2201">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2201">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2202">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2202">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2203">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recepción correcta del paquete IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2203">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No hay ningún paquete disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2204">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet was available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2205">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2206">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) IP o puntero de paquete devuelto no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2207">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2208">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2209">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2209">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2210">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2210">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2211">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2211">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2212">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2212">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2213">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2213">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a raw IP packet for this IP instance, wait for a maximum
   of 4 timer ticks. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_receive(&ip_0, &packet_ptr, 4);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointer is in the
   variable packet_ptr. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2222">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2223">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2224">Enviar paquete IP sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2224">Send raw IP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2225">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2225">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2226">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2227">Este servicio envía un paquete IPv4 sin formato a la dirección IP de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2227">This service sends a raw IPv4 packet to the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2228">Tenga en cuenta que esta rutina vuelve inmediatamente y, por lo tanto, no se conoce si se ha enviado realmente el paquete IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2228">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is therefore not known whether the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2229">El controlador de red será responsable de liberar el paquete cuando se complete la transmisión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2229">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2230">En el caso de un sistema de host múltiple, NetX Duo usa la dirección IP de destino para encontrar una interfaz de red adecuada y usa la dirección IP de la interfaz como dirección de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2230">For a multihome system, NetX Duo uses the destination IP address to find an appropriate network interface and uses the IP address of the interface as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2231">Si la dirección IP de destino es de difusión o de multidifusión, se usa la primera interfaz válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2231">If the destination IP address is broadcast or multicast, the first valid interface is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2232">En este caso, las aplicaciones usan ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2232">Applications use the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send*** in this case.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2233">Para enviar un paquete IPv6 sin formato, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send** _ o _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2233">To send a raw IPv6 packet, application shall use the service ***nxd_ip_raw_packet_send,** _ or _ *_nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send._**</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2234">*A menos que se devuelva un error, la aplicación no debe liberar el paquete después de esta llamada. Si lo hace, se producirán resultados imprevisibles, ya que el controlador de red liberará el paquete después de la transmisión.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2234">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2235">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2235">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2236">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2236">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2237">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete IP sin formato que se va a enviar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2237">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the raw IP packet to send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2238">**destination_ip**: dirección IP de destino, que puede ser una dirección IP de host específica, una difusión de red, un bucle interno o una dirección de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2238">**destination_ip** Destination IP address, which can be a specific host IP address, a network broadcast, an internal loop-back, or a multicast address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2239">**type_of_service**: define el tipo de servicio para la transmisión. Los valores válidos son los siguientes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2239">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2240">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY**: (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2241">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA**: (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2242">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE**: (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2243">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST**: (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2244">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2245">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2245">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2246">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha iniciado correctamente el envío del paquete IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2246">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP raw packet send initiated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2247">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La característica de paquete IP sin formato no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2248">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP feature is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0A) Tipo de servicio no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2249">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) No hay espacio suficiente para anteponer un encabezado IP al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2250">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room to prepend an IP header on the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero para anexar paquetes no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2251">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) IP o puntero de paquete no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2252">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2253">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2254">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2254">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2255">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2255">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2256">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2256">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2257">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2257">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2258">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2258">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a raw IP packet to IP address 1.2.3.5. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                               IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                               NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the raw IP packet pointed to by
   packet_ptr has been sent. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2269">nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2270">Enviar un paquete IP sin formato mediante la interfaz de red especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2270">Send raw IP packet through specified network interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2271">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2271">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG type_of_service);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2272">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2272">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2273">Este servicio envía un paquete IP sin formato a la dirección IP de destino usando la dirección IPv4 local especificada como dirección de origen y mediante la interfaz de red asociada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2273">This service sends a raw IP packet to the destination IP address using the specified local IPv4 address as the source address, and through the associated network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2274">Tenga en cuenta que esta rutina vuelve inmediatamente y, por lo tanto, no se conoce si se ha enviado realmente el paquete IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2274">Note that this routine returns immediately, and it is, therefore, not known if the IP packet has actually been sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2275">El controlador de red será responsable de liberar el paquete cuando se complete la transmisión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2275">The network driver will be responsible for releasing the packet when the transmission is complete.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2276">Este servicio difiere de otros servicios, ya que no hay ninguna manera de saber si el paquete se ha enviado realmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2276">This service differs from other services in that there is no way of knowing if the packet was actually sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2277">Podría perderse en Internet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2277">It could get lost on the Internet.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2278">*Tenga en cuenta que debe estar habilitado el procesamiento de paquetes IP sin formato*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2278">*Note that raw IP processing must be enabled*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2279">*Este servicio es similar a **nx_ip_raw_packet_send**, salvo que este servicio permite a una aplicación enviar paquetes IPv4 sin formato desde una interfaz física especificada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2279">*This service is similar to **nx_ip_raw_packet_send,** except that this service allows an application to send raw IPv4 packet from a specified physical interfaces*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2280">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2280">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2281">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la tarea de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2281">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP task.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2282">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete que se va a transmitir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2282">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2283">**destination_ip**: dirección IP a la que se va a enviar el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2283">**destination_ip** IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2284">**address_index**: índice de la dirección de la interfaz por la que se va a enviar el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2284">**address_index** Index of the address of the interface to send packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2285">**type_of_service**: tipo de servicio del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2285">**type_of_service** Type of service for packet.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2286">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2286">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2287">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha transmitido correctamente el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2287">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully transmitted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) No hay ninguna interfaz de salida adecuada disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2288">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) No suitable outgoing interface available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) No se ha habilitado el procesamiento de paquetes IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2289">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP packet processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2290">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Entrada de puntero no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2291">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0A) Tipo de servicio especificado no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2292">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type of service specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) Puntero de anteposición de paquetes no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2293">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) Puntero de anteposición de paquetes no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2294">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de interfaz especificado no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2295">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index specified.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2296">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2297">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2297">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2298">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2298">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2299">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2299">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2300">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2300">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_IDNEX 1

/* Send packet out on interface 1 with normal type of service. */
status = nx_ip_raw_packet_source_send(ip_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                      destination_ip,
                                      ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                      NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the packet was successfully
   transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2310">nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2311">Establecer el tamaño máximo de la cola de recepción sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2311">Set maximum raw receive queue size</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2312">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2312">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG queue_max);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2313">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2314">Este servicio configura la profundidad máxima de la cola de recepción de paquetes IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2314">This service configures the maximum depth of the IP raw packet receive queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2315">Tenga en cuenta que la cola de recepción de paquetes IP sin formato se comparte para los paquetes IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2315">Note that the IP raw packet receive queue is shared with both IPv4 and IPv6 packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2316">Cuando la cola de recepción de paquetes sin formato alcanza la profundidad máxima configurada por el usuario, se quitan los paquetes sin formato recién recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2316">When the raw packet receive queue reaches the userconfigured maximum depth, newly received raw packets are dropped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2317">La profundidad predeterminada de la cola de recepción de paquetes IP sin formato es 20.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2317">The default IP raw packet receive queue depth is 20.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2318">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2318">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2319">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2319">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2320">**queue_max**: nuevo valor para el tamaño de la cola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2320">**queue_max** New value for the queue size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2321">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2322">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente la profundidad máxima de la cola de recepción sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2322">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set raw receive queue maximum depth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2325">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2326">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2327">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2327">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2328">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2328">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2329">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2329">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG queue_max = 10;

/* Set the maximum size of the IP raw packet receive queue. */
status = nx_ip_raw_receive_queue_max_set (&ip_0,
                                          queue_max);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the maximum size of the IP raw packet
   receive queue was successfully set. */
```
