- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2334">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2334">nx_ip_raw_packet_receive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2335">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2335">nx_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2339">nx_ip_static_route_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2340">Agregar una ruta estática a la tabla de enrutamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2340">Add static route to the routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2341">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask,
    ULONG next_hop);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2342">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2343">Este servicio agrega una entrada a la tabla de enrutamiento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2343">This service adds an entry to the static routing table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2344">Tenga en cuenta que la dirección de *next_hop* debe ser accesible directamente desde uno de los dispositivos de red local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2344">Note that the *next_hop* address must be directly accessible from one of the local network devices.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2345">*Tenga en cuenta que ip_ptr debe apuntar a una estructura IP de NetX Duo válida y que la biblioteca de NetX Duo se debe compilar con NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definido para usar este servicio. De manera predeterminada, NetX Duo se compila sin NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definido*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2345">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2346">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2346">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2347">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2347">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2348">**network_address**: dirección de red de destino, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2348">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2349">**net_mask**: máscara de red de destino, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2349">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2350">**next_hop**: dirección del próximo salto para la red de destino, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2350">**next_hop** Next hop address for the target network, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2351">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2351">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2352">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La entrada se ha agregado a la tabla de enrutamiento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry is added to the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) La tabla de enrutamiento estático está llena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2353">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Static routing table is full.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) Esta característica no se ha compilado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2354">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) El próximo salto no es directamente accesible mediante las interfaces locales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2355">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Next hop is not directly accessible via local interfaces.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2356">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero ip_ptr no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2357">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2358">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2359">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2359">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2360">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2360">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2361">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2361">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2362">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2362">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Specify the next hop for 192.168.1.68 through the gateway
   192.168.1.1. */
status = nx_ip_static_route_add(ip_ptr, IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                0xFFFFFF00UL,
                                IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,1));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully added to the
   static routing table. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2370">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2370">nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2371">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2371">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2372">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2373">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2373">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ip_static_route_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2374">nx_ip_static_route_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2375">Eliminar una ruta estática de la tabla de enrutamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2375">Delete static route from routing table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2376">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_static_route_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG network_address,
    ULONG net_mask);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2377">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2378">Este servicio elimina una entrada de la tabla de enrutamiento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2378">This service deletes an entry from the static routing table.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2379">*Tenga en cuenta que ip_ptr debe apuntar a una estructura IP de NetX Duo válida y que la biblioteca de NetX Duo se debe compilar con NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definido para usar este servicio. De manera predeterminada, NetX Duo se compila sin NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING definido*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2379">*Note that ip_ptr must point to a valid NetX Duo IP structure and the NetX Duo library must be built with NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined to use this service. By default NetX Duo is built without NX_ENABLE_IP_STATIC_ROUTING defined*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2380">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2381">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2381">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2382">**network_address**: dirección de red de destino, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2382">**network_address** Target network address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2383">**net_mask**: máscara de red de destino, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2383">**net_mask** Target network mask, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2384">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2384">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2385">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha eliminado correctamente de la tabla de enrutamiento estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2385">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful deletion from the static routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**: (0x43) No se ha encontrado la entrada en la tabla de enrutamiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2386">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Entry cannot be found in the routing table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) Esta característica no se ha compilado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2387">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) This feature is not compiled in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero ip_ptr no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2388">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2389">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2390">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2391">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2391">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2392">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2392">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2393">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2393">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2394">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2394">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Remove the static route for 192.168.1.68 from the routing
   table.*/
status = nx_ip_static_route_delete(ip_ptr,
                                   IP_ADDRESS(192,168,1,0),
                                   0xFFFFFF00UL,);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the route was successfully removed from
   the static routing table. */
```

## <a name="nx_ip_status_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2406">nx_ip_status_check</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2407">Comprobar el estado de una instancia de IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2407">Check status of an IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2408">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2408">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ip_status_check(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG needed_status,
    ULONG *actual_status,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2409">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2410">Este servicio comprueba y, de manera opcional, espera el estado especificado de la interfaz de red primaria de una instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2410">This service checks and optionally waits for the specified status of the primary network interface of a previously created IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2411">Para obtener el estado de las interfaces secundarias, las aplicaciones deben usar el servicio ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2411">To obtain status on secondary interfaces, applications shall use the service ***nx_ip_interface_status_check.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2412">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2413">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2413">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2414">**needed_status**: estado de IP solicitado, definido en formato de mapa de bits de la siguiente manera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2414">**needed_status** IP status requested, defined in bit-map form as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE**: (0x0001)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2415">**NX_IP_INITIALIZE_DONE** (0x0001)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED**: (0x0002)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2416">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_RESOLVED** (0x0002)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED**: (0x0004)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2417">**NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0004)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED**: (0x0008)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2418">**NX_IP_ARP_ENABLED** (0x0008)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED**: (0x0010)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2419">**NX_IP_UDP_ENABLED** (0x0010)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED**: (0x0020)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2420">**NX_IP_TCP_ENABLED** (0x0020)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED**: (0x0040)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2421">**NX_IP_IGMP_ENABLED** (0x0040)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE**: (0x0080)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2422">**NX_IP_RARP_COMPLETE** (0x0080)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED**: (0x0100)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2423">**NX_IP_INTERFACE_LINK_ENABLED** (0x0100)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2424">**actual_status**: puntero al destino del conjunto de bits real.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2424">**actual_status** Pointer to destination of actual bits set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2425">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si los bits de estado solicitados no están disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2425">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested status bits are not available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2426">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2426">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2427">**NX_NO_WAIT** 0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2428">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2428">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2429">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2430">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2430">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2431">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Comprobación de estado de IP correcta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2431">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful IP status check.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**: (0x43) La solicitud de estado no se ha satisfecho dentro del tiempo de espera especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2432">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Status request was not satisfied within the timeout specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) El puntero IP no es o ha dejado de ser válido o el puntero de estado real no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2433">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP pointer is or has become invalid, or actual status pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0a) Opción de estado necesario no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2434">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid needed status option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2436">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2436">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2437">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2437">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2438">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2438">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2439">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2439">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2440">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2440">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 10 ticks for the link up status on the previously created IP
   instance. */
status = nx_ip_status_check(&ip_0, NX_IP_LINK_ENABLED,
                            &actual_status, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the link for the specified IP instance
   is up. */
```

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2465">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2466">Unir la instancia de IP al grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante una interfaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2466">Join IP instance to specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2467">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2467">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2468">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2469">Este servicio une una instancia de IP al grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante una interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2469">This service joins an IP instance to the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2470">Una vez que la instancia de IP se une a un grupo de multidifusión, la lógica de recepción de IP comienza a reenviar paquetes de datos del grupo de multidifusión a la capa superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2470">Once the IP instance joins a multicast group, the IP receive logic starts to forward data packets from the give multicast group to the upper layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2471">Tenga en cuenta que este servicio se une a un grupo de multidifusión sin enviar informes de IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2471">Note that this service joins a multicast group without sending IGMP reports.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2472">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2472">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2473">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2473">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2474">**group_address**: dirección del grupo de multidifusión IP de clase D que se va a unir en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2474">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to join in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2475">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz asociada a la instancia de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2475">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2476">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2476">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2477">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Unión correcta al grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2477">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) No es posible unirse a más grupos de multidifusión; se ha superado el máximo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2478">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more multicast groups can be joined, maximum exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero no válido a la instancia de IP o la instancia de IP no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP no está habilitado en esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2481">**NX_NOT_EANABLED** (0x14) IGMP is not enabled in this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección del grupo de multidifusión proporcionada no es una dirección de clase D válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2482">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice del dispositivo apunta a una interfaz de red no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2483">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2484">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2485">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2485">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2486">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2486">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2487">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2487">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2488">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2488">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Previously created IP Instance joins the multicast group
   224.0.0.200, via the interface at index 1 in the IP interface
   list. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_join
                                 (&ip IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                  INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully joined
   the multicast group. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2494">nx_igmp_multicast_join</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2495">nx_igmp_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2498">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>

## <a name="nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2500">nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2501">Salir del grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante una interfaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2501">Leave specified multicast group via an interface</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2502">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2502">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2503">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2504">Este servicio sale del grupo de multidifusión especificado mediante la interfaz de red especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2504">This service leaves the specified multicast group via a specified network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2505">Después de cerrar el grupo, este servicio no desencadena la generación de mensajes de IGMP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2505">After leaving the group, this service does not trigger IGMP messages being generated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2506">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2506">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2507">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2507">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2508">**group_address**: dirección del grupo de multidifusión IP de clase D del que se va a salir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2508">**group_address** Class D IP multicast group address to leave.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2509">La dirección IP está en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2509">The IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2510">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz asociada a la instancia de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2510">**interface_index** Index of the Interface attached to the NetX Duo instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2511">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2511">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2512">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Unión correcta al grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2512">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast group join.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) no se encuentra la dirección del grupo de multidifusión especificado en la tabla de multidifusión local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2513">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) The specified multicast group address cannot be found in the local multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice del dispositivo apunta a una interfaz de red no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2514">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Device index points to an invalid network interface.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección del grupo de multidifusión proporcionada no es una dirección de clase D válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2515">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Multicast group address provided is not a valid class D address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2516">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero no válido a la instancia de IP o la instancia de IP no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2517">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP instance, or the IP instance is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2518">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2518">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2519">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2519">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2520">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2520">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2521">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2522">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2522">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Leave the multicast group 224.0.0.200. */
#define INTERFACE_INDEX 1
status = nx_ipv4_multicast_interface_leave
                                (&ip, IP_ADDRESS(224,0,0,200),
                                 INTERFACE_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the IP instance has successfully leaves
   the multicast group 244.0.0.200. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2535">nx_packet_allocate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2536">Asignar un paquete del grupo especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2536">Allocate packet from specified pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2537">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_allocate(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG packet_type,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2538">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2539">Este servicio asigna un paquete del grupo especificado y ajusta el puntero antepuesto en el paquete según el tipo de paquete especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2539">This service allocates a packet from the specified pool and adjusts the prepend pointer in the packet according to the type of packet specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2540">Si no hay ningún paquete disponible, el servicio se suspende según la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2540">If no packet is available, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2541">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2542">**pool_ptr**: puntero a un grupo de paquetes creado previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2542">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2543">**packet_ptr**: puntero al puntero del puntero del paquete asignado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2543">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the Pointer of the allocated packet Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2544">**packet_type**: define el tipo de paquete solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2544">**packet_type** Defines the type of packet requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2545">Consulte "Grupos de paquetes" en la página 63 del Capítulo 3 para obtener una lista de los tipos de paquetes admitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2545">See “Packet Pools” on page 63 in Chapter 3 for a list of supported packet types.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2546">**wait_option**: define el tiempo de espera en tics si no hay paquetes disponibles en el grupo de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2546">**wait_option** Defines the wait time in ticks if there are no packets available in the packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2547">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2547">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2548">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2549">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2550">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2550">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2551">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2551">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2552">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Asignación correcta del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2552">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet allocate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET**: (0x01) No hay ningún paquete disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2553">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2554">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) El tamaño de paquete no admite el protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2555">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0A) Tipo de paquete no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2556">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid packet type.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Grupo o puntero de devolución del paquete no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2557">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Opción de espera no válida desde algo que no es un subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2558">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2559">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2560">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR (controladores de red de la aplicación).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2560">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2561">La opción de espera debe ser *NX_NO_WAIT* cuando se usa en ISR o en el contexto del temporizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2561">Wait option must be *NX_NO_WAIT* when used in ISR or in timer context.</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2562">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2562">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2563">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2563">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2564">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2564">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Allocate a new UDP packet from the previously created packet pool
   and suspend for a maximum of 5 timer ticks if the pool is
   empty. */
status = nx_packet_allocate(&pool_0, &packet_ptr,
                            NX_UDP_PACKET, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the newly allocated packet pointer is
   found in the variable packet_ptr. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2571">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2571">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2575">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2575">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2577">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2577">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_copy"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2578">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2578">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2579">Copiar paquete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2579">Copy packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2580">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2580">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_copy(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **new_packet_ptr,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2581">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2582">Este servicio copia la información del paquete proporcionado en uno o varios paquetes nuevos que se asignan desde el grupo de paquetes proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2582">This service copies the information in the supplied packet to one or more new packets that are allocated from the supplied packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2583">Si se realiza correctamente, se devuelve el puntero al nuevo paquete en el destino al que apunta **new_packet_ptr**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2583">If successful, the pointer to the new packet is returned in destination pointed to by **new_packet_ptr**.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2584">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2584">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2585">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2585">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2586">**new_packet_ptr**: puntero al destino en el que se va a devolver el puntero a la nueva copia del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2586">**new_packet_ptr** Pointer to the destination of where to return the pointer to the new copy of the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2587">**pool_ptr**: puntero al grupo de paquetes creado anteriormente que se utiliza para asignar uno o varios paquetes para la copia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2587">**pool_ptr** Pointer to the previously created packet pool that is used to allocate one or more packets for the copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2588">**wait_option**: define cómo espera el servicio si no hay ningún paquete disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2588">**wait_option** Defines how the service waits if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2589">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2589">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2590">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2591">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2592">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2592">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2593">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2593">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2594">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Copia correcta de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2594">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET**: (0x01) El paquete no está disponible para la copia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2595">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Packet not available for copy.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**: (0x12) Error en la copia o el paquete de origen está vacío.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2596">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Empty source packet or copy failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2597">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) El tamaño de paquete no admite el protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2598">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Grupo, paquete o puntero de destino no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2599">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) Puntero de anteposición de paquetes no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2600">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) Puntero de anexión de paquetes no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2601">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Se especificó una opción de espera en la inicialización o en una ISR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2602">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) A wait option was specified in initialization or in an ISR.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2603">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2604">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2604">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2605">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2605">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2607">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2607">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET *new_copy_ptr;

/* Copy packet pointed to by "old_packet_ptr" using packets from
   previously created packet pool_0. */
status = nx_packet_copy(old_packet, &new_copy_ptr, &pool_0, 20);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, new_copy_ptr points to the packet copy. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_append"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2621">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2622">Anexar datos al final del paquete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2622">Append data to end of packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2623">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_append(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *data_start, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2624">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2625">Este servicio anexa datos al final del paquete especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2625">This service appends data to the end of the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2626">El área de datos proporcionada se copia en el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2626">The supplied data area is copied into the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2627">Si no hay suficiente memoria disponible y la característica de paquetes encadenados está habilitada, se asignarán uno o varios paquetes para satisfacer la solicitud.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2627">If there is not enough memory available, and the chained packet feature is enabled, one or more packets will be allocated to satisfy the request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2628">Si la característica de paquetes encadenados no está habilitada, se devuelve *NX_SIZE_ERROR*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2628">If the chained packet feature is not enabled, *NX_SIZE_ERROR* is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2629">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2630">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2630">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2631">**data_start**: puntero al inicio del área de datos del usuario que se va a anexar al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2631">**data_start** Pointer to the start of the user’s data area to append to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2632">**data_size**: tamaño del área de datos del usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2632">**data_size** Size of user’s data area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2633">**pool_ptr**: puntero al grupo de paquetes desde el que se va a asignar otro paquete si no hay suficiente espacio en el paquete actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2633">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool from which to allocate another packet if there is not enough room in the current packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2634">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si no hay ningún paquete disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2634">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if there are no packets available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2635">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2635">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2636">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2637">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2638">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2638">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2639">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2640">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Paquete anexados correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2640">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet append.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET**: (0x01) No hay ningún paquete disponible.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2641">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) El tamaño de paquete no admite el protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2643">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Packet size cannot support protocol.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) El puntero antepuesto es menor que el inicio de la carga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2644">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero anexado es mayor que el final de la carga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2645">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Grupo, paquete o puntero de datos no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2646">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool, packet, or data Pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**: (0x09) Tamaño de datos no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2647">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid data size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Opción de espera no válida desde algo que no es un subproceso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2648">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid wait option from nonthread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2649">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2650">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR (controladores de red de la aplicación)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2650">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2651">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2652">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2653">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2653">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Append "abcd" to the specified packet. */
status = nx_packet_data_append(packet_ptr, "abcd", 4, &pool_0, 5);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the additional four bytes "abcd" have
   been appended to the packet. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_extract_offset"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2667">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2668">Extraer datos de un paquete mediante un desplazamiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2668">Extract data from packet via an offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2669">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2669">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_extract_offset(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG offset,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG buffer_length,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2670">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2670">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2671">Este servicio copia los datos de un paquete de NetX Duo (o cadena de paquetes) a partir del desplazamiento especificado desde el puntero antepuesto del paquete con el tamaño especificado en bytes en el búfer especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2671">This service copies data from a NetX Duo packet (or packet chain) starting at the specified offset from the packet prepend pointer of the specified size in bytes into the specified buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2672">El número de bytes realmente copiados se devuelve en *bytes_copied*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2672">The number of bytes actually copied is returned in *bytes_copied.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2673">Este servicio no quita los datos del paquete ni ajusta el puntero antepuesto u otra información de estado interno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2673">This service does not remove data from the packet, nor does it adjust the prepend pointer or other internal state information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2674">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2675">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete que se va a extraer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2675">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2676">**offset**: desplazamiento desde el puntero antepuesto actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2676">**offset** Offset from the current prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2677">**buffer_start**: puntero al inicio del búfer de guardado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2677">**buffer_start** Pointer to start of save buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2678">**buffer_length**: número de bytes que se van a copiar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2678">**buffer_length** Number of bytes to copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2679">**bytes_copied**: número de bytes copiados realmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2679">**bytes_copied** Number of bytes actually copied</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2680">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2681">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Copia correcta del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2681">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR**: (0x53) Se ha proporcionado un valor de desplazamiento no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2682">**NX_PACKET_OFFSET_ERROR** (0x53) Invalid offset value was supplied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de paquete o puntero de búfer no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2683">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer or buffer pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2684">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2684">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2685">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2685">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2686">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2686">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2687">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2687">No</span></span>

```c
/* Extract 10 bytes from the start of the received packet buffer
   into the specified memory area. */
status = nx_packet_data_extract_offset(my_packet, 0, &data[0], 10,
                                       &bytes_copied) ;
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, 10 bytes were successfully copied into
   the data buffer. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_data_retrieve"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2701">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2702">Recuperar datos de un paquete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2702">Retrieve data from packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2703">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_data_retrieve(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    VOID *buffer_start,
    ULONG *bytes_copied);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2704">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2705">Este servicio copia los datos del paquete proporcionado en el búfer proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2705">This service copies data from the supplied packet into the supplied buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2706">El número real de bytes copiados se devuelve en el destino al que apunta **bytes_copied**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2706">The actual number of bytes copied is returned in the destination pointed to by **bytes_copied**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2707">Tenga en cuenta que este servicio no cambia el estado interno del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2707">Note that this service does not change internal state of the packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2708">Los datos que se recuperan siguen estando disponibles en el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2708">The data being retrieved is still available in the packet.</span></span> 

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2709">*El búfer de destino debe ser lo suficientemente grande como para contener el contenido del paquete. Si no es así, se dañará la memoria, lo que provocará resultados imprevisibles*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2709">*The destination buffer must be large enough to hold the packet's contents. If not, memory will be corrupted causing unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2710">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2710">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2711">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2711">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the source packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2712">**buffer_start**: puntero al inicio del área del búfer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2712">**buffer_start** Pointer to the start of the buffer area.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2713">**bytes_copied**: puntero al destino para el número de bytes copiados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2713">**bytes_copied** Pointer to the destination for the number of bytes copied.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2714">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2715">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Datos del paquete recuperados correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2715">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet data retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**: (0x12) Paquete no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2716">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Invalid packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Paquete, inicio de búfer o puntero de bytes copiados no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2717">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet, buffer start, or bytes copied pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2718">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2719">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2719">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2720">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2720">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2721">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2721">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2722">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2722">Example</span></span>

```c
UCHAR                 buffer[512];
ULONG                 bytes_copied;

/* Retrieve data from packet pointed to by "packet_ptr". */
status = nx_packet_data_retrieve(packet_ptr, buffer, &bytes_copied);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, buffer contains the contents of the
   packet, the size of which is contained in "bytes_copied." */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2737">Obtener la longitud de los datos de un paquete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2738">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2739">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2740">Este servicio obtiene la longitud de los datos del paquete especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2741">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2741">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2742">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2742">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2743">**length**: destino de la longitud del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2744">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2745">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha obtenido correctamente la longitud del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de paquete no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2747">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2748">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2749">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2750">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2750">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2751">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2751">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the length of the data in "my_packet." */
status = nx_packet_length_get(my_packet, &my_length);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, data length is in "my_length". */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2766">Crear un grupo de paquetes en el área de memoria especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2767">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2768">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2769">Este servicio crea un grupo de paquetes del tamaño de paquete especificado en el área de memoria proporcionada por el usuario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2770">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2771">**pool_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control del grupo de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2772">**name**: puntero al nombre de la aplicación para el grupo de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2773">**payload_size**: número de bytes de cada paquete del grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2774">Este valor debe ser de al menos 40 bytes y también debe ser divisible por 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2775">**memory_ptr**: puntero al área de memoria en la que se va a colocar el grupo de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2776">El puntero se debe alinear en un límite ULONG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2777">**memory_size**: tamaño del área de memoria del grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2778">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2779">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Grupo de paquetes creado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de memoria o grupo no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**: (0x09) Tamaño de memoria o bloque no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2783">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2784">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2785">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2786">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2787">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2802">Eliminar un grupo de paquetes creado anteriormente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2802">Delete previously created packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2803">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2803">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT  nx_packet_pool_delete(NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2804">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2804">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2805">Este servicio elimina un grupo de paquetes creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2805">This service deletes a previously created packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2806">NetX Duo comprueba si hay subprocesos suspendidos actualmente en los paquetes del grupo de paquetes y borra la suspensión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2806">NetX Duo checks for any threads currently suspended on packets in the packet pool and clears the suspension.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2807">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2808">**pool_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control del grupo de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2808">**pool_ptr** Packet pool control block pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2809">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2810">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Grupo de paquetes eliminado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de grupo no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2813">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2813">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2814">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2814">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2815">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2815">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2816">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2817">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2817">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created packet pool. */
status = nx_packet_pool_delete(&pool_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   deleted. */
```
