## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2832">Recuperar información acerca de un grupo de paquetes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2833">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2834">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2835">Este servicio recupera información sobre el grupo de paquetes especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2836">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2837">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2838">**pool_ptr**: puntero a un grupo de paquetes creado previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2839">**total_packets**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes del grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2840">**free_packets**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes libres actualmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2841">**empty_pool_requests**: puntero al destino del número total de solicitudes de asignación cuando el grupo estaba vacío.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions**: puntero al destino del número total de suspensiones del grupo vacío.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2843">**invalid_packet_releases**: puntero al destino del número total de liberaciones de paquetes no válidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2844">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2845">**TX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Información del grupo de paquetes recuperada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2848">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2849">Inicialización, subprocesos y temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2850">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2851">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2852">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2867">Establecer la referencia inferior del grupo de paquetes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2868">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2869">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2870">Este servicio configura la referencia inferior del grupo de paquetes especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2871">Una vez establecido el valor de la referencia inferior, TCP o UDP no pondrán en cola los paquetes recibidos si el número de paquetes disponibles en el grupo de paquetes es menor que la referencia inferior del grupo de paquetes, lo que impide que el grupo de paquetes se quede sin paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2872">Este servicio está disponible si la biblioteca de NetX Duo se compila con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2873">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2874">**pool_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control del grupo de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2875">**low_watermark**: valor de la referencia inferior que se va a configurar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2876">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2877">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente el valor de la referencia inferior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de referencia inferior no se ha compilado en NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Puntero de grupo no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2881">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2882">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2883">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2884">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2885">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2900">Liberar un paquete previamente asignado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2902">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2903">Este servicio libera un paquete, incluidos los paquetes adicionales encadenados al paquete especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2904">Si otro subproceso está bloqueado en la asignación de paquetes, se le proporciona el paquete y se reanuda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2905">*La aplicación debe impedir que se libere un paquete más de una vez, ya que si lo hace se producirán resultados imprevisibles*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2906">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2907">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2908">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2909">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Paquete liberado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de paquete no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) El puntero antepuesto es menor que el inicio de la carga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero anexado es mayor que el final de la carga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2932">Liberar un paquete transmitido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2933">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2934">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2935">En el caso de los paquetes que no son TCP, este servicio libera un paquete transmitido, incluidos los paquetes adicionales encadenados al paquete especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2936">Si otro subproceso está bloqueado en la asignación de paquetes, se le proporciona el paquete y se reanuda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2937">En el caso de un paquete TCP transmitido, el paquete se marca como transmitido, pero no se libera hasta que se confirma el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2938">Normalmente, se llama a este servicio desde el controlador de red de la aplicación después de que se transmite un paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2939">*El controlador de red debe quitar el encabezado del soporte físico y ajustar la longitud del paquete antes de llamar a este servicio*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2940">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2941">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2942">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2943">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Paquete transmitido liberado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de paquete no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) El puntero antepuesto es menor que el inicio de la carga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero anexado es mayor que el final de la carga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2947">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2948">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores y controladores de red de la aplicación (incluidos ISR)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2949">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2950">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2951">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2963">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2963">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2964">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2964">nx_packet_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_rarp_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2966">Deshabilitar el protocolo de resolución de direcciones inversa (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2967">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2967">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2968">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2968">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2969">Este servicio deshabilita el componente de RARP de NetX Duo para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2969">This service disables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2970">En el caso de un sistema de host múltiple, este servicio deshabilita RARP en todas las interfaces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2970">For a multihome  system, this service disables RARP on all interfaces.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2971">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2972">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2972">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2973">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2973">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2974">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) RARP deshabilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) RARP no estaba habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP was not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2978">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2979">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2979">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2980">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2980">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2981">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2981">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2982">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2982">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is disabled. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2987">Habilitar el protocolo de resolución de direcciones inversa (RARP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2987">Enable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2988">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2989">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2990">Este servicio habilita el componente de RARP de NetX Duo para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2991">Los componentes de RARP buscan una dirección IP establecida en cero en todas las interfaces de red asociadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2992">Una dirección IP establecida en cero indica que la interfaz todavía no tiene asignación de dirección IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2993">RARP intenta resolver la dirección IP mediante la habilitación del proceso de RARP en esa interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2994">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2995">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2996">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2997">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) RARP habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección IP ya es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) RARP ya estaba habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3002">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3003">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3003">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3004">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3004">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3005">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3005">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3006">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3006">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is enabled and is attempting to
   resolve this IP instance’s address by querying the network. */
```

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3011">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades de RARP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3012">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3013">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3014">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de RARP de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3015">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3016">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3017">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3018">**rarp_requests_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de solicitudes RARP enviadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3019">**rarp_responses_received**: puntero al destino para el número total de respuestas de RARP recibidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages**: puntero al destino para el número total de mensajes no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3021">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3022">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de RARP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3026">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3027">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3028">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3029">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3029">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3030">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3030">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve RARP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_rarp_info_get(&ip_0,
                          &rarp_requests_sent,
                          &rarp_responses_received,
                          &rarp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3075">Enlazar el socket TCP de cliente al puerto TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3076">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3077">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3078">Este servicio enlaza el socket de cliente TCP creado previamente al puerto TCP especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3079">El intervalo de sockets TCP válidos va de 0 a 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3080">Si el puerto TCP especificado no está disponible, el servicio se suspende según la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3081">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3082">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3083">**port**: número de puerto que se va a enlazar (de 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3084">Si el número de puerto es NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), la instancia de IP buscará el siguiente puerto libre y lo utilizará para el enlace.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3085">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si el puerto ya está enlazado a otro socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3086">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3089">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3090">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3091">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket enlazado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**: (0x22) Este socket ya está enlazado a otro puerto TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE**: (0x23) El puerto ya está enlazado a otro socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS**: (0x45) No hay ningún puerto libre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) Puerto no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3100">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3101">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3102">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3103">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3104">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3129">Conectar socket TCP de cliente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3130">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3131">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3132">Este servicio conecta el socket de cliente TCP creado y enlazado previamente al puerto del servidor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3133">Los puertos de servidor TCP válidos oscilan entre 0 y 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3134">Si la conexión no se completa inmediatamente, el servicio se suspende según la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3135">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3136">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3137">**server_ip**: dirección IP del servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3138">**server_port**: número de puerto del servidor al que conectarse (de 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3139">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio mientras se establece la conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3140">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3143">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3144">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3145">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket conectado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket no está enlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**: (0x35) El socket no está en estado cerrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS**: (0x37) No se ha especificado ninguna espera, el intento de conexión está en curso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Interfaz proporcionada no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP del servidor no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) Puerto no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3156">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3157">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3157">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3158">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3158">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3159">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3159">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3160">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3185">Obtener el número de puerto enlazado al socket TCP de cliente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3186">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3187">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3188">Este servicio recupera el número de puerto asociado al socket, lo que resulta útil para encontrar el puerto asignado por NetX Duo en situaciones en las que se especificó NX_ANY_PORT en el momento en que se enlazó el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3189">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3190">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3191">**port_ptr**: puntero al destino del número de puerto devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3192">Los números de puerto válidos son del 1 al 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3193">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3194">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket enlazado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) Este socket no está enlazado a un puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket o puntero de devolución de puerto no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3199">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3200">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3200">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3201">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3201">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3202">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3202">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3203">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3203">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of previously created and bound client
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(&client_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3228">Desenlazar el socket de cliente TCP del puerto TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3228">Unbind TCP client socket from TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3229">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3230">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3231">Este servicio libera el enlace entre el socket de cliente TCP y un puerto TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3232">Si hay otros subprocesos en espera de enlazar otro socket al mismo número de puerto, el primer subproceso suspendido se enlaza a este puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3233">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3234">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3235">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3236">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket desenlazado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket no estaba enlazado a ningún puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**: (0x35) El socket no se ha desconectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket has not been disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3242">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3243">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3244">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3245">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3246">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind a previously created and bound client TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is no longer
   bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3271">Habilitar el componente de TCP de NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3272">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3273">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3274">Este servicio habilita el componente del protocolo de control de transmisión (TCP) de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3275">Una vez habilitado, la aplicación puede establecer conexiones TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3276">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3277">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3278">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3279">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) TCP habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) TCP ya está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3283">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3284">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3285">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3286">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3287">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3312">Buscar el siguiente puerto TCP disponible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3313">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3314">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3315">Este servicio intenta buscar un puerto TCP libre (sin enlazar) a partir del puerto proporcionado por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3316">La lógica de búsqueda volverá a empezar si la búsqueda alcanza el valor máximo de puerto de 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3317">Si la búsqueda tiene éxito, se devuelve el puerto libre en la variable a la que apunta *free_port_ptr*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3318">*Se puede llamar a este servicio desde otro subproceso y hacer que se devuelva el mismo puerto. Para evitar esta condición de carrera, es posible que la aplicación desee colocar este servicio y el enlace del socket de cliente real bajo la protección de una exclusión mutua*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3319">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3320">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3321">**port**: número de puerto en el que se va a iniciar la búsqueda (de 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3322">**free_port_ptr**: puntero al valor devuelto del puerto libre de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3323">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3323">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3359">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades de TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3360">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3361">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3362">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de TCP de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3363">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3363">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3364">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3364">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3365">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3365">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3366">**tcp_packets_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes TCP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de bytes TCP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3368">**tcp_packets_received**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3369">**tcp_bytes_received**: puntero al destino del número total de bytes TCP recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid TCP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP recibidos eliminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP con errores de suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3373">**tcp_connections**: puntero al destino del número total de conexiones TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3373">**tcp_connections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3374">**tcp_disconnections**: puntero al destino del número total de desconexiones TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP disconnections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped**: puntero al destino del número total de conexiones TCP eliminadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP retransmitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets retransmitted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3377">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3377">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3378">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3380">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3381">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3382">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3382">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3383">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3383">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3384">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3384">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3385">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3385">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3386">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3386">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_info_get(&ip_0,
                         &tcp_packets_sent,
                         &tcp_bytes_sent,
                         &tcp_packets_received,
                         &tcp_bytes_received,
                         &tcp_invalid_packets,
                         &tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &tcp_checksum_errors,
                         &tcp_connections,
                         &tcp_disconnections
                         &tcp_connections_dropped,
                         &tcp_retransmit_packets);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3411">Aceptar conexión TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3412">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3413">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3414">Este servicio acepta (o se prepara para aceptar) una solicitud de conexión de socket de cliente TCP para un puerto que se configuró previamente para la escucha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3415">Este servicio se puede llamar inmediatamente después de que la aplicación llame al servicio de escucha o de reescucha, o después de que se llame a la rutina de devolución de llamada de escucha cuando la conexión de cliente esté realmente presente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3416">Si no se puede establecer una conexión de inmediato, el servicio se suspende según la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3417">*La aplicación debe llamar a **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** cuando ya no se necesite la conexión para quitar el enlace del socket de servidor al puerto del servidor*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3418">*Se llama a las rutinas de devolución de llamada de la aplicación desde el subproceso auxiliar de IP.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3419">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3420">**socket_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control del socket de servidor TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3438">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```
