## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_listen"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3462">nx_tcp_server_socket_listen</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3463">Habilitar la escucha para la conexión de cliente en el puerto TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3463">Enable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3464">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3464">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT listen_queue_size,
    VOID (*listen_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3465">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3466">Este servicio habilita la escucha de una solicitud de conexión de cliente en el puerto TCP especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3467">Cuando se recibe una solicitud de conexión de cliente, el socket de servidor proporcionado se enlaza al puerto especificado y se llama a la función de devolución de llamada de escucha proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3468">El procesamiento de la rutina de devolución de llamada de escucha depende completamente de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3469">Puede contener lógica para reactivar un subproceso de la aplicación que posteriormente realiza una operación de aceptación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3470">Si la aplicación ya tiene un subproceso suspendido en el procesamiento de aceptación para este socket, es posible que la rutina de devolución de llamada de escucha no sea necesaria.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3471">Si la aplicación desea controlar conexiones de cliente adicionales en el mismo puerto, se debe llamar a ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** con un socket disponible (un socket en estado CLOSED) para la conexión siguiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3472">Hasta que se llame al servicio de reescucha, las conexiones de cliente adicionales se ponen en cola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3473">Cuando se supera la profundidad máxima de la cola, se elimina la solicitud de conexión más antigua para poner en cola la nueva solicitud de conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3474">Este servicio especifica la profundidad máxima de la cola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3475">*Se llama a las rutinas de devolución de llamada de la aplicación desde el subproceso auxiliar de IP.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3476">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3477">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3477">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3478">**port**: número de puerto en el que se va a escuchar (de 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3479">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket que se va a utilizar para la conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3480">**listen_queue_size**: número de solicitudes de conexión de cliente que se pueden poner en cola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3481">**listen_callback**: función de la aplicación a la que se llamará cuando se reciba la conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3482">Si se especifica un valor NULL, se deshabilita la característica de devolución de llamada de escucha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3483">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3483">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3484">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Escucha de puerto TCP habilitada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port listen enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN**: (0x33) No hay más estructuras de solicitud de escucha disponibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) No more listen request structures are available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3486">La constante NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS del archivo **_nx_api.h_** define el número de solicitudes de escucha activas posibles.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3486">The constant NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS in **_nx_api.h_** defines how many active listen requests are possible.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**: (0x35) El socket de servidor proporcionado no está en estado cerrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**: (0x22) El socket de servidor proporcionado ya está enlazado a un puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN**: (0x34) Ya existe una solicitud de escucha activa para este puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) There is already an active listen request for this port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) Puerto especificado no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) IP o puntero de socket no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket.
   This example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

      "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
      initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created

   */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                        Socket",
                        NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                        NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                        NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
      each client and then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
           request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection
           to complete. */
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
           if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

              /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                 message. */
              nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                 NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

              /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
              nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                    sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                    &my_pool,
                                    NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {
                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }
         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
         again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);
     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3523">Reescuchar la conexión de cliente en el puerto TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3523">Re-listen for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3524">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3524">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3525">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3526">Se llama a este servicio después de que se haya recibido una conexión en un puerto que se configuró anteriormente para la escucha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3526">This service is called after a connection has been received on a port that was setup previously for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3527">El propósito principal de este servicio es proporcionar un nuevo socket de servidor para la siguiente conexión de cliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3527">The main purpose of this service is to provide a new server socket for the next client connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3528">Si una solicitud de conexión se pone en cola, la conexión se procesará inmediatamente durante esta llamada al servicio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3528">If a connection request is queued, the connection will be processed immediately during this service call.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3529">*También se llama a la misma rutina de devolución de llamada especificada por la solicitud de escucha original cuando existe una conexión para este nuevo socket de servidor*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3529">*The same callback routine specified by the original listen request is also called when a connection is present for this new server socket*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3530">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3531">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3531">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3532">**port**: número de puerto en el que se va a reescuchar (de 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3532">**port** Port number to re-listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3533">**socket_ptr**: socket que se va a usar para la siguiente conexión de cliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket to use for the next client connection.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3534">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3534">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3535">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Reescucha de puerto TCP correcta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port re-listen.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**: (0x35) El socket de servidor proporcionado no está en estado cerrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**: (0x22) El socket de servidor proporcionado ya está enlazado a un puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN**: (0x47) Ya hay un puntero de socket válido para este puerto o el puerto especificado no tiene una solicitud de escucha activa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) There is already a valid socket pointer for this port or the port specified does not have a listen request active.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING**: (0x48) Igual que NX_SUCCESS, salvo que había una solicitud de conexión en cola y se procesó durante esta llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) Same as NX_SUCCESS, except there was a queued connection request and it was processed during this call.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) Puerto especificado no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Dirección IP o puntero de devolución de llamada de escucha no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or listen callback pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3548">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3575">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3575">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3576">Este servicio quita la asociación entre este socket de servidor y el puerto del servidor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3576">This service removes the association between this server socket and the specified server port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3577">La aplicación debe llamar a este servicio después de una desconexión o después de una llamada de aceptación incorrecta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3577">The application must call this service after a disconnection or after an unsuccessful accept call.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3578">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3579">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket de servidor configurado previamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3579">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously setup server socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3580">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3580">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3581">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Finalización correcta de la aceptación del socket de servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3581">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful server socket unaccept.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE**: (0x36) El socket de servidor está en un estado inadecuado y probablemente no esté desconectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) Server socket is in an improper state, and is probably not disconnected.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3587">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3587">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3588">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3588">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3590">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3590">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL        my_pool;
NX_IP                 my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET         server_socket;
void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
   doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET  *my_packet;
UINT       status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
      of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
     "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
   */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                         Socket",NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                         NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,NX_NULL,
                         port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye"
       to
       each client and then disconnecting. */
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request
           is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {
             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet,
                      "Hello_and_Goodbye",sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                      &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
       }

       /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even
          if disconnect or accept fails. */
       nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

      /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
      nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
    }

    /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

    /* Delete the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3667">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El servicio se ejecuta correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3667">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3668">Se devuelve el número de bytes disponibles para la lectura al autor de llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3668">Number of bytes available for read is returned to the caller.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3702">Crear un cliente TCP o un socket de servidor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3702">Create TCP client or server socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3703">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    CHAR *name, 
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG window_size,
    VOID (*urgent_data_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr),
    VOID (*disconnect_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3704">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3705">Este servicio crea un cliente TCP o un socket de servidor para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3705">This service creates a TCP client or server socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3706">*Se llama a las rutinas de devolución de llamada de la aplicación desde el subproceso asociado a esta instancia de IP.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3706">*Application callback routines are called from the thread associated with this IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3707">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3708">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3708">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3709">**socket_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control del nuevo socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3709">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new TCP socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3710">**name**: nombre de la aplicación para este socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3710">**name** Application name for this TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3711">**type_of_service**: define el tipo de servicio para la transmisión. Los valores válidos son los siguientes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3711">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY**: (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA**: (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE**: (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST**: (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3717">**fragment**: especifica si se permite o no la fragmentación de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3717">**fragment** Specifies whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3718">Si se especifica NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0), se permite la fragmentación de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3718">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3719">Si se especifica NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000), se deshabilita la fragmentación de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3719">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3720">**time_to_live**: especifica el valor de 8 bits que define el número de enrutadores que puede pasar este paquete antes de que se descarte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3720">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3721">NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE especifica el valor predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3721">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3722">**window_size**: define el número máximo de bytes permitidos en la cola de recepción de este socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3722">**window_size** Defines the maximum number of bytes allowed in the receive queue for this socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3723">**urgent_data_callback**: función de la aplicación a la que se llama cada vez que se detectan datos urgentes en el flujo de recepción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Application function that is called whenever urgent data is detected in the receive stream.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3724">Si este valor es NX_NULL, se omiten los datos urgentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3724">If this value is NX_NULL, urgent data is ignored.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3725">**disconnect_callback**: función de la aplicación a la que se llama siempre que el socket emite una desconexión en el otro extremo de la conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3725">**disconnect_callback** Application function that is called whenever a disconnect is issued by the socket at the other end of the connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3726">Si este valor es NX_NULL, se deshabilita la función de devolución de llamada de desconexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3726">If this value is NX_NULL, the disconnect callback function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3727">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3727">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3728">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket de cliente TCP creado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP client socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0A) Tipo de servicio, fragmento, tamaño de ventana u opción de período de vida no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, invalid window size, or time-tolive option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) IP o puntero de socket no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3733">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3733">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3734">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3734">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3735">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3735">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3736">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3736">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3737">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3737">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a TCP client socket on the previously created IP instance,
   with normal delivery, IP fragmentation enabled, 0x80 time to
   live, a 200-byte receive window, no urgent callback routine, and
   the "client_disconnect" routine to handle disconnection initiated
   from the other end of the connection. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_create(&ip_0, &client_socket,
                             "Client Socket",
                             NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                             0x80, 200, NX_NULL
                             client_disconnect);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is created and ready
   to be bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3762">Eliminar un socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3762">Delete TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3763">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_delete(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3764">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3765">Este servicio elimina un socket TCP creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3765">This service deletes a previously created TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3766">Si el socket sigue enlazado o conectado, el servicio devuelve un código de error.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3766">If the socket is still bound or connected, the service returns an error code.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3767">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3767">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3769">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3770">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket eliminado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED**: (0x27) No se ha creado el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) Socket was not created.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND**: (0x42) El socket sigue estando enlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3805">Desconectar las conexiones de socket de cliente y servidor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3805">Disconnect client and server socket connections</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3806">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3806">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3807">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3808">Este servicio desconecta una conexión de socket de servidor o cliente establecida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3808">This service disconnects an established client or server socket connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3809">Una desconexión de un socket de servidor debe ir seguida de una solicitud de desaceptación, mientras que un socket de cliente que se desconecta se deja en un estado listo para otra solicitud de conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3809">A disconnect of a server socket should be followed by an unaccept request, while a client socket that is disconnected is left in a state ready for another connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3810">Si el proceso de desconexión no puede finalizar inmediatamente, el servicio se suspende según la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3810">If the disconnect process cannot finish immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3811">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3812">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de socket de servidor o cliente conectada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3812">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3813">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio mientras la desconexión está en curso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3813">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the disconnection is in progress.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3814">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3814">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3817">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3817">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3818">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3818">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3819">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket desconectado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket disconnect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**: (0x38) El socket especificado no está conectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Specified socket is not connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS**: (0x37) La desconexión está en curso, no se especificó ninguna espera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Disconnect is in progress, no wait was specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3826">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3827">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3827">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3828">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3828">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3829">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3829">Yes</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3830">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3830">Example</span></span> 

```c
/* Disconnect from a previously established connection and wait a
   maximum of 400 timer ticks. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&client_socket, 400);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously connected socket (either
   as a result of the client socket connect or the server accept) is
   disconnected. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3855">Instalar la función de devolución de llamada de notificación de finalización de la desconexión TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3855">Install TCP disconnect complete notify callback function</span></span>
 
### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3856">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3856">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_disconnect_complete_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3857">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3858">Este servicio registra una función de devolución de llamada que se invoca después de que se complete una operación de desconexión del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3858">This service registers a callback function which is invoked after a socket disconnect operation is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3859">La función de devolución de llamada de finalización de la desconexión del socket TCP está disponible si NetX Duo se compila con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3859">The TCP socket disconnect complete callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3860">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3861">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de socket de servidor o cliente conectada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3861">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify**: función de devolución de llamada que se va a instalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** The callback function to be installed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3863">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3863">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3864">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La función de devolución de llamada se ha registrado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registered the callback function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de notificación extendida no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo. NX_PTR_ERROR\*\*: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La característica de TCP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3868">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3868">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3886">Establecer la función de devolución de llamada de notificación de establecimiento de TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3886">Set TCP establish notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3887">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3887">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_establish_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3888">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3889">Este servicio registra una función de devolución de llamada a la que se llama después de que un socket TCP realice una conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3889">This service registers a callback function, which is called after a TCP socket makes a connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3890">La función de devolución de llamada de establecimiento de socket TCP está disponible si se compila NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3890">The TCP socket establish callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3891">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3892">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de socket de servidor o cliente conectada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3892">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3893">**tcp_establish_notify**: función de devolución de llamada invocada después de establecer una conexión TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback function invoked after a TCP connection is established.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3894">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3894">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3895">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La función de notificación se ha establecido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sets the notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de notificación extendida no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La aplicación no ha habilitado TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP has not been enabled by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3900">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3901">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3901">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3902">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3902">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3903">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3903">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3904">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3904">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer "callback" as the notify function NetX
   Duo will call when the connection is in the established state. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3919">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades del socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3919">Retrieve information about TCP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3920">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3920">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_socket_state,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_window,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_window);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3921">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3922">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de socket TCP de la instancia de socket TCP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3922">This service retrieves information about TCP socket activities for the specified TCP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3923">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3923">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3924">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3925">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3925">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3926">**tcp_packets_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes TCP enviados en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de bytes TCP enviados en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3928">**tcp_packets_received**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP recibidos en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3929">**tcp_bytes_received**: puntero al destino del número total de bytes TCP recibidos en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets**: puntero al destino del número total de retransmisiones de paquetes TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packet retransmissions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3931">**tcp_packets_queued**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP en cola en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued TCP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes TCP con errores de suma de comprobación en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3933">**tcp_socket_state**: puntero al destino del estado actual del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pointer to destination of the socket’s current state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes transmitidos que están en la cola en espera de confirmación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pointer to destination of the total number of transmit packets still queued waiting for ACK.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3935">**tcp_transmit_window**: puntero al destino del tamaño de la ventana de transmisión actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pointer to destination of the current transmit window size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3936">**tcp_receive_window**: puntero al destino del tamaño de la ventana de recepción actual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pointer to destination of the current receive window size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3937">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3937">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3938">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información del socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3942">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3943">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3944">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3946">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3946">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP socket information from previously created
   socket_0.*/
status = nx_tcp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &tcp_packets_sent,
                                &tcp_bytes_sent,
                                &tcp_packets_received,
                                &tcp_bytes_received,
                                &tcp_retransmit_packets,
                                &tcp_packets_queued,
                                &tcp_checksum_errors,
                                &tcp_socket_state,
                                &tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
                                &tcp_transmit_window,
                                &tcp_receive_window);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP socket information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3971">Obtener MSS del socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3971">Get MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3972">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3972">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3973">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3973">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3974">Este servicio recupera el tamaño máximo de segmento (MSS) local del socket especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3974">This service retrieves the specified socket's local Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3975">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3976">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3976">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3977">**mss**: destino para el valor de MSS devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3977">**mss** Destination for returning MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3978">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3978">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3979">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) MSS obtenido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Socket o puntero de destino del valor de MSS no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) TCP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada no es un subproceso ni una inicialización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3983">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3983">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3984">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3985">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3985">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3986">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3986">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-3987">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-3987">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS for the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket's current MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4002">Obtener MSS del socket TCP del nodo del mismo nivel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4002">Get MSS of the peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4003">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4003">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4004">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4004">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4005">Este servicio recupera el tamaño máximo de segmento (MSS) anunciado por el socket del nodo del mismo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4005">This service retrieves the Maximum Segment Size (MSS) advertised by the peer socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4006">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4006">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4007">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket creado y conectado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4007">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4008">**mss**: destino para devolver el valor de MSS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4008">**mss** Destination for returning the MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4009">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4009">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4010">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) MSS del nodo del mismo nivel obtenido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful peer MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Socket o puntero de destino del valor de MSS no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) TCP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada no es un subproceso ni una inicialización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4014">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4015">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4015">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4016">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4016">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4017">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4017">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4018">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4018">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS of the connected peer to the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket peer’s advertised MSS value. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4033">Establecer MSS del socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4033">Set MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4034">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4034">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4035">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4036">Este servicio establece el tamaño máximo de segmento (MSS) del socket especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4036">This service sets the specified socket's Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4037">Tenga en cuenta que el valor de MSS debe estar dentro de la MTU de IP de la interfaz de red, lo que permite espacio para los encabezados IP y TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4037">Note the MSS value must be within the network interface IP MTU, allowing room for IP and TCP headers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4038">Se debe usar este servicio antes de que un socket TCP inicie el proceso de conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4038">This service should be used before a TCP socket starts the connection process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4039">Si se usa el servicio después de establecer una conexión TCP, el nuevo valor no tiene ningún efecto en la conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4039">If the service is used after a TCP connection is established, the new value has no effect on the connection.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4040">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4041">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4041">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4042">**mss**: valor de MSS que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4042">**mss** Value of MSS to set.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4043">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4043">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4044">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) MSS establecido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR**: (0x09) El valor de MSS especificado es demasiado grande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Specified MSS value is too large.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**: (0x38) No se ha establecido la conexión TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP connection has not been established</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) TCP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada no es un subproceso ni una inicialización.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4050">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4051">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4052">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4052">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4053">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4053">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4054">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4054">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the MSS of the socket "my_socket" to 1000 bytes. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(&my_socket, 1000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the MSS of "my_socket" is 1000 bytes. */
```
