## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4069">Recuperar información sobre el socket TCP del nodo del mismo nivel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4069">Retrieve information about peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4070">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4071">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4072">Este servicio recupera la información de puerto y dirección IP del nodo del mismo nivel para el socket TCP conectado mediante la red IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4072">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over IPv4 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4073">El servicio equivalente que también admite una red IPv6 es ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4073">The equivalent service that also supports IPv6 network is ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4074">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4075">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de socket TCP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4075">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4076">**peer_ip_address**: puntero al destino de la dirección IP del nodo del mismo nivel, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4076">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to destination for peer IP address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4077">**peer_port**: puntero al destino del número de puerto del nodo del mismo nivel, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4077">**peer_port** Pointer to destination for peer port number, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4078">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4078">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4079">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El servicio se ejecuta correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4080">El número de puerto y la dirección IP del nodo del mismo nivel se devuelven al autor de llamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4080">Peer IP address and port number are returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**: (0x38) El socket no está en estado conectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Punteros no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) TCP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4088">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4088">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4089">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4089">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Obtain peer IP address and port on the specified TCP socket. */

                                     &peer_port);

/* If status = NX_SUCCESS, the data was successfully obtained. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4104">Establecer la función de notificación de la cola de transmisión de TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4104">Set the TCP transmit queue notify function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4105">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(
              NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
              VOID(*tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4106">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4107">Este servicio establece la función de notificación de la actualización de la profundidad de la cola de transmisión especificada por la aplicación, a la que se llama cada vez que el socket especificado determina que ha liberado paquetes de la cola de transmisión, de modo que la profundidad de la cola ya no supera su límite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4107">This service sets the transmit queue depth update notify function specified by the application, which is called whenever the specified socket determines that it has released packets from the transmit queue such that the queue depth is no longer exceeding its limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4108">Si una aplicación estuviera bloqueada en la transmisión debido a la profundidad de la cola, la función de devolución de llamada sirve como una notificación a la aplicación de que puede iniciar la transmisión de nuevo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4108">If an application would be blocked on transmit due to queue depth, the callback function serves as a notification to the application that it may start transmitting again.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4109">Este servicio solo está disponible si se compila la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4109">This service is available only if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4110">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4110">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4111">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la estructura del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4111">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the socket structure</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify**: función de notificación que se va a instalar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** The notify function to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4113">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4113">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4114">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha instalado correctamente la función de notificación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de notificación de la profundidad de la cola del socket TCP no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The TCP socket queue depth notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero no válido al bloque de control del socket o a la función de notificación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to the socket control block or the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La característica de TCP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4119">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4119">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4120">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4120">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4121">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4121">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4122">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4122">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4123">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4123">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* Notify the application to resume sending. */

}
/* Install the TCP transmit queue notify function .*/
status = nxd_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(&tcp_socket,
                                  tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the callback function is successfully
   installed. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4138">Recibir datos de un socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4138">Receive data from TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4139">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4139">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4140">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4141">Este servicio recibe datos TCP del socket especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4141">This service receives TCP data from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4142">Si no hay datos en cola en el socket especificado, el autor de llamada se suspende en función de la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4142">If no data is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4143">*Si se devuelve NX_SUCCESS, la aplicación es responsable de liberar el paquete recibido después de que ya no se necesite*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4143">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4144">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4145">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4145">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4146">**packet_ptr**: puntero al puntero del paquete TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4146">**packet_ptr** Pointer to TCP packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4147">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si no hay ningún dato en la cola actualmente en este socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4147">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if do data are currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4148">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4148">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4151">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4151">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4152">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4152">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4153">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Datos del socket recibidos correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket data receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket todavía no está enlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound yet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET**: (0x01) No se ha recibido ningún dato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No data received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**: (0x38) El socket ya no está conectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) The socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Socket o puntero de paquete devuelto no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4161">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4161">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4162">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4162">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4163">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4163">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4164">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4164">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4165">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4165">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from the previously created and connected TCP
   client socket. If no packet is available, wait for 200 timer
   ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive(&client_socket, &packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received packet is pointed to by
   "packet_ptr". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4190">Notificar a la aplicación sobre los paquetes recibidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4190">Notify application of received packets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4191">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4191">Prototype</span></span>   

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    VOID (*tcp_receive_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4192">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4192">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4193">Este servicio configura el puntero de la función de notificación de recepción con la función de devolución de llamada especificada por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4193">This service configures the receive notify function pointer with the callback function specified by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4194">A continuación, se llama a esta función de devolución de llamada siempre que se reciban uno o varios paquetes en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4194">This callback function is then called whenever one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4195">Si se proporciona un puntero NX_NULL, la función de notificación se deshabilita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4195">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4196">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4197">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4197">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4198">**tcp_receive_notify**: puntero a la función de devolución de llamada de la aplicación a la que se llama cuando se reciben uno o varios paquetes en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4199">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4199">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4200">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Notificación correcta de recepción en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive notify.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La característica de TCP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4204">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4205">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4205">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4206">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4206">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4207">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4207">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4208">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4208">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "client_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(&client_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever one or more packets are received for
   "client_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4223">Enviar datos mediante un socket TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4223">Send data through a TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4224">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4224">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_send(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4225">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4225">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4226">Este servicio envía datos TCP mediante un socket TCP previamente conectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4226">This service sends TCP data through a previously connected TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4227">Si el último tamaño de ventana anunciado del receptor es menor que esta solicitud, el servicio se suspende opcionalmente en función de la opción de espera especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4227">If the receiver's last advertised window size is less than this request, the service optionally suspends based on the wait option specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4228">Este servicio garantiza que no se envíen datos de paquetes mayores que el valor de MSS a la capa IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4228">This service guarantees that no packet data larger than MSS is sent to the IP layer.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4229">*A menos que se devuelva un error, la aplicación no debe liberar el paquete después de esta llamada. Si lo hace, se producirán resultados imprevisibles, ya que el controlador de red también intentará liberar el paquete después de la transmisión*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4229">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will also try to release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4230">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4231">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP conectada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4231">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4232">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete de datos TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4233">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si la solicitud es mayor que el tamaño de la ventana del receptor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4233">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the request is greater than the window size of the receiver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4234">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4234">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4237">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4237">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4238">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4239">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Envío correcto del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket no estaba enlazado a ningún puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**: (0x50) No se ha encontrado ninguna interfaz de salida adecuada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**: (0x38) El socket ya no está conectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW**: (0x39) La solicitud es mayor que el tamaño en bytes anunciado de la ventana del receptor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) Request is greater than receiver’s advertised window size in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**: (0x12) No se ha asignado el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH**: (0x49) Se ha alcanzado la profundidad máxima de la cola de transmisión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Maximum transmit queue depth has been reached.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero para anexar paquetes no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) El puntero de anteposición del paquete no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Packet prepend pointer is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4252">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4252">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4253">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4253">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4254">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4254">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4255">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4255">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4256">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4256">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a packet out on the previously created and connected TCP
   socket. If the receive window on the other side of the connection
   is less than the packet size, wait 200 timer ticks before giving
   up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been sent! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_state_wait"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4281">Esperar a que el socket TCP entre en un estado específico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4281">Wait for TCP socket to enter specific state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4282">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4282">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT desired_state,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4283">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4283">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4284">Este servicio espera a que el socket entre en el estado deseado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4284">This service waits for the socket to enter the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4285">Si el socket no está en el estado deseado, el servicio se suspende según la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4285">If the socket is not in the desired state, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4286">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4286">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4287">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket TCP conectada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4287">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4288">**desired_state**: estado TCP deseado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4288">**desired_state** Desired TCP state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4289">Los estados de socket TCP válidos se definen de la siguiente manera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4289">Valid TCP socket states are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4301">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si el estado solicitado no está presente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4301">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested state is not present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4302">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4302">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4304">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4304">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4305">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4305">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4306">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Espera de estado correcta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful state wait.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**: (0x43) El estado no está presente en el tiempo de espera especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) State not present within the specified wait time.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0X0A) El estado del socket deseado no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) The desired socket state is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4313">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4314">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4314">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4315">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4315">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4316">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4316">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4317">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4317">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 300 timer ticks for the previously created socket to enter
   the established state in the TCP state machine. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(&client_socket,
                                  NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket is now in the established
   state! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4342">Instalar una devolución de llamada para el estado de tiempo de espera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4342">Install callback for timed wait state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4343">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4343">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_timed_wait_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4344">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4345">Este servicio registra una función de devolución de llamada que se invoca cuando el socket TCP está en estado de tiempo de espera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4345">This service registers a callback function which is invoked when the TCP socket is in timed wait state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4346">Para usar este servicio, se debe compilar la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4346">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4347">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4348">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de socket de servidor o cliente conectada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4348">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback**: función de devolución de llamada de tiempo de espera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** The timed wait callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4350">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4350">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4351">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El socket de la función de devolución de llamada se ha registrado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registers the callback function socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La biblioteca de NetX Duo se ha compilado sin la característica de notificación extendida habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) NetX Duo library is built without the extended notify feature enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La característica de TCP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4356">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4357">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4357">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4358">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4359">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4360">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the timed wait callback function */
nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4375">Configurar los parámetros de transmisión del socket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4375">Configure socket's transmit parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4376">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG max_queue_depth,
    ULONG timeout,
    ULONG max_retries,
    ULONG timeout_shift);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4377">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4378">Este servicio configura varios parámetros de transmisión del socket TCP especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4378">This service configures various transmit parameters of the specified TCP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4379">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4379">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4380">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket TCP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4380">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4381">**max_queue_depth**: número máximo de paquetes que se pueden poner en cola para su transmisión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4381">**max_queue_depth** Maximum number of packets allowed to be queued for transmission.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4382">**timeout**: número de tics del temporizador de ThreadX que se espera una confirmación antes de que se vuelva a enviar el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4382">**timeout** Number of ThreadX timer ticks an ACK is waited for before the packet is sent again.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4383">**max_retries**: número máximo de reintentos permitidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4383">**max_retries** Maximum number of retries allowed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4384">**timeout_shift**: valor para desplazar el tiempo de espera de cada reintento subsiguiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4384">**timeout_shift** Value to shift the timeout for each subsequent retry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4385">Un valor de 0 da como resultado el mismo tiempo de espera entre reintentos sucesivos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4385">A value of 0, results in the same timeout between successive retries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4386">Un valor de 1 duplica el tiempo de espera entre reintentos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4386">A value of 1, doubles the timeout between retries.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4387">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4387">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4388">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket de transmisión configurado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit socket configure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0a) Opción de profundidad de la cola no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid queue depth option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La característica de TCP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4393">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4394">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4394">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4395">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4395">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4396">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4397">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4397">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure the "client_socket" for a maximum transmit queue depth of
   12, 100 tick timeouts, a maximum of 20 retries, and a timeout double
   on each successive retry. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(&client_socket,12,100,20,1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket’s transmit retry has been
   configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4412">Notificar a la aplicación las actualizaciones de tamaño de la ventana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4412">Notify application of window size updates</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4413">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_window_update_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4414">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4415">Este servicio instala una rutina de devolución de llamada de actualización de la ventana del socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4415">This service installs a socket window update callback routine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4416">Se llama a esta rutina automáticamente cada vez que el socket especificado recibe un paquete que indica un aumento en el tamaño de la ventana del host remoto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4416">This routine is called automatically whenever the specified socket receives a packet indicating an increase in the window size of the remote host.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4417">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4417">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4418">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket TCP creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4418">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify**: rutina de devolución de llamada a la que se llamará cuando cambie el tamaño de la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback routine to be called when the window size changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4420">Un valor NULL deshabilita la actualización de cambios de la ventana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4420">A value of NULL disables the window change update.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4421">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4421">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4422">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La rutina de devolución de llamada se ha instalado en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Callback routine is installed on the socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Punteros no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) La característica de TCP no está habilitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4426">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4427">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4427">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4428">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4428">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4429">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4429">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4430">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4430">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer to the windows update callback after creating the
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(&data_socket,
                                                my_windows_update_callback);

/* Define the window callback function in the host application. */
void my_windows_update_callback(&data_socket)
{

/* Process update on increase TCP transmit socket window size. */
   return;
}
```

## <a name="nx_udp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4444">nx_udp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4444">nx_udp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4445">Habilitar el componente de UDP de NetX Duo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4445">Enable UDP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4446">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4446">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4447">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4448">Este servicio habilita el componente del protocolo de datagramas de usuario (UDP) de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4448">This service enables the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4449">Una vez habilitado, la aplicación puede enviar y recibir datagramas UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4449">After enabled, UDP datagrams may be sent and received by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4450">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4450">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4451">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4451">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4452">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4452">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4453">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) UDP habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4453">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4454">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4455">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) Este componente ya se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4456">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4457">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4457">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4458">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4458">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4459">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4459">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4460">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4460">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4461">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4461">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable UDP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP is now enabled on the specified IP
   instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4484">nx_udp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4485">Buscar el siguiente puerto UDP disponible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4485">Find next available UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4486">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4486">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4487">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4488">Este servicio busca un puerto UDP libre (sin enlazar) a partir del número de puerto proporcionado por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4488">This service looks for a free UDP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4489">La lógica de búsqueda volverá a empezar si la búsqueda alcanza el valor máximo de puerto de 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4489">The search logic will wrap around if the search reaches the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4490">Si la búsqueda tiene éxito, se devuelve el puerto libre en la variable a la que apunta free_port_ptr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4490">If the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by free_port_ptr.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4491">*Se puede llamar a este servicio desde otro subproceso y puede hacer que se devuelva el mismo puerto. Para evitar esta condición de carrera, es posible que la aplicación desee colocar este servicio y el enlace de socket real bajo la protección de una exclusión mutua*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4491">*This service can be called from another thread and can have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4492">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4493">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4493">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4494">**port**: número de puerto para iniciar la búsqueda (de 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4494">**port** Port number to start search (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4495">**free_port_ptr**: puntero a la variable de devolución del puerto libre de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4495">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4496">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4496">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4497">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha encontrado un puerto libre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4497">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS**: (0x45) No se ha encontrado ningún puerto libre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4498">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4499">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4500">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4501">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) El número de puerto especificado no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4502">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4503">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4504">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4504">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4505">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4505">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4506">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4506">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4507">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4507">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free UDP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_udp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS pointer, "free_port" identifies the next
   free UDP port on the IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4530">nx_udp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4531">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades de UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4531">Retrieve information about UDP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4532">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4532">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4533">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4534">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de UDP de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4534">This service retrieves information about UDP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4535">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4535">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4536">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4537">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4537">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4538">**udp_packets_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes UDP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4538">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4539">**udp_bytes_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de bytes UDP enviados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4539">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4540">**udp_packets_received**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes UDP recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4540">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4541">**udp_bytes_received**: puntero al destino del número total de bytes UDP recibidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4541">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4542">**udp_invalid_packets**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes UDP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4542">**udp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid UDP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes UDP recibidos eliminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4543">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4544">**udp_checksum_errors**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes UDP con errores de suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4544">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4545">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4546">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información de UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4546">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4547">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4548">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4549">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4550">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4551">Inicialización, subprocesos y temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4551">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4552">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4553">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4554">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4554">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_udp_info_get(&ip_0, &udp_packets_sent,
                         &udp_bytes_sent,
                         &udp_packets_received,
                         &udp_bytes_received,
                         &udp_invalid_packets,
                         &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4577">nx_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4578">Extraer parámetros de red de un paquete UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4578">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4579">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4579">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4580">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4580">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4581">Este servicio extrae los parámetros de red, como la dirección IPv4, el número de puerto del nodo del mismo nivel y el tipo de protocolo (este servicio siempre devuelve el tipo UDP) de un paquete recibido en una interfaz de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4581">This service extracts network parameters, such as IPv4 address, peer port number, protocol type (this service always returns UDP type) from a packet received on an incoming interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4582">Para obtener información sobre un paquete procedente de una red IPv4 o IPv6, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4582">To obtain information on a packet coming from IPv4 or IPv6 network, application shall use the service ***nxd_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4583">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4584">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4584">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4585">**ip_address**: puntero a la dirección IP del emisor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4585">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4586">**protocolo**: puntero al protocolo (UDP).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4586">**protocol** Pointer to protocol (UDP).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4587">**port**: puntero al número de puerto del emisor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4587">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4588">**interface_index**: puntero al índice de la interfaz de recepción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4588">**interface_index** Pointer to receiving interface index.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4589">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4589">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4590">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Datos de la interfaz de paquetes extraídos correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4590">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**: (0x12) El paquete no contiene una trama IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4591">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet does not contain IPv4 frame.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Entrada de puntero no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4592">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4593">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4594">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4595">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4595">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4596">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4596">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4597">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4597">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4598">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4598">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nx_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                     &protocol, &port,
                                     &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully
   retrieved. */
```
