## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4621">nx_udp_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4622">Enlazar un socket UDP a un puerto UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4622">Bind UDP socket to UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4623">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4623">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bind(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4624">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4624">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4625">Este servicio enlaza el socket UDP creado previamente al puerto UDP especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4625">This service binds the previously created UDP socket to the specified UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4626">El intervalo de sockets UDP válidos es de 0 a 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4626">Valid UDP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4627">Si el número de puerto solicitado está enlazado a otro socket, este servicio espera durante el período de tiempo especificado para que el socket se desenlace del número de puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4627">If the requested port number is bound to another socket, this service waits for specified period of time for the socket to unbind from the port number.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4628">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4628">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4629">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4629">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4630">**port**: número de puerto al que se va a enlazar\*\* (de 1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4630">**port** Port number to bind to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4631">Si el número de puerto es NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), la instancia de IP buscará el siguiente puerto libre y lo utilizará para el enlace.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4631">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT\*\* (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4632">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si el puerto ya está enlazado a otro socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4632">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4633">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4633">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4634">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4635">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4636">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4636">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4637">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4637">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4638">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket enlazado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4638">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND**: (0x22) Este socket ya está enlazado a otro puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4639">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE**: (0x23) El puerto ya está enlazado a otro socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4640">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS**: (0x45) No hay ningún puerto libre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4641">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4642">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) Puerto especificado no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4643">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4644">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4645">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4646">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4647">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4647">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4648">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4648">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4649">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4649">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4650">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4651">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4651">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind the previously created UDP socket to port 12 on the
   previously created IP instance. If the port is already bound,
   wait for 300 timer ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_bind(&udp_socket, 12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the UDP socket is now bound to
   port 12.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4674">nx_udp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4675">Recuperar el número de bytes disponibles para su recuperación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4675">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4676">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4676">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4715">nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4716">Deshabilitar la suma de comprobación para un socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4716">Disable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4717">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4717">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4718">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4718">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4719">Este servicio deshabilita la lógica de la suma de comprobación para enviar y recibir paquetes en el socket UDP especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4719">This service disables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4720">Cuando se deshabilita la lógica de la suma de comprobación, se carga un valor de cero en el campo de suma de comprobación del encabezado UDP para todos los paquetes enviados mediante este socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4720">When the checksum logic is disabled, a value of zero is loaded into the UDP header's checksum field for all packets sent through this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4721">Un valor de suma de comprobación establecido en cero en el encabezado UDP indica al receptor que no se ha procesado la suma de comprobación para este paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4721">A zero-value checksum value in the UDP header signals the  receiver that checksum is not computed for this packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4722">Tenga en cuenta también que esto no tiene ningún efecto si **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** y **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** se definen al recibir y enviar paquetes UDP, respectivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4722">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively,</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4723">Tenga en cuenta que este servicio no tiene ningún efecto en los paquetes de la red IPv6, ya que la suma de comprobación UDP es obligatoria para IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4723">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network since UDP checksum is mandatory for IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4724">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4725">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4725">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4726">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4726">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4727">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Suma de comprobación de socket deshabilitada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4727">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket no está enlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4728">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4729">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4730">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4731">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4732">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4733">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4733">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4734">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4734">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4735">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4735">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4736">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4736">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_disable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will not have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4759">nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4760">Habilitar la suma de comprobación para un socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4760">Enable checksum for UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4761">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4761">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4762">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4762">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4763">Este servicio habilita la lógica de la suma de comprobación para enviar y recibir paquetes en el socket UDP especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4763">This service enables the checksum logic for sending and receiving packets on the specified UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4764">La suma de comprobación abarca todo el área de datos UDP y un encabezado pseudo IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4764">The checksum covers the entire UDP data area as well as a pseudo IP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4765">Tenga en cuenta también que esto no tiene ningún efecto si **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** y **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** se definen al recibir y enviar paquetes UDP, respectivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4765">Also note that this has no effect if **NX_DISABLE_UDP_RX_CHECKSUM** and **NX_DISABLE_UDP_TX_CHECKSUM** are defined when receiving and sending UDP packets respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4766">Tenga en cuenta que este servicio no tiene ningún efecto en los paquetes de la red IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4766">Note that this service has no effect on packets on the IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4767">La suma de comprobación de UDP es obligatoria en IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4767">UDP checksum is mandatory in IPv6.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4768">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4769">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4769">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4770">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4770">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4771">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Suma de comprobación de socket habilitada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4771">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket checksum enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket no está enlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4772">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4776">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4777">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4777">Initialization, threads, timer</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4778">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4779">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4780">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable the UDP checksum logic for packets sent on this socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_checksum_enable(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, outgoing packets will have a checksum
   calculated. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4803">nx_udp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4804">Crear un socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4804">Create UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4805">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4805">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG queue_maximum);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4806">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4806">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4807">Este servicio crea un socket UDP para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4807">This service creates a UDP socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4808">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4808">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4809">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4809">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4810">**socket_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control del nuevo socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4810">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new UDP socket control bloc.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4811">**name**: nombre de la aplicación para este socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4811">**name** Application name for this UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4812">**type_of_service**: define el tipo de servicio para la transmisión. Los valores válidos son los siguientes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4812">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4813">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY**: (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4814">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA**: (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4815">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE**: (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4816">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST**: (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4817">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4818">**fragment**: especifica si se permite o no la fragmentación de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4818">**fragment Specifies** whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4819">Si se especifica NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0), se permite la fragmentación de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4819">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4820">Si se especifica NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000), se deshabilita la fragmentación de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4820">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4821">**time_to_live**: especifica el valor de 8 bits que define el número de enrutadores que puede pasar este paquete antes de que se descarte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4821">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4822">NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE especifica el valor predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4822">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4823">**queue_maximum**: define el número máximo de datagramas UDP que se pueden poner en cola para este socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4823">**queue_maximum** Defines the maximum number of UDP datagrams that can be queued for this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4824">Una vez alcanzado el límite de la cola, se libera el paquete UDP más antiguo para cada paquete nuevo recibido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4824">After the queue limit is reached, for every new packet received the oldest UDP packet is released.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4825">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4825">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4826">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket UDP creado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4826">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR**: (0x0A) Tipo de servicio, fragmento u opción de período de vida no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4827">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, or time-to-live option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) IP o puntero de socket no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4828">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4829">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4830">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4831">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4831">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4832">Inicialización y subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4832">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4833">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4833">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4834">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4834">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4835">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4835">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a UDP socket with a maximum receive queue of 30 packets.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_create(&ip_0, &udp_socket, "Sample UDP Socket",
                              NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY, 0x80,
                              30);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the new UDP socket has been created and
   is ready for binding. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4858">nx_udp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4859">Eliminar un socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4859">Delete UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4860">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4860">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_delete(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4861">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4862">Este servicio elimina un socket UDP creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4862">This service deletes a previously created UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4863">Si el socket se ha enlazado a un puerto, primero se debe desenlazar el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4863">If the socket was bound to a port, the socket must be unbound first.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4864">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4865">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4865">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4866">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4866">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4867">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket eliminado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4867">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND**: (0x42) El socket sigue estando enlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4868">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4869">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4870">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4871">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4872">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4872">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4873">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4873">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4874">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4874">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4875">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4875">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4876">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4876">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_delete(&udp_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created UDP socket has
   been deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4899">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4900">Recuperar información acerca de las actividades del socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4900">Retrieve information about UDP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4901">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_info_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *udp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *udp_packets_received,
    ULONG *udp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *udp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *udp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *udp_checksum_errors);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4902">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4903">Este servicio recupera información sobre las actividades de socket UDP de la instancia de socket UDP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4903">This service retrieves information about UDP socket activities for the specified UDP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4904">*Si el puntero de destino es NX_NULL, esa información determinada no se devuelve al autor de llamada*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4904">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4905">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4906">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4906">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4907">**udp_packets_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de paquetes UDP enviados en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4907">**udp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4908">**udp_bytes_sent**: puntero al destino para el número total de bytes UDP enviados en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4908">**udp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of UDP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4909">**udp_packets_received**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes UDP recibidos en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4909">**udp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4910">**udp_bytes_received**: puntero al destino del número total de bytes UDP recibidos en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4910">**udp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4911">**udp_packets_queued**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes UDP en cola en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4911">**udp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued UDP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes de recepción UDP descartados para el socket debido a que se superó el tamaño de la cola.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4912">**udp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP receive packets dropped for socket due to queue size being exceeded.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4913">**udp_checksum_errors**: puntero al destino del número total de paquetes UDP con errores de suma de comprobación en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4913">**udp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of UDP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4914">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4914">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4915">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperación correcta de la información del socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4915">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4916">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4917">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4918">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4919">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4919">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4920">Inicialización, subprocesos y temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4920">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4921">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4921">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4922">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4922">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4923">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4923">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve UDP socket information from socket 0.*/
status = nx_udp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &udp_packets_sent,
                                &udp_bytes_sent,
                                &udp_packets_received,
                                &udp_bytes_received,
                                &udp_queued_packets,
                                &udp_receive_packets_dropped,
                                &udp_checksum_errors);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, UDP socket information was retrieved.*/
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4946">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4947">Recuperar el número de puerto enlazado a un socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4947">Pick up port number bound to UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4948">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4948">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_port_get(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4949">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4949">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4950">Este servicio recupera el número de puerto asociado al socket, lo que resulta útil para encontrar el puerto asignado por NetX Duo en situaciones en las que se especificó NX_ANY_PORT en el momento en que se enlazó el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4950">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4951">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4952">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4952">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4953">**port_ptr**: puntero al destino del número de puerto devuelto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4953">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4954">Los números de puerto válidos son (1 a 0xFFFF).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4954">Valid port numbers are (1- 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4955">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4955">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4956">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket enlazado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4956">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) Este socket no está enlazado a un puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4957">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket o puntero de devolución de puerto no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4958">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4959">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4960">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4961">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4961">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4962">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4962">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4963">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4963">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4964">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4964">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4965">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4965">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of created and bound UDP socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_port_get(&udp_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4988">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4989">Recibir un datagrama de un socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4989">Receive datagram from UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4990">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4991">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4992">Este servicio recibe un datagrama UDP del socket especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4992">This service receives an UDP datagram from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4993">Si no hay ningún datagrama en cola en el socket especificado, el autor de llamada se suspende en función de la opción de espera proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4993">If no datagram is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4994">*Si se devuelve NX_SUCCESS, la aplicación es responsable de liberar el paquete recibido después de que ya no se necesite*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4994">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4995">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4995">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4996">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4996">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4997">**packet_ptr**: puntero al puntero del paquete del datagrama UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4997">**packet_ptr** Pointer to UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4998">**wait_option**: define cómo se comporta el servicio si no hay ningún datagrama en la cola actualmente en este socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4998">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if a datagram is not currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-4999">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-4999">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5000">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5001">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5002">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5002">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5003">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5003">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5004">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recepción correcta en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5004">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket no estaba enlazado a ningún puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5005">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET**: (0x01) No había ningún datagrama UDP para recibir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5006">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) There was no UDP datagram to receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha anulado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5007">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Socket o puntero de devolución del paquete no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5008">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or packet return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5009">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5010">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5011">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5012">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5012">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5013">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5013">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5014">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5014">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5015">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5015">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from a previously created and bound UDP socket.
   If no packets are currently available, wait for 500 timer ticks
   before giving up. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive(&udp_socket, &packet_ptr, 500);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received UDP packet is pointed to by
   packet_ptr. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5038">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5039">Notificar cada paquete recibido a la aplicación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5039">Notify application of each received packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5040">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5040">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*udp_receive_notify)(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5041">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5041">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5042">Este servicio establece el puntero de la función de notificación de recepción en la función de devolución de llamada especificada por la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5042">This service sets the receive notify function pointer to the callback function specified by the  application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5043">A continuación, se llama a esta función de devolución de llamada siempre que se recibe un paquete en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5043">This callback function is then called whenever a packet is received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5044">Si se proporciona un puntero NX_NULL, la función de notificación de recepción se deshabilita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5044">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the receive notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5045">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5046">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5046">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the UDP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5047">**udp_receive_notify**: puntero a la función de devolución de llamada de la aplicación a la que se llama cuando se recibe un paquete en el socket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5047">**udp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when a packet is received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5048">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5048">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5049">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La función de notificación de recepción del socket se ha establecido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5049">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set socket receive notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5050">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5051">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5052">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5052">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5053">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5053">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5054">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5054">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5055">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5055">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "udp_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_udp_socket_receive_notify(&udp_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever a packet is received for
   "udp_socket". */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5076">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5076">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5078">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5079">Enviar un datagrama UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5079">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5080">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5080">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5081">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5082">Este servicio envía un datagrama UDP mediante un socket UDP previamente creado y enlazado para redes IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5082">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for IPv4 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5083">NetX Duo encuentra una dirección IP local adecuada como dirección de origen en función de la dirección IP de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5083">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5084">Para especificar una interfaz y una dirección IP de origen específicas, la aplicación debe usar el servicio **nxd_udp_socket_source_send**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5084">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the  **nxd_udp_socket_source_send** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5085">Tenga en cuenta que este servicio vuelve inmediatamente, independientemente de si el datagrama UDP se ha enviado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5085">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5086">El servicio equivalente de NetX Duo (IPv4 e IPv6) es ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5086">The NetX Duo (IPv4/IPv6) equivalent service is ***nxd_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5087">El socket debe estar enlazado a un puerto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5087">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5088">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5089">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5089">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) No hay suficiente espacio para el encabezado UDP en el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5098">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero de anexión del paquete no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5099">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5100">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5108">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5108">Example</span></span>

```c
ULONG server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IP address. */
server_address = IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5);

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nx_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                            server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the application successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to its peer. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5131">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5132">Enviar un datagrama mediante el socket UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5132">Send datagram through UDP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5133">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5133">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    UINT port,
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5134">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5134">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5135">Este servicio envía un datagrama UDP mediante un socket UDP previamente creado y enlazado mediante la interfaz de red con la dirección IP especificada como dirección de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5135">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket through the network interface with the specified IP address as the source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5136">Tenga en cuenta que el servicio vuelve inmediatamente, independientemente de si el datagrama UDP se ha enviado correctamente o no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5136">Note that service returns immediately, regardless of whether or not the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** funciona para redes IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5137">***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** works for both IPv4 and IPv6 networks.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5138">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5138">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5139">**socket_ptr**: socket en el que se va a transmitir el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5139">**socket_ptr** Socket to transmit the packet out on.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5140">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete que se va a transmitir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5140">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5141">**ip_address**: dirección IP de destino a la que se va a enviar el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5141">**ip_address** Destination IP address to send packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5142">**port**: puerto de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5142">**port** Destination port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5143">**address_index**: índice de la dirección asociada a la interfaz en la que se va a enviar el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5143">**address_index** Index of the address associated with the interface to send packet on.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5144">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5144">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5145">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El paquete se ha enviado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet successfully sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) Socket no enlazado a ningún puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IP no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5147">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) El procesamiento de UDP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5148">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP processing not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5149">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) Puntero de anexión de paquetes no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5150">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Invalid packet append pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) Puntero de anteposición de paquetes no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5151">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Invalid packet prepend pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5152">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de dirección no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5153">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid address index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) El número de puerto supera el número de puerto máximo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5154">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number exceeds maximum port number.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5155">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5156">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5156">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5157">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5157">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5158">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5158">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5159">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5159">Example</span></span>

```c
#define ADDRESS_INDEX 1

/* Send packet out on port 80 to the specified destination IP on the
   interface at index 1 in the IP task interface list. */
status = nx_udp_socket_source_send(socket_ptr, packet_ptr,
                                   destination_ip, 80,
                                   ADDRESS_INDEX);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet was successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nx_udp_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5182">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5183">Desenlazar un socket UDP del puerto UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5183">Unbind UDP socket from UDP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5184">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5184">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_socket_unbind(NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5185">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5185">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5186">Este servicio libera el enlace entre el socket UDP y un puerto UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5186">This service releases the binding between the UDP socket and a UDP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5187">Los paquetes recibidos almacenados en la cola de recepción se liberan como parte de la operación de desenlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5187">Any received packets stored in the receive queue are released as part of the unbind operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5188">Si hay otros subprocesos en espera de enlazar otro socket al puerto desenlazado, el primer subproceso suspendido se enlaza al puerto recién desenlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5188">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the unbound port, the first suspended thread is then bound to the newly unbound port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5189">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5190">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia del socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5194">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5195">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) Este componente no se ha habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5196">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>


## <a name="nx_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5224">nx_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5225">Extraer la dirección IP y el puerto de envío de un datagrama UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5225">Extract IP and sending port from UDP datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5226">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5227">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5228">Este servicio extrae el número de puerto y la dirección IP del emisor de los encabezados IP y UDP del datagrama UDP proporcionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5228">This service extracts the sender's IP and port number from the IP and UDP headers of the supplied UDP datagram.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5229">Tenga en cuenta que el servicio ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** funciona con paquetes de una red IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5229">Note that the service ***nxd_udp_source_extract*** works with packets from either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5230">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5231">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete del datagrama UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5231">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5232">**ip_address**: puntero válido a la variable de devolución de la dirección IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5232">**ip_address** Valid pointer to the return IP address variable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5233">**port**: puntero válido a la variable de devolución del puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5233">**port** Valid pointer to the return port variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5234">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5234">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5235">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Extracción correcta del puerto y la dirección IP de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5235">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source IP/port extraction.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**: (0x12) El paquete proporcionado no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5236">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) The supplied packet is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Paquete, dirección IP o puerto de destino no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5237">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet or IP or port destination.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5238">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5238">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5239">Inicialización, subprocesos, temporizadores e ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5239">Initialization, threads, timers, ISR</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5240">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5240">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5241">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5242">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract the IP and port information from the sender of the UPD packet. */
status = nx_udp_source_extract(packet_ptr, &sender_ip_address, &sender_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the sender IP and port information has been stored
   in sender_ip_address and sender_port respectively.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5265">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5266">Habilitar los servicios de ICMPv4 e ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5266">Enable ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5267">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5267">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5268">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5268">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5269">Este servicio habilita los servicios ICMPv4 e ICMPv6 y solo se puede llamar después de que se haya creado la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5269">This service enables both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services and can only be called after the IP instance has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5270">El servicio se puede habilitar antes o después de habilitar IPv6 (consulte *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5270">The service can be enabled either before or after IPv6 is enabled (see *nxd_ipv6_enable*).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5271">Los servicios de ICMPv4 incluyen la solicitud y respuesta de eco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5271">ICMPv4 services include Echo Request/Reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5272">Entre los servicios ICMPv6 se incluyen la solicitud y respuesta de eco, la detección de vecinos, la detección de direcciones duplicadas, la detección de enrutadores y la configuración automática de direcciones sin estado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5272">ICMPv6 services include Echo Request/Reply, Neighbor Discovery, Duplicate Address Detection, Router Discovery, and Stateless Address Auto-configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5273">El equivalente para IPv4 en NetX es *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5273">The IPv4 equivalent in NetX is *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

> [!NOTE] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5274">*Si la dirección IPv6 se configura manualmente antes de habilitar ICMPv6, la dirección IPv6 configurada manualmente no está sujeta al proceso de detección de direcciones duplicadas*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5274">*If the IPv6 address is manually configured prior to enabling ICMPv6, the manually configured IPv6 is not subject to Duplicate Address Detection process*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* inicia los servicios de ICMP solo para operaciones IPv4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5275">*nx_icmp_enable* starts ICMP services for IPv4 operations only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5276">Las aplicaciones que utilizan los servicios de ICMPv6 deben usar *nxd_icmp_enable* en lugar de *nx_icmp_enable*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5276">Applications using ICMPv6 services must use *nxd_icmp_enable* instead of *nx_icmp_enable*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5277">Para usar la solicitud de enrutador IPv6 y la configuración de dirección automática IPv6 sin estado, se debe habilitar ICMPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5277">To utilize IPv6 router solicitation and IPv6 stateless auto-address configuration, ICMPv6 must be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5278">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5278">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5279">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5279">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5280">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5280">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5281">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Los servicios de ICMP de se han habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5281">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP services are successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la instancia de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5282">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5283">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5284">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5285">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5285">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5286">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5287">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5288">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for ICMP services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5296">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5297">Realizar solicitudes de eco ICMPv4 o ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5297">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5298">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5298">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr, 
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5299">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5299">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5300">Este servicio envía un paquete de solicitud de eco ICMP mediante una interfaz física adecuada y espera una respuesta de eco del host de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5300">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet through an appropriate physical interface and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5301">NetX Duo determina la interfaz adecuada en función de la dirección de destino para enviar el mensaje de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5301">NetX Duo determines the appropriate interface, based on the destination address, to send the ping message .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5302">Las aplicaciones deben usar el servicio ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** para especificar la interfaz física y la dirección IP de origen precisas que se usarán para la transmisión de paquetes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5302">Applications shall use the service ***nxd_icmp_source_ping*** to specify the physical interface and precise source IP address to use for packet transmission.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5303">Se debe haber creado la instancia de IP y los servicios ICMPv4 e ICMPv6 deben estar habilitados (consulte ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5303">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4/ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see ***nxd_icmp_enable***).</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5304">Si se devuelve NX_SUCCESS, la aplicación es responsable de liberar el paquete recibido después de que ya no se necesite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5304">If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed.</span></span>
