- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5306">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5306">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5307">**ip_address**: dirección IP de destino a la que se va a hacer ping, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5307">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5308">**data_ptr**: puntero al área de datos del paquete de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5308">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5309">**data_size**: número de bytes de datos de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5309">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5310">**response_ptr**: puntero al puntero del paquete de respuesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5310">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet Pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5311">**wait_option**: tiempo de espera para una respuesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5311">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5312">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5312">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5313">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5314">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5314">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through</span></span> 
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5315">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5316">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5317">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ping enviado y recibido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5317">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) IPv6 no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5318">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) Los datos de ping superan la carga del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5319">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE**: (0x29) El host de destino no ha respondido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5320">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) tx_thread_wait_abort ha cancelado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5321">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**: (0x50) No se ha podido encontrar ninguna interfaz de salida adecuada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5322">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de respuesta o dirección IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5323">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5324">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) IP o el componente de ICMP no están habilitados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5325">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) La dirección IP de entrada no es válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5326">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Input IP address is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5329">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5329">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5331">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5331">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send
   ping packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   2001:1234:5678::1 */
   
/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr,
                       NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been
   received from IP address 2001:1234:5678::1 and the response
   packet is contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr.It
   should have the same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4[0]    = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address, buffer,
                       strlen(buffer),&response_ptr, 10);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received
   from IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in
   the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same
   “abcd” four bytes of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_icmp_source_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5339">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5340">Realizar solicitudes de eco ICMPv4 o ICMPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5340">Perform ICMPv4 or ICMPv6 Echo Requests</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5341">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5341">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_icmp_source_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT address_index,
    CHAR *data_ptr, 
    ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5342">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5343">Este servicio envía un paquete de solicitud de eco ICMP con el índice especificado de una dirección IPv4 o IPv6, y mediante la interfaz de red a la que está asociada la dirección de origen y espera una respuesta de eco del host de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5343">This service sends out an ICMP Echo Request packet using the specified index of an IPv4 or IPv6 address, and through the network interface the source address is associated with, and waits for an Echo Reply from the destination host.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5344">Este servicio funciona con direcciones IPv4 e IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5344">This service works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5345">El parámetro *address_index* indica la dirección IPv4 o IPv6 de origen que se va a usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5345">The parameter *address_index* indicates the source IPv4 or IPv6 address to use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5346">Para una dirección IPv4, *address_index* es el mismo índice de la interfaz de red conectada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5346">For IPv4 address, the *address_index* is the same index to the attached network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5347">En el caso de IPv6, *address_index* indica la entrada de la tabla de direcciones IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5347">For IPv6, the *address_index* indicates the entry in the IPv6 address table.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5348">Se debe haber creado la instancia de IP y los servicios ICMPv4 e ICMPv6 deben estar habilitados (consulte *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5348">The IP instance must have been created, and the ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 services must be enabled (see *nxd_icmp_enable*).</span></span>

> [!CAUTION] 
> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5349">*Si se devuelve NX_SUCCESS, la aplicación es responsable de liberar el paquete recibido después de que ya no se necesite*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5349">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5350">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5350">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5352">**ip_address**: dirección IP de destino a la que se va a hacer ping, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5352">**ip_address** Destination IP address to ping, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5353">**address_index**: indica la dirección IP que se va a usar como dirección de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5353">**address_index** Indicates the IP address to use as source address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5354">**data_ptr**: puntero al área de datos del paquete de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5354">**data_ptr** Pointer to ping packet data area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5355">**data_size**: número de bytes de datos de ping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5355">**data_size** Number of bytes of ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5356">**response_ptr**: puntero al puntero del paquete de respuesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5356">**response_ptr** Pointer to response packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5357">**wait_option**: tiempo de espera para una respuesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5357">**wait_option** Time to wait for a reply.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5358">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5358">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5359">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5360">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5360">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5361">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5363">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ping enviado y recibido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5363">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sent and received ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5364">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) IPv6 no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5364">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 is not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5365">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) Los datos de ping superan la carga del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5365">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Ping data exceeds packet payload</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5366">**NX_NO_RESPONSE**: (0x29) El host de destino no ha respondido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5366">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Destination host did not respond</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5367">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) tx_thread_wait_abort ha cancelado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5367">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5369">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de respuesta o dirección IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5369">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5370">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5370">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5371">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) IP o el componente de ICMP no están habilitados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5371">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IP or ICMP component is not enabled</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5377">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5377">Example</span></span>

```c
/* The following two examples illustrate how to use this API to send ping
   packets to IPv6 or IPv4 destinations. */

/* The first example: Send a ping packet to an IPv6 host
   FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 */

/* Declare variable address to hold the destination address. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
#define GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS 1

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
char *buffer = “abcd”;
UINT prefix_length = 10;

/* Set the IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0xFE800000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x00000000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0x04117B23;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 0x40DCF181;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              GLOBAL_IPv6_ADDRESS,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply has been received
   from IP address FE80::411:7B23:40dc:f181 and the response packet is
   contained in the packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the
   same “abcd” four bytes of data. */

/* The second example: Send a ping packet to an IPv4 host 1.2.3.4 */

/* Program the IPv4 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V4;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4       = 0x01020304;

status = nxd_icmp_source_ping(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                              PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                              buffer,
                              strlen(buffer),
                              &response_ptr,
                              NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

/* A return value of NX_SUCCESS indicates a ping reply was received from
   IP address 1.2.3.4 and the response packet is contained in the packet
   pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same “abcd” four bytes
   of data. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5411">nxd_ip_raw_packet_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5412">Enviar un paquete IP sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5412">Send Raw IP Packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5413">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination
    ULONG protocol, 
    UINT ttl, 
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5414">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5415">Este servicio envía un paquete IPv4 o IPv6 sin formato (sin encabezados de protocolo de capa de transporte).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5415">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet (no transport-layer protocol headers).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5416">En un sistema de host múltiple, si el sistema no puede determinar una interfaz adecuada (por ejemplo, si la dirección IP de destino es de difusión IPv4, multidifusión o una dirección de multidifusión IPv6), se selecciona el dispositivo primario.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5416">On a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address), the primary device is selected.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5417">Se puede utilizar el servicio \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ para especificar una interfaz de salida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5417">The service \***nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send** _ can be used to specify an outgoing interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5418">El equivalente en NetX es _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.* \*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5418">The NetX equivalent is _ *_nx_ip_raw_packet_send_.*\*</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5419">La instancia de IP se debe haber creado previamente y se debe habilitar el control de paquetes IP sin formato mediante el servicio ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5419">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5420">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5421">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5422">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete que se va a transmitir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5422">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to transmit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5423">**destination_ip**: puntero a la dirección de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5423">**destination_ip** Pointer to destination address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5424">**protocol**: protocolo del paquete almacenado en el encabezado IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5424">**protocol** Packet protocol stored to the IP header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5425">**ttl**: valor de TTL o límite de saltos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5425">**ttl** Value for TTL or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5426">**tos**: valor de TOS o clase de tráfico y etiqueta de flujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5426">**tos** Value for TOS or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5427">Valor devuelto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5427">Return Value</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5428">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El paquete IP sin formato se ha enviado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5428">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Raw IP packet successfully sent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**: (0x50) No se ha podido encontrar ninguna interfaz de salida adecuada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5429">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) No se ha habilitado el control de paquetes IP sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5430">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw IP handling not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IPv4 o IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5431">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) No hay suficiente espacio para el encabezado IPv4 o IPv6 en el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5432">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero de anexión del paquete no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5433">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de IP o puntero de paquete no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5434">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer or packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5435">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) Entrada de dirección IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5436">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5437">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5437">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5438">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5438">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5439">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5439">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5440">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5440">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5441">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5441">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS dest_address;

/* Set the destination address,in this case an IPv6 address. */
dest_address.nxd_ip_address_version  = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]    = 0x20011234;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]    = 0x56780000;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]    = 0;
dest_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]    = 1;

UINT ttl, tos;

ttl = 128;

tos = 0;

/* Enable RAW IP handling on the previously created IP instance.*/
status = nx_raw_ip_packet_enable(&ip_0);

/* Allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr from the IP packet
   pool. */
/* Then transmit the packet to the destination address. */

status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr, dest_address,
                                NX_PROTOCOL_UDP, ttl, tos);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates the packet was
   successfully transmitted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5451">nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5452">Enviar un paquete sin formato con la dirección de origen especificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5452">Send raw packet using specified source address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5453">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5453">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *destination_ip,
    UINT address_index,
    ULONG protocol,
    UINT ttl,
    ULONG tos);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5454">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5455">Este servicio envía un paquete IPv4 o IPv6 sin formato mediante la dirección IPv4 o IPv6 especificada como dirección de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5455">This service sends a raw IPv4 or IPv6 packet using the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address as source address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5456">Este servicio se utiliza normalmente en un sistema de host múltiple, si el sistema no puede determinar una interfaz adecuada (por ejemplo, si la dirección IP de destino es de difusión IPv4, multidifusión o una dirección de multidifusión IPv6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5456">This service is typically used on a multihome system, if the system is unable to determine an appropriate interface (for example, if the destination IP address is IPv4 broadcast, multicast or IPv6 multicast address).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5457">El parámetro *address_index* permite a la aplicación especificar la dirección de origen que se va a usar al enviar este paquete sin formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5457">The parameter *address_index* allows the application to specify the source address to use when sending this raw packet.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5458">La instancia de IP se debe haber creado previamente y se debe habilitar el control de paquetes IP sin formato mediante el servicio ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5458">The IP instance must be previously created and raw IP packet handling must be enabled using the ***nx_ip_raw_packet_enable*** service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5459">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5460">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5460">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5461">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete que se va a enviar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5461">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet to send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5462">**destination_ip**: dirección IP de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5462">**destination_ip** Destination IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5463">**address_index**: índice de las direcciones IPv4 o IPv6 que se usarán como dirección de origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5463">**address_index** Index to the IPv4 or IPv6 addresses to use as source address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5464">**protocol**: valor del campo de protocolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5464">**protocol** Value for the protocol field</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5465">**ttl**: valor de TTL o límite de saltos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5465">**ttl** Value for ttl or hop limit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5466">**tos**: valor de TOS o clase de tráfico y etiqueta de flujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5466">**tos** Value for tos or traffic class and flow label</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5467">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5467">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5468">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El paquete se ha enviado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5468">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet is sent successfully</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) No hay suficiente espacio para el encabezado IPv4 o IPv6 en el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5469">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for IPv4 or IPv6 header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero de anexión del paquete no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5470">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero no válido al bloque de control de IP, al paquete o a destination_ip.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5471">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to IP control block, packet, or destination_ip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5472">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) El procesamiento de paquetes sin formato no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5473">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) Raw processing not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Error de dirección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Address error</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de interfaz no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5475">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) Entrada de dirección IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5476">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5480">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5480">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5481">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5481">Example</span></span>

```c
#define SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX 2

/* Send a raw packet from specified interface. */
status = nxd_ip_raw_packet_source_send(&ip_0, packet_ptr,
                                       dest_ip,
                                       SOURCE_ADDRESS_INDEX,
                                       NX_IP_RAW,
                                       NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE,
                                       NX_IP_NORMAL);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, raw packet has been sent out on the
   specified interface. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5491">nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5492">Establecer la notificación de cambio de dirección IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5492">Set ipv6 address change notify</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5493">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5493">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*ip_address_change_notify)(NX_IP *, UINT, UINT, UINT, ULONG *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5494">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5495">Este servicio registra una rutina de devolución de llamada de la aplicación a la que NetX Duo llama cada vez que cambia la dirección IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5495">This service registers an application callback routine that NetX Duo calls whenever the IPv6 Address is changed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5496">Este servicio está disponible si se ha compilado la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5496">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built is the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_ADDRESS_CHANGE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5497">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5497">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5498">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5498">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5499">**ip_address_change_notify**: función de devolución de llamada de la aplicación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5499">**ip_address_change_notify** Application callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5500">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5500">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5501">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha establecido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5501">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de notificación de cambio de dirección IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5502">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 address change notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5503">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5504">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) No se ha compilado la notificación de cambio de dirección IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5505">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) IPv6 address change notify is not compiled</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5506">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5507">Thread</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5507">Thread</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5508">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5509">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5510">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5510">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID ip_address_change_notify(NX_IP *ip_ptr, UINT status,
                              UINT interface_index,
                              UINT address_index,
                              ULONG *ip_address)
{

   /* Do something when ip address changed. */
}

void ip_address_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

   /* Set the ip address change notify of IP instance. */
   status = nxd_ipv6_address_change_notify (&ip_0, ip_address_change_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the ip address change notify of IP
   instance was successfully set. */
}
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5535">nxd_ipv6_address_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5536">Eliminar una dirección IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5536">Delete IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5537">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5537">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5538">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5539">Este servicio elimina la dirección IPv6 del índice especificado de la tabla de direcciones IPv6 de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5539">This service deletes the IPv6 address at the specified index in the IPv6 address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5540">No hay equivalente en NetX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5540">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5541">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5541">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5542">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5542">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5543">**address_index**: índice de la tabla de direcciones IPv6 de la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5543">**address_index** Index to IP instance IPv6 address table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5544">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5545">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) La dirección se ha eliminado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5545">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Address successfully deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5546">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**: (0x50) No se ha podido encontrar ninguna interfaz de salida adecuada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5547">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la instancia de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5548">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5549">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5550">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5551">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5551">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5552">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5552">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5553">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5553">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5554">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5554">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;

/* Delete the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. */
address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_delete(&ip_0, address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5579">nxd_ipv6_address_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5580">Recuperar la dirección IPv6 y el prefijo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5580">Retrieve IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5581">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5581">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT address_index, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5582">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5583">Este servicio recupera la dirección IPv6 y el prefijo del índice especificado de la tabla de direcciones de la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5583">This service retrieves the IPv6 address and prefix at the specified index in the address table of the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5584">El índice de la interfaz física a la que está asociada la dirección IPv6 se devuelve en el puntero *interface_index*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5584">The index of the physical interface the IPv6 address is associated with is returned in the *interface_index* pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5585">Los servicios equivalentes de NetX son ***nx_ip_address_get** _ y _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5585">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_get** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_get_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5586">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5586">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5587">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5587">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5588">**address_index**: índice de la tabla de direcciones de la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5588">**address_index** Index to IP instance address table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5589">**ip_address**: puntero a la dirección que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5589">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5590">**prefix_length**: longitud del prefijo de dirección (máscara de subred).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5590">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5591">**interface_index**: puntero al índice de la interfaz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5591">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the interface</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5592">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5592">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5593">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) IPv6 está habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5593">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5594">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**: (0x50) No hay ninguna dirección de interfaz o índice de dirección no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5595">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No interface address, or invalid address_index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la instancia de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5596">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5597">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5598">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5598">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5599">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5599">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5600">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5600">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5601">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5601">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5602">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5602">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
ULONG       prefix_length;
UINT        interface_index;

/* Get the IPv6 address at the specified address table index. If
   found, the address network interface is returned in the
   interface_index input, as well as the address prefix in the
   prefix_length input. */

address_index = 1;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_get(&ip_0, address_index, &ip_address,
                              &prefix_length, &interface_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance
   address is successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_address_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5627">nxd_ipv6_address_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5628">Establecer la dirección IPv6 y el prefijo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5628">Set IPv6 Address and Prefix</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5629">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5629">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_address_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG prefix_length,
    UINT *address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5630">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5630">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5631">Este servicio establece la dirección IPv6 y el prefijo proporcionados en la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5631">This service sets the supplied IPv6 address and prefix to the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5632">Si el argumento *address_index* no es NULL, se devuelve el índice de la tabla de direcciones IPv6 donde se ha insertado la dirección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5632">If the *address_index* argument is not null, the index into the IPv6 address table where the address is inserted is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5633">Los servicios equivalentes de NetX son ***nx_ip_address_set** _ y _*_nx_ip_interface_address_set_\*\*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5633">The NetX equivalent services are ***nx_ip_address_set** _ and _*_nx_ip_interface_address_set_\*\*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5634">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5634">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5635">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5635">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5636">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz a la que está asociada la dirección IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5636">**interface_index** Index to the interface the IPv6 address is associated with</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5637">**ip_address**: puntero a la dirección que se va a establecer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5637">**ip_address** Pointer to the address to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5638">**prefix_length**: longitud del prefijo de dirección (máscara de subred).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5638">**prefix_length** Length of the address prefix (subnet mask)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5639">**address_index**: puntero al índice en la tabla de direcciones en la que se ha insertado la dirección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5639">**address_index** Pointer to the index into the address table where the address is inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5640">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5641">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) IPv6 está habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5641">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x15) La tabla de direcciones IP está llena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5642">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x15) IP address table is full</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5643">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY**: (0x52) La dirección IP suministrada ya está en uso en esta instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5644">**NX_DUPLICATED_ENTRY** (0x52) The supplied IP address is already used on this IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la instancia de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5645">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5646">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5647">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) La interfaz apunta a una interfaz de red no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5648">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface points to an invalid network interface</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5649">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5650">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5650">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5651">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5651">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5652">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5652">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5653">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5653">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT        address_index;
UINT        interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                     IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                     0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                     pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* Set the IPv6 address (a global address as indicated by the 64 bit
   prefix) using the IPv6 address just created on the primary device
   (index zero). The index into the address table is returned in
   address_index. */
interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&ip_0, interface_index, &ip_address,
                              64,&address_index);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IPv6 address is
   successfully assigned to the primary interface (interface 0). */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5678">nxd_ipv6_default_router_add</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5679">Agregar un enrutador IPv6 a la tabla de enrutadores predeterminados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5679">Add an IPv6 Router to Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5680">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5680">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG router_lifetime,
    UINT index_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5681">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5682">Este servicio agrega un enrutador predeterminado IPv6 en la interfaz física especificada a la tabla de enrutadores predeterminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5682">This service adds an IPv6 default router on the specified physical interface to the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5683">El servicio IPv4 de NetX equivalente es ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5683">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_ip_gateway_address_set***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5684">*router_address* debe apuntar a una dirección IPv6 válida y el enrutador debe ser accesible directamente desde la interfaz física especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5684">*router_address* must point to a valid IPv6 address, and the router must be directly accessible from the specified physical interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5685">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5685">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5686">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5686">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5687">**router_address**: puntero a la dirección del enrutador predeterminado, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5687">**router_address** Pointer to the default router address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5688">**router_lifetime**: tiempo de vida del enrutador predeterminado en segundos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5688">**router_lifetime** Default router life time, in seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5689">Los valores válidos son:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5689">Valid values are:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5690">**0xFFFF:** Sin tiempo de espera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5690">**0xFFFF:** No time out</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** valor de tiempo de espera en segundos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5691">**0-0xFFFE:** Timeout value, in seconds</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5692">**index_index**: puntero a la ubicación de memoria válida del índice de red mediante el cual se puede llegar al enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5692">**index_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the network index index through which the router can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5693">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5693">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5694">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El enrutador predeterminado se ha agregado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5694">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) No hay más entradas disponibles en la tabla de enrutadores predeterminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5695">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries available in the default router table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5696">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5697">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) Entrada de dirección IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5698">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Not valid IPv6 address input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Espacio de almacenamiento o instancia de IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5699">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5700">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de interfaz del enrutador no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5701">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5702">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5703">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5703">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5704">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5704">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5705">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5705">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5706">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5706">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds a default router for the primary interface at
   fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac to the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version   = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Set the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Set IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_add(ip_ptr, &router_address,
                                     0xFFFF, PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* Unless invalid pointer input is detected by the error checking
   Service, status return is always NX_SUCCESS. */
```


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5730">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5730">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5737">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5737">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5741">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5741">Example</span></span>

```c
/*This example removes a default router:fe80::1219:B9FF:FE37:ac */

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;

/* Set the router_address version to IPv6 */
router_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;

/* Program the IPv6 address, in host byte order. */
router_address.nxd_ip_address[0] = 0xfe800000;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[1] = 0x0;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[2] = 0x1219B9FF;
router_address.nxd_ip_address[3] = 0xFE3700AC;

/* Delete the IPv6 default router. */
nxd_ipv6_default_router_delete(ip_ptr, &router_address);
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5761">nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5762">Obtener una entrada de enrutador predeterminado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5762">Get default router entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5763">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index,
    UINT entry_index,
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_addr,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length,
    ULONG *configuration_method);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5764">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5765">Este servicio recupera una entrada de enrutador de la tabla de enrutamiento de IPv6 predeterminada que está conectada a un dispositivo de red especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5765">This service retrieves a router entry from the default IPv6 routing table that is attached to a specified network device.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5766">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5766">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5767">**ip_ptr**: puntero al bloque de control de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5767">**ip_ptr** IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5768">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5768">**interface_index** Index of the network interface</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5769">**entry_index**: índice de la entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5769">**entry_index** Entry Index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5770">**router_addr**: dirección IPv6 del enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5770">**router_addr** Router IPv6 Address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5771">**router_lifetime**: puntero al tiempo de vigencia del enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5771">**router_lifetime** Pointer to router life time</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5772">**prefix_length**: puntero a la longitud del prefijo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5772">**prefix_length** Pointer to prefix length</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5773">**configuration_method**: puntero a la información sobre cómo se configuró la entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5773">**configuration_method** Pointer to the information on how the entry was configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5774">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5774">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5775">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha obtenido correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5775">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x4E) No se ha encontrado la entrada del enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5776">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Router entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5777">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5778">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5779">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5780">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5781">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5781">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5782">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5782">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5783">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5783">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5784">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5784">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0
NXD_ADDRESS            router_addr;
ULONG                  router_lifetime;
ULONG                  prefix_length;
ULONG                  configuration_method;

/* Get the router entry of specified interface. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_entry_get (&ip_0,
                                            PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                            entry_index,
                                            &router_addr,
                                            &router_lifetime,
                                            &prefix_length,
                                            &configuration_method);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the router entry was successfully
   got. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5796">nxd_ipv6_default_router_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5797">Recuperar un enrutador IPv6 de la tabla de enrutadores predeterminados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5797">Retrieve an IPv6 Router from Default Router Table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5798">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5798">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT interface_index
    NXD_ADDRESS *router_address,
    ULONG *router_lifetime,
    ULONG *prefix_length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5799">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5800">Este servicio recupera una dirección de enrutador IPv6 predeterminado, el tiempo de vigencia y la longitud del prefijo en la interfaz física especificada de la tabla de enrutadores predeterminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5800">This service retrieves an IPv6 default router address, lifetime and prefix length on the specified physical interface from the default router table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5801">El servicio IPv4 de NetX equivalente es ***nx_ip_gateway_address_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5801">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is \***nx_ip_gateway_address_get\*.**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5802">*router_address* debe apuntar a una estructura NXD_ADDRESS válida para que este servicio puede rellenar la dirección IPv6 del enrutador predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5802">*router_address* must point to a valid NXD_ADDRESS structure, so this service can fill in the IPv6 address of the default router.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5803">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5804">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5804">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5805">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red mediante la cual se puede acceder al enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5805">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the router is accessible through</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5806">**router_address**: puntero al espacio de almacenamiento para el valor devuelto de la dirección del enrutador predeterminado, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5806">**router_address** Pointer to the storage space for the return value of the default router address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5807">**router_lifetime**: puntero al tiempo de vigencia del enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5807">**router_lifetime** Pointer to the router lifetime</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5808">**prefix_length**: puntero a la longitud del prefijo de la dirección del enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5808">**prefix_length** Pointer to the router address prefix length</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5809">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5810">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) El enrutador predeterminado se ha agregado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Default router is successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5811">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x4E) No se encuentra el enrutador predeterminado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5812">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) Default router not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5813">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de interfaz del enrutador no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5814">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid router interface index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Espacio de almacenamiento o instancia de IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5815">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5816">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5816">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5817">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5817">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5818">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5818">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5819">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5819">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5820">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5820">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example retrieves a default router for the primary device
   from the default router table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS router_address;
ULONG       router_lifetime;
ULONG       prefix_length;

/* Get IPv6 default router. */
status = nxd_ipv6_default_router_get(ip_ptr, PRIMARY_INTERFACE,
                                     &router_address,
                                     &router_lifetime,
                                     &prefix_length);

/* If status returns NX_SUCCESS, the router address and related
   information is returned successfully. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5832">nxd_ipv6_default_router_number_of_entries_get</span></span>
