## <a name="nxd_ipv6_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5862">nxd_ipv6_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5863">Deshabilitar la característica de IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5863">Disable the IPv6 feature</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5864">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5864">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5865">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5866">Este servicio deshabilita IPv6 para la instancia de IP especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5866">This service disables the IPv6 for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5867">También borra la tabla de enrutadores predeterminados, la memoria caché de ND y la tabla de direcciones IPv6, sale de todos los grupos de multidifusión y restablece las variables de solicitud de enrutador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5867">It also clears the default router table, ND cache and IPv6 address table, leaves the all multicast groups, and resets the router solicitation variables.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5868">Este servicio no tiene ningún efecto si IPv6 no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5868">This service has no effect if IPv6 is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5869">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5869">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5870">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5870">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5871">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5871">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5872">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Deshabilitación correcta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5872">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5873">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5874">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT**: (0x4B) No se ha compilado del módulo de IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5875">**NX_NOT_SUPPORT** (0x4B) IPv6 module is not compiled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5876">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5877">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5877">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5878">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5878">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5879">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5879">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5880">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5881">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5881">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable IPv6 feature on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, disables IPv6 feature on IP instance.*/
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5906">nxd_ipv6_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5907">Habilitación de los servicios de IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5907">Enable IPv6 Services</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5908">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5908">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5909">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5909">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5910">Este servicio habilita los servicios de IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5910">This service enables IPv6 services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5911">Cuando los servicios de IPv6 están habilitados, la instancia de IP se une al grupo de multidifusión de todos los nodos (FF02:: 1).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5911">When the IPv6 services are enabled, the IP instance joins the all-node multicast group (FF02::1).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5912">Este servicio no establece la dirección del vínculo local ni la dirección global.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5912">This service does not set the link local address or global address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5913">Las aplicaciones deben usar *nxd_ipv6_address_set* para configurar las direcciones de red del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5913">Applications should use *nxd_ipv6_address_set* to configure the device network addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5914">No hay equivalente en NetX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5914">There is no NetX equivalent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5915">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5915">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5916">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5916">**ip_ptr** Pointer to the previously created IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5917">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5917">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5918">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) IPv6 está habilitado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5918">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) IPv6 is successfully enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) IPv6 ya está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5919">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) IPv6 is already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5920">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero a la instancia de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5921">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5922">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5923">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5924">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5924">Initialization, Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5925">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5925">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5926">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5926">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5927">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5927">Example</span></span>

```c
/* First create an IP instance with packet pool, source address, and
   driver.*/
status = nx_ip_create(&ip_0, "NetX IP Instance 0",
                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                      0xFFFFFF00UL, &pool_0,_nx_ram_network_driver,
                      pointer, 2048, 1);

/* Then enable IPv6 on the IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_enable(&ip_0);

/* A status return of NX_SUCCESS indicates that the IP instance is
   enabled for IPv6 services. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5952">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5953">Unirse a un grupo de multidifusión IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5953">Join an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5954">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5954">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5955">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5956">Este servicio permite a una aplicación unirse a una dirección de multidifusión IPv6 específica en una interfaz de red específica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5956">This service allows an application to join a specific IPv6 multicast address on a specific network interface.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5957">Se notifica al controlador del vínculo que agregue la dirección de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5957">The link driver is notified to add the multicast address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5958">Este servicio está disponible si se compila la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5958">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5959">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5959">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5960">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5960">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5961">**group_address**: dirección IPv6 de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5961">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5962">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red asociada al grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5962">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with the multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5963">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5963">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5964">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha habilitado correctamente la recepción en la dirección IPv6 de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5964">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables receiving on IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES**: (0x17) No hay más entradas en la tabla de multidifusión de IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5965">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more entries in the IPv6 multicast table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) No hay más direcciones de grupo disponibles en el controlador del dispositivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5966">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) No more group addresses available in the device driver</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 o la característica de multidifusión de IPv6 no se han compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5967">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5968">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5969">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5970">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5971">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5975">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5975">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5976">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5976">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Join multicast group on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_join(&ip_0,
                                           &group_address,
                                           PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has joined the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5988">nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5989">Salir de un grupo de multidifusión IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5989">Leave an IPv6 multicast group</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5990">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5990">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *group_address,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5991">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5992">Este servicio quita la dirección de multidifusión IPv6 específica del dispositivo de red específico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5992">This service removes the specific IPv6 multicast address from the specific network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5993">También se notifica al controlador de vínculo la eliminación de la dirección IPv6 de multidifusión. Este servicio está disponible si se compila la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5993">The link driver is also notified of the removal of the IPv6 multicast address.This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_IPV6_MULTICAST*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5994">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5994">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5995">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5995">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5996">**group_address**: dirección IPv6 de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5996">**group_address** IPv6 multicast address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5997">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red asociada al grupo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5997">**interface_index** The index to the network interface associated with group</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5998">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5998">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-5999">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Salida correcta del grupo de multidifusión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-5999">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multicast leave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) No se encontró la entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6000">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Entry not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 o la característica de multidifusión de IPv6 no se han compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6001">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 multicast feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6002">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6003">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IPv6 no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6004">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6005">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6005">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6006">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6006">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6007">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6007">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6008">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6008">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6009">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6009">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6010">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6010">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Leave multicast address on this IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_multicast_interface_leave(&ip_0,
                                            &group_address,
                                            primary_interface);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, interface of index on IP instance
   has left the multicast group. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6023">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6024">Deshabilitar la configuración automática de direcciones sin estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6024">Disable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6025">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6025">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_disable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6026">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6027">Este servicio deshabilita la característica de configuración automática de direcciones IPv6 sin estado en un dispositivo de red especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6027">This service disables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6028">No tiene ningún efecto si se ha configurado la dirección IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6028">It has no effect if the IPv6 address has been configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6029">Este servicio está disponible si se compila la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6029">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6030">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6030">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6031">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6031">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6032">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red en el que se debe deshabilitar la configuración automática de direcciones IPv6 sin estado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6032">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6033">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6033">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6034">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha deshabilitado correctamente la característica de configuración automática de direcciones sin estado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6034">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disables stateless address autoconfigure feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0X4B) La característica de IPv6 o la característica de control de configuración automática de direcciones IPv6 sin estado no se han compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6035">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6036">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6037">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6038">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6039">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6040">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6040">Initialization, threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6042">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6042">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6043">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6043">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE 0

/* Disable stateless address auto configuration on this IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6068">nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6069">Habilitar la configuración automática de direcciones sin estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6069">Enable stateless address autoconfiguration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6070">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6071">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6072">Este servicio habilita la característica de configuración automática de direcciones IPv6 sin estado en un dispositivo de red especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6072">This service enables the IPv6 stateless address auto configuration feature on a specified network device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6073">Este servicio está disponible si se compila la biblioteca de NetX Duo con la opción ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6073">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_IPV6_STATELESS_AUTOCONFIG_CONTROL*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6074">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6074">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6075">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6075">**ip_ptr** IP instance pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6076">**interface_index**: índice de la interfaz de red en el que se debe habilitar la configuración automática de direcciones IPv6 sin estado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6076">**interface_index** The index to the network interface that the IPv6 stateless address autoconfiguration should be enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6077">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6077">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6078">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha habilitado correctamente la característica de configuración automática de direcciones sin estado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6078">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully enables stateless address autoconfig feature.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED**: (0x15) Ya está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6079">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) Already enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0X4B) La característica de IPv6 o la característica de control de configuración automática de direcciones IPv6 sin estado no se han compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6080">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature or IPv6 stateless address autoconfig control feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) El índice de la interfaz no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6081">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Interface index is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero al bloque de control de IP no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6083">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6084">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6085">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6085">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6086">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6086">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6087">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6087">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6088">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6088">Example</span></span>

```c
#define PRIMARY_INTERFACE

/* Enable stateless address auto configuration on this
   IP instance. */
status = nxd_ipv6_stateless_address_autoconfig_enable(&ip_0,
                                                      PRIMARY_INTERFACE);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, enables stateless address auto
   configuration on IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6113">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6114">Eliminar la entrada de la dirección IPv6 de la memoria caché de vecinos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6114">Delete IPv6 Address entry in the Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6115">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6115">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6116">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6117">Este servicio elimina una entrada de la memoria caché de detección de vecinos de IPv6 para la dirección IP proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6117">This service deletes an IPv6 neighbor discovery cache entry for the supplied IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6118">La función IPv4 de NetX equivalente es ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6118">The equivalent NetX IPv4 function is ***nx_arp_static_entry_delete***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6119">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6120">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6121">**ip_address**: puntero a la dirección IPv6 que se va a eliminar, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6121">**ip_address** Pointer to IPv6 address to delete, in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6122">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6123">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha eliminado correctamente la dirección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6123">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) No se encontró la dirección en la memoria caché de vecinos de IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6124">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Address not found in the IPv6 neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6125">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Espacio de almacenamiento o instancia de IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6126">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6127">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6128">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6128">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6129">Inicialización, subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6129">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6130">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6130">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6131">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6131">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6132">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6132">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example deletes an entry from the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Delete an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified IPv6
   address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete(&ip_0,
                                   &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was deleted from the neighbor cache
   table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6149">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6150">Agregar una dirección IPv6 y una asignación de MAC a la memoria caché de vecinos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6150">Add an IPv6 Address/MAC Mapping to Neighbor Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6151">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6151">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NXD_ADDRESS *dest_ip,
    UINT interface_index, 
    char *mac);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6152">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6152">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6153">Este servicio agrega una entrada a la memoria caché de detección de vecinos para la dirección IP especificada *ip_address* asignada a la dirección MAC de hardware en el índice de interfaz de red especificado (interface_index).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6153">This service adds an entry to the neighbor discovery cache for the specified IP address *ip_address* mapped to the hardware MAC address on the specified network interface index (interface_index).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6154">El servicio IPv4 de NetX equivalente es ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6154">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_static_entry_create***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6155">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6155">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6156">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6156">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6157">**dest_ip**: puntero a la instancia de dirección IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6157">**dest_ip** Pointer to IPv6 address instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6158">**interface_index**: índice que especifica la interfaz de red física mediante la que se puede tener acceso a la dirección IPv6 de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6158">**interface_index** Index specifying physical network interface where the destination IPv6 address can be reached</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6159">**mac**: puntero a la dirección de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6159">**mac** Pointer to hardware address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6160">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6160">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6161">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Entrada agregada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6161">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entry successfully added</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL**: (0x43) Memoria caché no válida o no hay entradas disponibles en la memoria caché de vecinos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6162">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) Invalid cache or no neighbor cache entries available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6163">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Espacio de almacenamiento o instancia de IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6164">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Valor del índice de interfaz no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6166">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index value.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6167">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6167">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6169">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6169">Preemption Possible</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6171">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6171">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example adds an entry on the primary network interface to
   the neighbor cache table. */

#define PRIMARY_INTEFACE 0

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UCHAR hw_address[6] = {0x0, 0xcf,0x01,0x02, 0x03, 0x04};
CHAR  *mac;

mac = (CHAR *)&hw_address[0];

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Create an entry in the neighbor cache table with the specified
   IPv6 address and hardware address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_entry_set(&ip_0,
                                &ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0],
                                PRIMARY_INTERFACE, mac);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the entry was added to the neighbor
   cache table. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6189">Buscar la dirección de hardware de una dirección IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6189">Locate Hardware Address for an IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6190">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6190">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6191">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6192">Este servicio intenta encontrar una dirección de hardware física en la memoria caché de detección de vecinos de IPv6 que está asociada con la dirección IPv6 proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6193">También se devuelve el índice de la interfaz de red mediante la cual se puede llegar al vecino en el parámetro *interface_index*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6194">El servicio IPv4 de NetX equivalente es ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6195">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6195">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6196">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6196">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6197">**ip_address**: puntero a la dirección IP que se va a buscar, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6197">**ip_address** Pointer to IP address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6198">**physical_msw**: puntero a los 16 bits superiores (del 47 al 32) de la dirección física, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6198">**physical_msw** Pointer to the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6199">**physical_lsw**: puntero a los 32 bits inferiores (del 31 al 0) de la dirección física, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6199">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6200">**interface_index**: puntero a la ubicación de memoria válida para el índice de interfaz que especifica el dispositivo de red en el que se puede acceder a la dirección IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6200">**interface_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the interface index specifying the network device on which the IPv6 address can be reached.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6201">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6202">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha encontrado correctamente la dirección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) La asignación no está en la memoria caché de vecinos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping not in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) La dirección IP proporcionada no es de la versión 6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) The supplied IP address is not version 6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Espacio de almacenamiento o instancia de IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6208">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6209">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6209">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6210">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6210">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6211">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6211">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6212">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6247">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6247">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example invalidates the host neighbor cache table. */

/* Invalidate the cache table bound to the IP instance. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_invalidate (&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, all entries in the neighbor cache table
   are invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6265">Recuperar la dirección IPv6 de una dirección física</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6265">Retrieve IPv6 Address for a Physical Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6266">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6267">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6268">Este servicio intenta encontrar una dirección IPv6 en la memoria caché de detección de vecinos de IPv6 que está asociada con la dirección física proporcionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6269">También se devuelve el índice de la interfaz de red mediante la cual se puede llegar al vecino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6270">El servicio IPv4 de NetX equivalente es ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6271">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6271">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6272">**ip_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de IP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6272">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6273">**ip_address**: puntero a una estructura NXD_ADDRESS válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6274">**physical_msw**: 16 bits superiores (del 47 al 32) de la dirección física que se va a buscar, en orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6275">**physical_lsw**: 32 bits inferiores (del 31 al 0) de la dirección física que se va a buscar, en orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6276">**interface_index**: puntero al índice del dispositivo de red mediante el cual se puede acceder a la dirección IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6277">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6278">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Se ha encontrado correctamente la dirección.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND**: (0x16) No se encontró la dirección física en la memoria caché de vecinos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x4B) La característica de IPv6 no se ha compilado en la biblioteca de NetX Duo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Espacio de almacenamiento o instancia de IP no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS**: (0x4D) La dirección MAC es cero.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6284">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6285">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6285">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6286">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6287">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6288">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6306">Establecer una conexión TCP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6307">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6308">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6309">Este servicio realiza una conexión TCP con un socket de cliente TCP creado previamente en el puerto del servidor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6310">Este servicio funciona en redes IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6311">Los puertos de servidor TCP válidos oscilan entre 0 y 0xFFFF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6312">NetX Duo determina la interfaz física adecuada en función de la dirección IP del servidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6313">El equivalente IPv4 de NetX es ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6314">El socket debe estar enlazado a un puerto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6315">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6316">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket TCP creado anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6317">**server_IP**: puntero a la dirección de destino IPv4 o IPv6, en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6318">**server_port**: número de puerto del servidor al que conectarse (de 1 a 0xFFFF), en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6319">**wait_option**: opción de espera mientras se establece la conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6320">Las opciones de espera se definen de la siguiente forma:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT**: (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER**: (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6323">**valor de tiempo de espera en tics**: (0x00000001 a 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6324">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6325">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Socket conectado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED**: (0x1A) Una llamada a tx_thread_wait_abort ha cancelado la suspensión solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IPv4 o IPv6 del servidor no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) El socket no está enlazado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED**: (0x35) El socket no está en estado cerrado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS**: (0x37) No se ha especificado ninguna espera, el intento de conexión está en curso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE**: (0x4C) Índice de interfaz no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**: (0x50) La interfaz de red no tiene una dirección IPv6 válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) TCP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) Puerto no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**: (0x38) Error en la conexión.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6338">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6339">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6339">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6340">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6340">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6341">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6342">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6367">Recuperar la dirección IP y el número de puerto del socket TCP del nodo del mismo nivel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6368">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6369">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6370">Este servicio recupera la información de puerto y dirección IP del nodo del mismo nivel para el socket TCP conectado mediante la red IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6371">El servicio IPv4 de NetX equivalente es ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6372">Tenga en cuenta que *socket_ptr* debe apuntar a un socket TCP que ya esté en estado conectado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6373">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6374">**socket_ptr**: puntero al socket TCP conectado al host del nodo del mismo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6375">**peer_ip_address**: puntero a la dirección IPv4 o IPv6 del nodo del mismo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6376">La dirección IP devuelta está en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6377">**peer_port**: puntero al número de puerto del nodo del mismo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6378">El número de puerto devuelto está en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6379">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6380">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Información del socket recuperada correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED**: (0x38) Socket no conectado al nodo del mismo nivel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) TCP no está habilitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Entrada de puntero no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6385">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6386">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6387">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6388">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6389">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6414">Extraer parámetros de red de un paquete UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6415">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6416">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6417">Este servicio extrae los parámetros de red de un paquete recibido en redes UDP IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6418">El servicio equivalente de NetX es ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6419">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6420">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6421">**ip_address**: puntero a la dirección IP del emisor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6422">**protocol**: puntero al protocolo que se va a devolver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6423">**port**: puntero al número de puerto del emisor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6424">**interface_index**: puntero al índice de la interfaz de red desde la que se recibe este paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6425">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6426">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Datos de la interfaz de paquetes extraídos correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**: (0x12) El paquete no es IPv4 ni IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Entrada de puntero no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6430">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6431">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6432">Adelantamiento posible</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6432">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6433">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6433">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6434">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6434">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                    &protocol, &port,
                                    &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully retrieved.*/
```
