## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6458">Enviar un datagrama UDP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6459">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6460">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6461">Este servicio envía un datagrama UDP mediante un socket UDP previamente creado y enlazado para redes IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6462">NetX Duo encuentra una dirección IP local adecuada como dirección de origen en función de la dirección IP de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6463">Para especificar una interfaz y una dirección IP de origen específicas, la aplicación debe usar el servicio ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6464">Tenga en cuenta que este servicio vuelve inmediatamente, independientemente de si el datagrama UDP se ha enviado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6465">El servicio equivalente de NetX (IPv4) es ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6466">El socket debe estar enlazado a un puerto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6467">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6468">**socket_ptr**: puntero a la instancia de socket UDP creada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6468">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6469">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete del datagrama UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6470">**ip_address**: puntero a la dirección IPv4 o IPv6 de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6470">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6471">**port**: número de puerto de destino válido (entre 1 y 0xFFFF), en el orden de bytes del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6471">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6472">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6473">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Envío correcto desde el socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR**: (0x21) Dirección IPv4 o IPv6 del servidor no válida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6474">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND**: (0x24) Socket no enlazado a ningún puerto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6475">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS**: (0x50) No se ha podido encontrar ninguna interfaz de salida adecuada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6476">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW**: (0x02) No hay suficiente espacio para el encabezado UDP en el paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6477">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW**: (0x03) El puntero de anexión del paquete no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6478">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket, puntero de dirección o puntero de paquete no válidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6479">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address pointer, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6480">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED**: (0x14) No se ha habilitado UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6481">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT**: (0x46) El número de puerto no está dentro de un intervalo válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6482">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within a valid range</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6483">Permitido desde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6484">Subprocesos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6484">Threads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6486">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6486">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6487">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

```c
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6513">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6514">Este servicio envía un datagrama UDP mediante un socket UDP previamente creado y enlazado para redes IPv4 o IPv6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6515">El parámetro *address_index* especifica la dirección IP de origen que se va a utilizar para el paquete saliente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6516">Tenga en cuenta que la función vuelve inmediatamente, independientemente de si el datagrama UDP se ha enviado correctamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6517">El socket debe estar enlazado a un puerto local.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6518">El servicio equivalente de NetX (IPv4) es ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6541">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6565">Recuperar la información de origen del paquete UPD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6566">Prototipo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6567">Descripción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6568">Este servicio extrae la dirección IP y el número de puerto de origen de un paquete UDP recibido mediante el socket UDP del host.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6569">El equivalente de NetX (IPv4) es ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6570">Parámetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6571">**packet_ptr**: puntero al paquete UDP recibido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6572">**ip_address**: puntero a la estructura NXD_ADDRESS que va a almacenar la dirección IP de origen del paquete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6573">**port**: puntero al número de puerto del socket UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6574">Valores devueltos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6575">**NX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Extracción correcta del origen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET**: (0x12) El paquete no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Puntero de socket no válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) El autor de llamada de este servicio no es válido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8beaa-6583">Ejemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8beaa-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
